Francais: Cependant il commanda aux nuées d'en haut,  et il ouvrit les portes du ciel ;
Anglais: Though he had commanded the clouds from above, and opened the doors of heaven,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vul hagata tam ɗugul ma kulona, nam mal vun-galana vi wuralawna goyo kaw;
Guiziga: Dambalaka Buymisemuŋ a pula jiviɗ le da gazlavay a muŋ, a wuna mifiliw ngi muŋhoyo le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kaŋko o umri duule haa dow, o maɓɓiti burɗe asama.
Fulfulde_DC: Kaŋko o umri duule haa dow, o maɓɓiti burɗe asama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ bu-zan mɛ ŋgɔn ɓɛɛ a̧ hú̧í̧ nú yiwese;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ bu-zan mɛ ŋgɔn ɓɛɛ a̧ hú̧í̧ nú yiwese;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ gezave nda ghena ke ləmbə nyi te ghweme, pa ŋkɛ ghwenemte gelembe nyi te ghweme.
Tupurri: AÀ kal fer waçaçre ne swaare ma ciñ wo, Kal bul jag ngeel ma ciñ wo go

Francais: il fit pleuvoir sur eux la manne pour les nourrir,  et leur donna le froment du ciel.
Anglais: And had rained down manna upon them to eat, and had given them of the corn of heaven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam hin manna si gaa kisiya kay ti'e, nam vulsi alkamare ma wuralawni pana.
Guiziga: A po taŋ man ti muŋ ka vuŋ, ɓa ngi zumo, a vula taŋ alkamari ngi muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O toɓni mannu dow maɓɓe ngam nyaamnugo ɓe , o hokki ɓe nyaamdu iwndu diga asama.
Fulfulde_DC: O toɓni mannu dow maɓɓe ngam nyaamnugo ɓe , o hokki ɓe nyaamdu iwndu diga asama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: man  nɛ́ zuɗi nɛ́ zuɗa-a mgbúzúk nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ hee ɓɔrɔ ga a nù ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ. Nɛ́ de nyɔŋmɔ mɛ yiwese á̧ à̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: man  nɛ́ zuɗi nɛ́ zuɗa-a mgbúzúk nɛ̀ ŋgɔn mɛ tɛnɛ hee ɓɔrɔ ga a nù ha̧ wa mɛ nyɔŋ. Nɛ́ de nyɔŋmɔ mɛ yiwese á̧ à̧ ha̧a̧ ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ betakawa mane kezha zeme nda zeme ke hɛ, ha nya pelɛ ghweme yantakawa nda ŋkɛ ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Kal cwaa reege Man le ne hara AÀ haç coore ble ne hara.

Francais: Chacun mangea le pain des forts,  Il leur envoya de la nourriture à satiété.
Anglais: Man did eat angels' food: he sent them meat to the full.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf tum mi tina vi sa ŋulona, nisi kaf tin suwsi suwi goyo.
Guiziga: Mbur gar na, a zum di i ɗaf ngi modro ngi Bumbulvuŋhoy, Buymisemuŋ a vula taŋ gwat ngi zumo ka taŋ mawuɗam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe nyaami nyaamdu ndu malaa'ika'en ngaddani ɓe, Allah neldi ɓe ko haarnata ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe nyaami nyaamdu ndu malaa'ika'en ngaddani ɓe, Allah neldi ɓe ko haarnata ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nyɔŋmɔ‘i nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o betom ko Sɔ̧. A̧ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a nɛ̀ sura zaŋ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nyɔŋmɔ‘i nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ ko o betom ko Sɔ̧. A̧ ha̧a̧ nyɔŋmɔ ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a nɛ̀ sura zaŋ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Yayata wəndə kezehwe ɗafa ta ka ghwene ta Shala, nahe Shala keghweneke nda wəshi kezeme ke hɛ kwele kwele.
Tupurri: Wosela da' hole peçeç ma reege jar kluuri AÀ coñ reege le ne hara de kaçaçge.

Francais: Il fit souffler dans le ciel le vent d'orient,  il amena par sa puissance le vent du midi ;
Anglais: He caused an east wind to blow in the heaven: and by his power he brought in the south wind.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hin simeɗ ma kuɗuwna biw hay dukalawna, hiɗi donota valamu nam mar simeɗ ma kayamina.
Guiziga: Dar Buymisemuŋ, a muŋ, a ɓula himiɗ misi tisi pas ngi miprike, a go himiɗ tir vay ruwuyo ti gidaŋ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden o ummini henndu fuunaaŋge, bee baawɗe maako o wifni henndu fombina.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden o ummini henndu fuunaaŋge, bee baawɗe maako o wifni henndu fombina.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ha̧ búk mɛ kur nɛ̀ ti daŋa-wese, a̧ dee ha̧ búk mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ mɛ yu daŋnɛ tɛ ŋgai mɛ tɛ-a;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ha̧ búk mɛ kur nɛ̀ ti daŋa-wese, a̧ dee ha̧ búk mɛ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ mɛ yu daŋnɛ tɛ ŋgai mɛ tɛ-a;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ŋkamte sefə nya kesame kwa zeweve ta ghweme pelɛ ghweme, pa ŋkɛ vɛke sefə nya kesame laka bela kwa zeme laka berete ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal fid leege ma nen wer wo le ciñ Day kal nduugi de leege ma nen äañ ni Waçyban de eegre äe no,

Francais: il fit pleuvoir sur eux la viande comme de la poussière,  et les oiseaux ailés comme le sable des mers.
Anglais: He rained flesh also upon them as dust, and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hin sliwna si gaa kisiya ki butuwna nala, layay ma zlimitna ki ŋesl ma kel-niyna nala.
Guiziga: A po useˀ sirtititi nga hirnga taŋ kaɓa lagwada, waɗ ɗiyuwoy kiriɓ kiriɓ haɗi kaɓa muyuŋ a mizaw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O jippinani ɓe colli ɗuuɗɗi bana collaaje, bana njaareendi maayo, ngam ɓe nyaama.
Fulfulde_DC: O jippinani ɓe colli ɗuuɗɗi bana collaaje, bana njaareendi maayo, ngam ɓe nyaama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ ha̧a̧ kpoo ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a lata-lata, a̧ dee ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ zir zu wa nɛ dɔka-a hee nyɛmɛ ká̧ gba-tɔp ga;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ ha̧a̧ kpoo ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a lata-lata, a̧ dee ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ zir zu wa nɛ dɔka-a hee nyɛmɛ ká̧ gba-tɔp ga;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ betaghe sli kənəa hɛ kala hɛɗi, 'yɛ kwele kwele kala ndaleghe nya kwa hələ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal cwaa naèy le ne hara ngaäa do äurgi nono. Day cwaa weere dweere wo le do ngaäa Deguëgi ma jag maarog nono.

Francais: Il les fit tomber au milieu de leur camp,  autour de leurs tentes.
Anglais: And he let it fall in the midst of their camp, round about their habitations.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hinim yak gaa'a hay guruna visiya, ŋuyi kat liyn ma musta visiya.
Guiziga: A po taŋ di nga wuzla walahay guɗuko, gun gun ciki guɗuk taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O do'i ɗi caka saŋngeere maɓɓe, ɗi taari laymaaji maɓɓe fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: O do'i ɗi caka saŋngeere maɓɓe, ɗi taari laymaaji maɓɓe fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ dee ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ nɔ‘i mɛ ai a nù zu gbagari kɔ-wa zik fara-yaa kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ dee ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ nɔ‘i mɛ ai a nù zu gbagari kɔ-wa zik fara-yaa kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ beteyi hɛ te tepe ta ghedəkwəa nci, dzeyi yitea yɛ cɛ lekwesa ta nci.
Tupurri: Maga se kal laa rage ti holañ kañ äaara no, Go ti ngeel lagge äaaran degarra äuy.

Francais: Ils mangèrent et se rassasièrent à l'excès;  Dieu leur donna ce qu'ils avaient désiré.
Anglais: So they did eat, and were well filled: for he gave them their own desire;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ti'e hobawa ŋol kaw, va ma nisi dara nam vulsiya.
Guiziga: A zumam, hã a mbam fineˀ gidaŋ, a lumam gwat taŋ mawuɗama le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari masin, o hokki ɓe ko ɓe ngiɗno.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari masin, o hokki ɓe ko ɓe ngiɗno.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa nyɔŋa mɔɔ nɔ‘i, nɔ́ yì sur wa nɛ̀ de-a; a̧ ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ dee see-wa ha̧ wa gan zu-wa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa nyɔŋa mɔɔ nɔ‘i, nɔ́ yì sur wa nɛ̀ de-a; a̧ ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ̀ dee see-wa ha̧ wa gan zu-wa,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ zehwe slia shɛhɛ behe behe, nahe Shala kendeke nda wəsə nya ɗe hɛ ke hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ ree wora kaçaç wo go ti ngeel kañ klaä äaara Baa nduu de fen maga aà hay wo de saçy äe ti ne hara.

Francais: Ils n'avaient pas encore satisfait leur convoitise,  et leur nourriture était encore à leur bouche,
Anglais: They were not estranged from their lust. But while their meat was yet in their mouths,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma haysi bay hob tuwa, hay li ma tin ka vunsi pasl tuwa,
Guiziga: Amma a kiɗaka mi ngi zum vuna t'aruŋ, yo a roko di mbuf mbuf a balam aruŋ si na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa diga suuno maɓɓe de'itaay tawon, kusel boo ɗon caka nyii'e maɓɓe tawon,
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa diga suuno maɓɓe de'itaay tawon, kusel boo ɗon caka nyii'e maɓɓe tawon,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ sur yí-wa na. Bó nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ‘i kaɗa kɔ̧ nú-wa kaɗi na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ sur yí-wa na. Bó nɛ́ nyɔŋmɔ‘i kaɗa kɔ̧ nú-wa kaɗi na,
Kapsiki_DC: Ama tewə hɛ kekiɗimte zeme ta ŋkɛ, te və nya nza mɛa nci viɗi viɗi ne,
Tupurri: AÀ hay baa jag ëiggi äaaran go ne hara gaa Reege äaaran hay jag äaara kay bay liggi ëa.

Francais: quand la colère de Dieu s'éleva contre eux ;  il frappa de mort les mieux repus,  il abattit les jeunes hommes d'Israël.
Anglais: The wrath of God came upon them, and slew the fattest of them, and smote down the chosen men of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hay na'ta ɦiyda vi Lawna fok kulo kisiya, nam ci kuɗ sum sa ɗorayna visiya, joriyona vi Israyel nam cisi goyo kaw.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a zuɓ himaˀ fõh fõh ng'ar taŋ, a kiɗa mizli migidaŋ gidaŋ ngi si taŋhaya, a zlumbura gawla Israyeley a ruwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah ɓernani ɓe, mbari semmbiɗɓe maɓɓe, o do'i suka'en Isra'iila suɓaaɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: Allah ɓernani ɓe, mbari semmbiɗɓe maɓɓe, o do'i suka'en Isra'iila suɓaaɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: á̧ wa a̧ŋa nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ a ŋgɔn woyo; nɛ̀ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kuma nɛ o gasawi mgbara wa a nù ŋgokoko, yo nɛ̀ o daŋa ŋgaiwi ko  Israɛl  nɛ nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: á̧ wa a̧ŋa nɛ nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ a ŋgɔn woyo; nɛ̀ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kuma nɛ o gasawi mgbara wa a nù ŋgokoko, yo nɛ̀ o daŋa ŋgaiwi ko  Israɛl  nɛ nù.
Kapsiki_DC: pa hwepe wənə ta Shala pesleyi geva kənəa hɛ, pa ŋkɛ mpəmte mbeli nyi berete berete ma, pa ŋkɛ mpəate megelɛshia ka Israyɛl te hɛɗi.
Tupurri: De maga soçoçge äil mani Baan kal naa ti Ciñ see äaara tu mono, AÀ kal id ma de eegre ma yoo äaaran wo go, AÀ taw weere joçoçre ma Israyeln wo go.

Francais: Après tout cela, ils péchèrent encore,  et n'eurent pas foi dans ses prodiges.
Anglais: For all this they sinned still, and believed not for his wondrous works.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗi kayni kaf kaw nisi tuɗ vok hiɗi sulukŋa, nisi min vi kuɗ sle ma ŋulo ŋulona valamɗi.
Guiziga: Gar ti nah kwana, ara gam mungra nga mbuŋ na si, gwat madiɗahay, Buymisemuŋ miga taŋ na, a tiɓaka ɓi nah ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa bee non fuu ɓe tokki waɗugo hakke, ɓe nuɗɗinaay kaayeefiiji Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa bee non fuu ɓe tokki waɗugo hakke, ɓe nuɗɗinaay kaayeefiiji Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, wa dee ɗaŋmɔ woyo; wa e ta nɛ̀ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wa na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zu mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ, wa dee ɗaŋmɔ woyo; wa e ta nɛ̀ mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dee ha̧ wa na,
Kapsiki_DC: Ya tsagha shɛ ŋkɛ, nahe hɛ kezhɛne kamenete jaɗafa, kese hɛ kayɛ wəshi meŋelea ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: Mbe de sen mo deñ äuy no, aà kal wo joñ älagge tigriñ, Laa wo dayge haç äil ti feçeçre mbuëgi äen wo gaè.

Francais: Alors il dissipa leurs jours comme un souffle,  et leurs années par une fin soudaine.
Anglais: Therefore their days did he consume in vanity, and their years in trouble.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vat buura visi goy hay waata, busata visiya nam vata' goy hay narta-ŋolda kaw.
Guiziga: Dar Buymisemuŋ a kiɗa mi ngi hin ngi siifa taŋ kutum ka himiɗ macuhu, yo a kiɗa mi ngi zik taŋ ar duniya ti ɓi ngi muɗa didak gurjik gurjikey lambaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum o timmini balɗe maɓɓe meere, o timmini duuɓi maɓɓe nder kultoreeŋgol.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum o timmini balɗe maɓɓe meere, o timmini duuɓi maɓɓe nder kultoreeŋgol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ hee gɔma-yí ga a̧ kuma wa a nù riɓiti. Duka-kpasa kɔ-wa kaɗa war kpɔk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ hee gɔma-yí ga a̧ kuma wa a nù riɓiti. Duka-kpasa kɔ-wa kaɗa war kpɔk.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ kiɗimte nza ta nci teghweme kala sefə ba'a yɛ va ta nci mbe ghazlənə.
Tupurri: AÀ kal taw naw äaaran wo go de koë koë, Taw kiñgi äaaran wo go äil heçeçne ma kluu debañ.

Francais: Quand il les frappait de mort,  ils le cherchaient, ils revenaient,  empressés à retrouver Dieu,
Anglais: When he slew them, then they sought him: and they returned and enquired early after God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nam cisi goy mati, nisi garamu, nisi hotiya muɗ irsi kir Lawna.
Guiziga: Ti Buymisemuŋ mira kiɗa taŋ vagay vagay na, taŋ a mbuɗoko hiri ng'avaŋ, a tumbulokoŋ, a moko ng'avaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa nde o fuɗɗi mbarugo ɓe, ɓe ngayliti heedi maako, ɓe tuubani mo, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa nde o fuɗɗi mbarugo ɓe, ɓe ngayliti heedi maako, ɓe tuubani mo, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ gbɛɛ nɛ̀ o ŋma mgbara wa hegɔ kaɗi'i á̧ oi dɔka-a zika nɛ̀ tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ-a,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ gbɛɛ nɛ̀ o ŋma mgbara wa hegɔ kaɗi'i á̧ oi dɔka-a zika nɛ̀ tɛ si ɗoŋ tɛ-a,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma vəa ŋkwa nya se Shala kampə hɛ ne, nahe hɛ kese kazele ŋkɛ, nahe hɛ kese shɛ ba'a kese kazele kemane ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: De maga aà go de taw rage mono, saara kal kiëgi äe, AÀ kal wo ferge le, day kië wo Baa.

Francais: ils se rappelaient que Dieu était leur rocher,  et le Dieu Très-Haut leur libérateur.
Anglais: And they remembered that God was their rock, and the high God their redeemer.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Humsi gisi ala Lawna mi hiɗiyna visiya, ala Lawn ma Kulo-Jamna mi ma butsi goyna.
Guiziga: A wulkam keŋ, Buymisemuŋ i mandazlay muwã taŋ, yo Buymisemuŋ Mimadiɗa, i micika vu a hirnga taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ciftori Allah woni tapaare maɓɓe hisnoore, Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo woni coottoowo ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ciftori Allah woni tapaare maɓɓe hisnoore, Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo woni coottoowo ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ soɓee, tɛ-wa mbaŋa ɗoŋ Sɔ̧, kam-ta kɔ-wa, GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, wan-kpasi-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ soɓee, tɛ-wa mbaŋa ɗoŋ Sɔ̧, kam-ta kɔ-wa, GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, wan-kpasi-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kese kazəzə Shala nde se kagela ta nci, Shala tehwə ghweme nde se kande ya hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo ëig ti ga Baa hay diñ huuli saara no, Ga Baa ma Ciñ Haçaç Debañn diñ je yaçaç saara no

Francais: Mais ils le trompaient par leurs paroles,  et leur langue lui mentait ;
Anglais: Nevertheless they did flatter him with their mouth, and they lied unto him with their tongues.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nisi ɗutum hiɗi vunsiya, nisi ka sin talam ɦawa.
Guiziga: Amma mi mabo ti balam taŋ gar na, i ngi gi gilaw da Buymisemuŋ, ˀirne taŋ i ngi gaŋ slir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓe ngiɗi sargugo Allah bee bolle maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon pewa mo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓe ngiɗi sargugo Allah bee bolle maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon pewa mo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tu̧u̧ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ndara nú-wa, wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa nɛ́ ndela sɔɔ géè;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tu̧u̧ tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ndara nú-wa, wen mɛ kɔ̧ nú-wa nɛ́ ndela sɔɔ géè;
Kapsiki_DC: Ama deke le mɛ se hɛ kaghwete ŋkɛ, tseŋwə yase ghɛnia nci kasla nda.
Tupurri: Ama aà hay da wo ga saara jaçën de waçaçre äaara no, Day aà hay wo car gete' ne hen de jage.

Francais: leur coeur n'était pas ferme avec lui,  ils n'étaient pas fidèles à son alliance.
Anglais: For their heart was not right with him, neither were they stedfast in his covenant.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Diksi may tapay hiɗi nam donoɗi, nisi vi kuɗ bonota valamu gasiɗi kaw.
Guiziga: A cicaka mevel taŋ dar gidaŋ gidaŋ ar Buymisemuŋ ta, yo jumoˀay naŋ ati taŋ na, a pulaka vu taŋ mbak wãˀ vurˀe ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɗakkotiraay bee maako, ɓe kakkilanaay alkawal maako bana ko haani .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɗakkotiraay bee maako, ɓe kakkilanaay alkawal maako bana ko haani .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa e see-wa tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ na, wa e ta nɛ̀  nɔɔ-tɔk  n'aa nɔɔ in wa na mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa e see-wa tɛ Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ mbetɛ na, wa e ta nɛ̀  nɔɔ-tɔk  n'aa nɔɔ in wa na mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Kese hɛ kave nda wənəa nci we, kese hɛ kanza dɛŋe dɛŋe te jikə geva ta ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: Jiili äaara hay bay go de sa'ge ne hen haçd wa, AÀ hay bay wo seege yaçaç jag wer jag liñgi äen wa.

Francais: Mais lui est miséricordieux :  il pardonne le péché et ne détruit pas ;  souvent il retint sa colère,  et ne se livra pas à toute sa fureur.
Anglais: But he, being full of compassion, forgave their iniquity, and destroyed them not: yea, many a time turned he his anger away, and did not stir up all his wrath.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May namu mi slugona, nam vul gida kay jiw-zlata, nam ɓulak sanɗi kaw. Awa, sem ŋolo nam hin ɦiyda valamu hot bugolo, hin dikam roŋ kafɗi kaw.
Guiziga: Amma Buymisemuŋ, naŋ i mupura ircece, ara pula malambaˀ taŋ, mbak ngizl taŋ kuɗupo jak. A muca mevele le sar mbeˀ mbeˀe, a bo ti ji mevele njoy wãˀ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Allah hinni yimɓe muuɗum, yaafi aybeeji maɓɓe, halkaay ɓe. Nde ɗuuɗɗum o naŋgti ɓernuki maako, o yoofaay ɓernuki maako fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Allah hinni yimɓe muuɗum, yaafi aybeeji maɓɓe, halkaay ɓe. Nde ɗuuɗɗum o naŋgti ɓernuki maako, o yoofaay ɓernuki maako fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ déé ko ko Sɔ̧, a̧ bìì yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ, a̧ de ha̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tik zu wa na mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ déé ko ko Sɔ̧, a̧ bìì yɔɔ-kaya kɔ-wa lɛŋ yinɛ, a̧ de ha̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tik zu wa na mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama gheŋkɛ nya kande zhɛ heli ne, jaɗafa yase ŋkɛ kakele te wənə, kaɗema kaza sebe te hɛ. Kagweɗakwe wənəa ŋkɛ ŋkɛ mbe kweci və, kafeɗeghe pɛtɛa hwepe ta wənəa ŋkɛ ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: Day ma äen aà diñ je ko decoo jar so mono Hay mbe go façaç älagge äaara no, bay go taw rage wa. Faage maga aà ëaw see äe ni hay mbe dusglug deñ, Day hay bay go men soçoçge äil äen joñ mopo äay wa.

Francais: Il se souvenait qu'ils n'étaient que chair,  un souffle qui s'en va et ne revient plus.
Anglais: For he remembered that they were but flesh; a wind that passeth away, and cometh not again.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Humam gum ala nisi ay mi sliw ɦawa, ki simeɗna ma kal goyo, hotɗi nala.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a si na le, taŋ i dumvu ngataraŋ, a cohom ka himiɗ mucuh le, mamo mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam o siftori ɓe maayanɓe, ɓe caaloto bana henndu ndu wartataa.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam o siftori ɓe maayanɓe, ɓe caaloto bana henndu ndu wartataa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ-wa, nɛ̀ wa nɛ́ mur-tɛ géè, wa nɛ búk nɛ̀ yu nɛnɛ ɓɛɛ pii ɗoŋ zu pata na’ɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ duka-a kɔ-wa, nɛ̀ wa nɛ́ mur-tɛ géè, wa nɛ búk nɛ̀ yu nɛnɛ ɓɛɛ pii ɗoŋ zu pata na’ɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kese kazəzə deke kambeli hɛ gəmə, kasefə nya keslə kaɗema kazhɛne kase.
Tupurri: AÀ hay fer ëiggi ga aà wo diñ jar tebere, Diñ äodge eegre maga raw, day fer le gaa so.

Francais: Que de fois ils se révoltèrent contre lui dans le désert,  ils l'irritèrent dans la solitude !
Anglais: How oft did they provoke him in the wilderness, and grieve him in the desert!
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi fokay kulo kalam hay fulda sem ŋolo tige. Nisi muɗum dikam yora hay liyn ma wiŋŋa tige.
Guiziga: A mbiɗam hirnga le avu Buymisemuŋ sar mbeˀ mbeˀ a wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka, yo a jiginam mi le ava ar li muˀulo nah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe tuurtani mo nder ladde nde ɗuuɗɗum, haa ladde hamaadaare, ɓe ɗuɗɗini laskingo ɓernde maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe tuurtani mo nder ladde nde ɗuuɗɗum, haa ladde hamaadaare, ɓe ɗuɗɗini laskingo ɓernde maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ɔ dɔka o bíí ŋgoo zer in Sɔ̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà, wa tu̧u̧ see-aa mbɛt ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa yaa nɛnɛ hi̧i̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ɔ dɔka o bíí ŋgoo zer in Sɔ̧ sɛn ŋga-gbárà, wa tu̧u̧ see-aa mbɛt ŋgimbi nɛ̀ wa yaa nɛnɛ hi̧i̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe kweci və ne, kaka fa nda ma ghena se hɛ te ɓerama, nahe hɛ kebezemte nda ghena te ŋkwa nyi keghwele ghwelea shɛhɛ.
Tupurri: Ga day wurpo saara giñ ne ti puuli! Ga ti wurpo saara car jiili äe go ti ngeel po Maga go weleñ mono!

Francais: Ils ne cessèrent de tenter Dieu  et de provoquer le Saint d'Israël.
Anglais: Yea, they turned back and tempted God, and limited the Holy One of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi nem Lawna dok-doko, nisi ɓulak dik ma peldetna vi Israyel dok-doko.
Guiziga: A cam a kwacay Buymisemuŋ tuwa ma ni, a gaka gwat ngi ji mevel da Buymisemuŋ mipal kine ngi Israyele.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Fahin ɓe poondi mo, ɓe mettini Ceniiɗo Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Fahin ɓe poondi mo, ɓe mettini Ceniiɗo Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa wee Sɔ̧ war nɛ̀ dɔka-a, wa ɗaŋa see Sa̧a̧ Wi ko  Israɛl .
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa wee Sɔ̧ war nɛ̀ dɔka-a, wa ɗaŋa see Sa̧a̧ Wi ko  Israɛl .
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kezhɛne kadzeghakɛ Shala, kabezemte nda wənə ke Shala nya kaganda ta Israyɛl.
Tupurri: AÀ fer wo tï¡ï¡ wer jaçë Baa, Tï¡ï¡ wer duë je ma bay ëag ma Israyel no.

Francais: Ils ne se souvinrent plus de sa puissance,  du jour où il les délivra de l'oppresseur,
Anglais: They remembered not his hand, nor the day when he delivered them from the enemy.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Humsi min gisi kay donota valamɗi, hay buur ma nam butsi goy hay ɓam ma gawta.
Guiziga: Gwatay naŋ miga taŋ vur taŋ na, a puyukom taŋ hirnga le, yo naŋ muloho taŋ tisi haŋ ngi mbur mazlir ti taŋ ta,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ciftoraay baawɗe maako nyalaade nde o hisnino ɓe diga konne'en maɓɓe,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ciftoraay baawɗe maako nyalaade nde o hisnino ɓe diga konne'en maɓɓe,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ ŋga er-a n'aa kpasa so nɛ̀ wa er o wisɛn kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ ŋga er-a n'aa kpasa so nɛ̀ wa er o wisɛn kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Kezhɛne hɛ kazəzə wəsə nya menete dzeve ta ŋkɛ, veci nya mbeɗeke hɛ ŋkɛ va ka ghema ta nci we.
Tupurri: AÀ bay wo ferge ëiggi ti eegre äen wa, Koh bay wo ëiggi ti wur maga aà hay yaçaç ra go Jag je heen mo wa,

Francais: où il montra ses prodiges en Egypte,  ses actions merveilleuses dans les campagnes de Tanis,
Anglais: How he had wrought his signs in Egypt, and his wonders in the field of Zoan:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nanige nam li ɗekka hay Egipte, nanige nam li sle ma ŋulona hay fulda vi Sowan.
Guiziga: gwat ngi bigi gwatay, naŋ miga taŋ a Ezipte, waɗ gwat migam ɗaˀ tahay, naŋ miga taŋ ar li mazilaka Soˀaŋ na, a puyukom taŋ hirnga le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: o waɗno alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji nder lesdi Misra, nder ladde Co'an.
Fulfulde_DC: o waɗno alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji nder lesdi Misra, nder ladde Co'an.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee so mɔɔ-usi-mɔ sɛn Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ de o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ sɛn Tanis mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee so mɔɔ-usi-mɔ sɛn Egiptɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ de o mɔɔ-gɔn-ɗɛɗɛ sɛn Tanis mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kezaghəyite wəshi kencɛ wəshi nyi menete ŋkɛ mbe Ɛzhipte, wəshi meŋele nyi menete ŋkɛ te hɛɗi Sowan.
Tupurri: Koh ti feçeçre kañ nen maga aà hay ndar Nen äaara le Ejipte mo gaè. Koh feçeçre mbuëgi ma kluuri ma mbasga ma Sowan wo gaa lay.

Francais: Il changea leurs fleuves en sang,  et ils ne purent boire à leurs ruisseaux.
Anglais: And had turned their rivers into blood; and their floods, that they could not drink.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam muɗ niy-lumna visi goy busuwu, niy ma jaŋŋa visiya kaw ta-ta nisi fi a ciɗi.
Guiziga: Yam ngi mizawaya, a tiri taŋ pumbusu, ɓa Eziptehey a saka gu mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wartiri maaje Misra ƴiiƴam, haa Misra'en keɓaay yarugo ndiyam .
Fulfulde_DC: O wartiri maaje Misra ƴiiƴam, haa Misra'en keɓaay yarugo ndiyam .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ kifa o yì lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɔk dekpe dekpe wen ká bíí tɛɛ nɔ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ kifa o yì lɛŋ nɛ̀ tɔk dekpe dekpe wen ká bíí tɛɛ nɔ,
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kezhɛrete yɛməa yɛ dzeve ta Nil kamimi, tsagha yɛ hələa nci kezha ɗema ka Ɛzhipte kasa yɛməa nci.
Tupurri: AÀ coo jag do bii Nil äaaran go diñ ci, Day saara kaçaç ma joo blam yuuri äen gaè.

Francais: Il envoya contre eux le moucheron qui les dévora,  et la grenouille qui les fit périr.
Anglais: He sent divers sorts of flies among them, which devoured them; and frogs, which destroyed them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam cuk raw-rawna ma vunam samna jarsiya kay tisiya, cuk luura jarsiya kay ɓulaksiya kaw.
Guiziga: A slino taŋ bibirey ɓa a saka taŋ pumbuso, waɗ gecey wenewene, tiɓeˀ tiɓeˀ li gar avu taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O ukkani ɓe buubi, ɗi ŋati ɓe, o neldi ɓe paaɓi, ɗi ndaami ɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: O ukkani ɓe buubi, ɗi ŋati ɓe, o neldi ɓe paaɓi, ɗi ndaami ɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ toma o zi̧-bia mɛ nyɔŋ wa, in o yaa-gbazal mɛ pi̧ mɔɔ-nyɛr tɛ-wa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ toma o zi̧-bia mɛ nyɔŋ wa, in o yaa-gbazal mɛ pi̧ mɔɔ-nyɛr tɛ-wa;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ ghwenahwe yɛ ŋgezlere nyi kehehalakawa hɛ ba'a gwambe nyi kebezakawa hɛɗia nci hwa hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ laa wuçy wo le ne hara ti maga joo wo ci äaara go, De tigeçw wo maga älag wo feçeçre äaaran wo go äuy.

Francais: Il livra leurs récoltes à la sauterelle,  le produit de leur travail à ses essaims.
Anglais: He gave also their increase unto the caterpiller, and their labour unto the locust.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vul jaf-slena visiya mi baara, nam vul vuɗna vi lopna visiya mi bar-bobona kaw.
Guiziga: A vula gwat ngi sifi taŋhaya da jaray a zumaŋ, migir ngi slra taŋ, a vula da yuk ɓa a zumaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O yoofi baɓɓatti, ɗi nyaami ƴaamle gese maɓɓe, mbonni nafuuda kuugal maɓɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: O yoofi baɓɓatti, ɗi nyaami ƴaamle gese maɓɓe, mbonni nafuuda kuugal maɓɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ dee ha̧ o diŋgo mɛ ɗaŋ nyɔnɔ kɔ-wa, in ha̧ o gba-dɔya mɛ ɗaŋ o fɔ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ dee ha̧ o diŋgo mɛ ɗaŋ nyɔnɔ kɔ-wa, in ha̧ o gba-dɔya mɛ ɗaŋ o fɔ kɔ-wa mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kendeke nda wəshi nyi wəzate hɛ ke yɛ dzale ba'a wəshi nyi meneke hɛ te wəve ke yɛ hegi.
Tupurri: AÀ haç faage feçeçre äaara ma de jeëgen wo go ne mapoë wo, Haç feçeçre äaara maga aà gay wo de äe go ne matihoñ wora,

Francais: Il détruisit leurs vignes par la grêle,  et leurs sycomores par les grêlons.
Anglais: He destroyed their vines with hail, and their sycomore trees with frost.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vat gulda-guldana visi ma sinena goy hiɗi mogoyna, vat sikomora visi goy hiɗi sleɗna kaw.
Guiziga: A hirya guva ngi gudubun taŋhaya ti vuŋ misi yam, yo yi ngi bazlawar taŋhaya, a hirya ti vuŋ misi burkataŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wonni inabooje maɓɓe bee mallimallooje, ibbe maɓɓe boo bee peewol.
Fulfulde_DC: O wonni inabooje maɓɓe bee mallimallooje, ibbe maɓɓe boo bee peewol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗaŋa o te-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ kóró-ɓɔrɔ hú̧s-hú̧s, a̧ toma ŋga gɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɛ nɛ̀ o gasa te-mbɔra kɔ-wa ŋgokoko.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ɗaŋa o te-nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa nɛ̀ kóró-ɓɔrɔ hú̧s-hú̧s, a̧ toma ŋga gɛ̧ɛ̧ gbɛ nɛ̀ o gasa te-mbɔra kɔ-wa ŋgokoko.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kebezemte yɛ rɛzɛŋea nci le kwacakelɛ ba'a yɛ mekweɗa ta nci le va nyi jama jama.
Tupurri: AÀ älag pay tlalum äaaran wo go de huuli Baa, Day älag koore Sikomor äaaran wo go de meebe De leege Baa ma gigigi

Francais: Il abandonna leur bétail à la grêle,  et leurs troupeaux aux coups de la foudre.
Anglais: He gave up their cattle also to the hail, and their flocks to hot thunderbolts.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vul luwayna visiya goy tam mogoyna, fukunayna visiya tam kuta kaw.
Guiziga: A pula ginew taŋhaya mbak da vuŋ misi yam ɓa a kiɗa taŋ, yo gezleŋ ngi ginew taŋhaya mbak da vuŋ a ndisl, ɓa a kiɗa taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O nattini tokke dabbaaji maɓɓe bee mallimallooje e pelmaali .
Fulfulde_DC: O nattini tokke dabbaaji maɓɓe bee mallimallooje e pelmaali .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ toma o ŋga zɛɛ kum nɛ̀ o ndai kɔ-wa, a̧ dee ha̧ kórò mɛ mbaŋ kai o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa a nù lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ toma o ŋga zɛɛ kum nɛ̀ o ndai kɔ-wa, a̧ dee ha̧ kórò mɛ mbaŋ kai o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa a nù lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kewəfəyi wəshi keseɗa ta nci te kwacakelɛ ba'a yɛ wəvəsəa wəshi keseɗa ta nci katsa hɛ va.
Tupurri: AÀ laa huuli Baa go ne horog äaaran wo ti, Day äo' carge poçoç Baa go ne horog äaaran wo ti.

Francais: Il déchaîna contre eux le feu de son courroux,  la fureur, la rage et la détresse,  toute une armée d'anges de malheur.
Anglais: He cast upon them the fierceness of his anger, wrath, and indignation, and trouble, by sending evil angels among them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam gi ɦiyda valam ta ŋolda kisiya, purcakka hiɗi guru'ta hiɗi lasta, vokŋa vi sa sunda vi joota.
Guiziga: Angi kiɗa mi naŋ na, Buymisemuŋ a vunoho mevel naŋ matiɓi ka vu ng'ar Ezipteheye: himaˀ naŋ mufõh fõh, waɗ modro naŋ mingizla vuhoyo ndac, a slino taŋ nga ga taŋ bonoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O yoofi dow maɓɓe ɓernuki maako gulanki bana yiite, o ɓilli ɓe, o neldi ɓe yeɓre malaa'ika'en halkooɓe, ɓe torri ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: O yoofi dow maɓɓe ɓernuki maako gulanki bana yiite, o ɓilli ɓe, o neldi ɓe yeɓre malaa'ika'en halkooɓe, ɓe torri ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ pi̧i̧ kpɔra wee-nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu wa; a̧ dee ha̧ ŋga nyimsea in ɓaa-wen ká bá nɛ̀ gasa bɔnɛ mɛ tik zu wa nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-yí-zan mɛ nɛ̀ er o betom kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ pi̧i̧ kpɔra wee-nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ zu wa; a̧ dee ha̧ ŋga nyimsea in ɓaa-wen ká bá nɛ̀ gasa bɔnɛ mɛ tik zu wa nɛ̀ gba̧a̧-yí-zan mɛ nɛ̀ er o betom kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kepelaghe ghwə ta hwepe wənəa ŋkɛ kənəa hɛ: beze ta wənə, ghyana, herefe, ka ghwene ta ŋkɛ nyi kekele ndiremi.
Tupurri: AÀ äo' soçoçge äil äe ma de haçaçn ne hara ti. Tï¡ï¡gi go, haçyhaçy wo de joñge coo ti äaara, Diñ peele maga aà laa jar peele ma joñ bon Jar wo le ti äe mono.

Francais: Il donna libre carrière à sa colère,  il ne sauva pas leur âme de la mort,  il livra leur vie à la destruction.
Anglais: He made a way to his anger; he spared not their soul from death, but gave their life over to the pestilence;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam par hagat goyo kay ɦiyda valamu, nam ŋay ciwta visi kay mittaɗi, nam vul irita visi goy mi moy ma joona.
Guiziga: A ga mevele wãˀ, a jigina taŋ avu muco mata, amma a pula taŋ mbak da mozorbono a ngizla taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O naŋgtaay ɓernuki maako, o hisnaay yoŋkiiji maɓɓe, ammaa o halki ɓe bee nyawu kalluŋgu, ndaaɓoowu.
Fulfulde_DC: O naŋgtaay ɓernuki maako, o hisnaay yoŋkiiji maɓɓe, ammaa o halki ɓe bee nyawu kalluŋgu, ndaaɓoowu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee ha̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ de ŋmaa in wa, a̧ wɔka ŋga-zɛɛ pi̧ zu wa, a̧ kpasi wa tɛ fio na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee ha̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ de ŋmaa in wa, a̧ wɔka ŋga-zɛɛ pi̧ zu wa, a̧ kpasi wa tɛ fio na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kese ŋkɛ kadzakwe hwepe ta wənəa ŋkɛ we, kese ŋkɛ kaya hɛ va mte we, nahe ŋkɛ kepelave nda mpia nci ke ba.
Tupurri: AÀ men faage go ne soçoçge äil äen hoñe. AÀ men tenen äaaran sugsug bay huli gaè. AÀ haç tenen äaaran go ne bulfuçñ do.

Francais: Il frappa tous les premiers-nés en Egypte,  les prémices de la force sous les tentes de Cham.
Anglais: And smote all the firstborn in Egypt; the chief of their strength in the tabernacles of Ham:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ci sa vuɗi jewna kaf hay Egipte, nam ci vun-jaf ma jewna vi donota gaa kuɗ guɗukŋa vi Kam.
Guiziga: A kiɗa ziri modogom ngi Ezipteheye cek vagay vagay, i ziri micikiɗeffe ngi kwacay tizer ngi Kamay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O mbari ɓiɓɓe afɓe Misra'en, nder ci'e  Haamu'en .
Fulfulde_DC: O mbari ɓiɓɓe afɓe Misra'en, nder ci'e  Haamu'en .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ gusa o kaya-bem ko o be Egiptɛ gbɛ lɛŋ, a̧ kuma o ŋga-wi mgbara bezaŋ Kam mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ gusa o kaya-bem ko o be Egiptɛ gbɛ lɛŋ, a̧ kuma o ŋga-wi mgbara bezaŋ Kam mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kempəmte pɛtɛa ka tezhɛa kɛfi nyi mbe Ɛzhipte, ghenci nyi kaka ghate ta ŋwale mempɛhweta ki ghɛa Sham.
Tupurri: AÀ taw jag weere ma Ejipten wo go äuy, Jag cerew eegre ma wer mburyug mani Kam no.

Francais: Il fit partir son peuple comme des brebis,  il les mena comme un troupeau dans le désert.
Anglais: But made his own people to go forth like sheep, and guided them in the wilderness like a flock.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nam tun vok sumuna valamu ki vok fok-dimina nala, nam kalsi goy hay fulda ki fukunayn nala.
Guiziga: Joˀ a ɓa mizli naŋhaya ɓa a cohom le kaɓa ginewey, aru ti taŋ sek a mbuŋ naŋ kaɓa tumuŋhoy, nga wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Bana baali o wurtiniri yimɓe maako yaasi, bana tokkere o ɗowri ɓe nder ladde .
Fulfulde_DC: Bana baali o wurtiniri yimɓe maako yaasi, bana tokkere o ɗowri ɓe nder ladde .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kaia dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ gbo nɛ̀ fara'i hee o sami ga, a̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛnɛ si ŋga-gbárà mɛ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa kaia dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ gbo nɛ̀ fara'i hee o sami ga, a̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛnɛ si ŋga-gbárà mɛ;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kefəakave mbelia ŋkɛ kala wəshi keseɗa, nahe ŋkɛ keŋkaghe hɛ kala timɛti kadzete ɓerama.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ nen rawge de jar äen wo do horog ma ti koëge wo nono. AÀ mañ faage de äaara do horog ma ti puuli wo nono.

Francais: Il les dirigea sûrement,  sans qu'ils eussent rien à craindre;  et la mer engloutit leurs ennemis.
Anglais: And he led them on safely, so that they feared not: but the sea overwhelmed their enemies.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ŋomsi ŋaa'a kay nisi ma li narɗi. May niy-ŋolla duk kay sa gawt-kisina.
Guiziga: Aru ti taŋ ti setette, manja zluwun, yam a nda mesene taŋhaya yik yik.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O yahri ɓe jam, ɓe kultoraay, yaake maayo moɗi konne'en maɓɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: O yahri ɓe jam, ɓe kultoraay, yaake maayo moɗi konne'en maɓɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ zɔka wa nɛ̀ de-á, kíì de wa na. Gba-tɔp kpee zu o wisɛn kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ zɔka wa nɛ̀ de-á, kíì de wa na. Gba-tɔp kpee zu o wisɛn kɔ-wa lɛŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Le gezleŋema ghə begheghe hɛ ŋkɛ, kese hɛ kaghazlənə vəa ŋkwa nya zhiɓəaghe geva ndərə kənəa ka jaga ta nci we.
Tupurri: AÀ see go de äaara de yoçoç ti, aà daë wo gaè. Day maarog kal äo'ge go ne jar hee äaaran wo ti.

Francais: Il les fit arriver jusqu'à sa frontière sainte,  jusqu'à la montagne que sa droite a conquise.
Anglais: And he brought them to the border of his sanctuary, even to this mountain, which his right hand had purchased.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam marsi hay jar-liyna valamu ma peldetna, kat hiɗiy na'ta ta nam fa' hiɗi ɓalam ta jufta.
Guiziga: Aru ti Israyeleye nga hirwuy naŋ mipal, a muwã naŋ mitiɓa ti gidaŋ naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O nastini ɓe lesdi maako ceniindi, o yahri ɓe haa hooseere nde o nyaamno .
Fulfulde_DC: O nastini ɓe lesdi maako ceniindi, o yahri ɓe haa hooseere nde o nyaamno .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ war ko o bíí kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛnɛ ye nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ zu kaya n'aa ɓara so nɛ̀ wii-er-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ war ko o bíí kɔ̧-a̧, a̧ mgbɔɔ wa nɛnɛ ye nɛ̀ sa̧a̧ fara-duk kɔ̧-a̧ zu kaya n'aa ɓara so nɛ̀ wii-er-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ kefəghe hɛ kadzete hɛɗia ŋkɛ nya keveyi geva tekeleke, kadzeme ghweme nya kelehwe ŋkɛ le berete ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal woge de äaara nen jag hagu äe ma bay ëag no, Nen ti huuli äe maga äañ war äen hay yaçaçn go mono.

Francais: Il chassa les nations devant eux,  leur assigna par le sort leur part d'héritage,  et fit habiter dans leurs tentes les tribus d'Israël.
Anglais: He cast out the heathen also before them, and divided them an inheritance by line, and made the tribes of Israel to dwell in their tents.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam digiɗ jaf-sumun goy vok sa Israyella, nam ɓuraw nagat jarsi voco'o, nam hinsi lak hay guɗukŋa vi sum segena.
Guiziga: A ɓula sukwi ngi mizli mekelemey avra baɗ a mbuŋ taŋ, a wuɗuka taŋ hirwuyo wuɗak wuɗak, waɗ a cifa Israyeley ar hay ngi Kanaˀanay vuna.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O riiwi ummaatooje yeeso maɓɓe, o yeɗani le'i Isra'iila maral, ɗi njooɗi ton .
Fulfulde_DC: O riiwi ummaatooje yeeso maɓɓe, o yeɗani le'i Isra'iila maral, ɗi njooɗi ton .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ndaka o wi nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na ti wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɛ̧ nù ko o wi nɔ‘i ha̧ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi; nɛ́ fara'i á̧ à̧ ee ha̧ o zuduk be  Israɛl mɛ de ye sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ndaka o wi nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na ti wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ a̧ kɛ̧ nù ko o wi nɔ‘i ha̧ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ̀ mɔɔ-oi; nɛ́ fara'i á̧ à̧ ee ha̧ o zuduk be  Israɛl mɛ de ye sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe ŋkɛ keŋkamte hwelefefi te kema ta nci, Nahe ŋkɛ keneheve nda hɛɗi ke hɛ kaŋa nci, Nahe ŋkɛ kefəyi yitehɛ nyi mbe Israyɛl mbe yɛ cɛ lekwesa ta nci.
Tupurri: AÀ nii wer sir wo go ne hara pele, Kal haç tabul ma hooge ne hara de ngaäge de saale Day kal lag äï¡ï¡ni mani Israyel wo äi mburyug ni.

Francais: Cependant ils ont encore tenté et provoqué le Dieu Très-Haut,  et ils n'ont pas observé ses ordonnances.
Anglais: Yet they tempted and provoked the most high God, and kept not his testimonies:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nir na'ta kep nisi nem Lawna ma Kulo-Jamna, nisi ŋel vun-ma-gatna, min vi kuɗ yoboyna valamɗi kaw.
Guiziga: Amma Israyeley a slikiɗam ɓi, a cam a kwacay Buymisemuŋ Mimadiɗa, ɓimuɗuva naŋhay na, a jaka taŋ a hirnga ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓe poondi Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo, ɓe tuurtani mo, ɓe kakkilanaay seedamkuuji maako .
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓe poondi Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo, ɓe tuurtani mo, ɓe kakkilanaay seedamkuuji maako .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa wee Sɔ̧, GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, woyo. Wa dee ŋgazu in a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa wee Sɔ̧, GASA WAN nɛ̀ duk ŋgɔn mɛ, woyo. Wa dee ŋgazu in a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama nahe hɛ kedzeghakɛ Shala tehwə ghweme, laka fa nda ma ghena, laka hawema va ghena nyi gezete ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ama aà raw wo jaçë Baa ma Ciñ Haçaç Debañ no, aà raw giñgi äe, AÀ lag wo ti faage jag liñgi faage seele äen wo gaè.

Francais: Ils se sont détournés et ont été infidèles comme leurs pères,  ils se sont détournés comme un arc trompeur.
Anglais: But turned back, and dealt unfaithfully like their fathers: they were turned aside like a deceitful bow.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nisi raw goyo, ŋel gatta ki sumaysi nala, nisi cal goyo ki ɓarawta ta ɗut sana nala.
Guiziga: A zuɓam jiviɗ malambaˀ, yo a vulam mizli ngi jihey kaɓa dideˀ taŋhay. A ngizlam le avu jiviɗe kaɓa luvut mumulaka le ti lek muguduɗoŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe tuurtani mo, ɓe zammbi mo bana kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓe mboofi bana kuri piɗaaɗi bee lagaawal ɓosliiŋgal.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe tuurtani mo, ɓe zammbi mo bana kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe, ɓe mboofi bana kuri piɗaaɗi bee lagaawal ɓosliiŋgal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ra̧ e a̧ duk hee o dáà kɔ-wa dee so nɛti ga. Deemɔ kɔ-wa gɔɔ hee ŋma ɗaŋ gɔɔ kusaa ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ra̧ e a̧ duk hee o dáà kɔ-wa dee so nɛti ga. Deemɔ kɔ-wa gɔɔ hee ŋma ɗaŋ gɔɔ kusaa ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kehwɛnji ba'a kepamte ŋkɛ kala ka shihɛ nci, nahe hɛ kezhɛrenji kala rəgi nya ɗema tsene ganyɛ te.
Tupurri: AÀ cel wo see äaara go, day joñ wo go haçyaçäe, Haçyaçä do paçaçre äaara wo no pa no. AÀ cel wo go kar do toñwaa maga go de bañge de älagge nono.

Francais: Ils l'ont irrité par leurs hauts lieux,  ils ont excité sa jalousie par leurs idoles.
Anglais: For they provoked him to anger with their high places, and moved him to jealousy with their graven images.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi muɗum ɦiya hiɗi liyna visi ma kulo ɗiŋiriŋŋa, nisi muɗum hunaya hiɗi lawayna visi ma waana.
Guiziga: A gakaŋ gwat ngi ji mevel ti gi mikuli da kulihey ar li miɗingir ɗingireye, a slikiɗakaŋ suloŋ ti kuli taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɓernini mo bee nokkuuje maɓɓe towɗe, ɓe ummini kaajal maako bee labbi maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɓernini mo bee nokkuuje maɓɓe towɗe, ɓe ummini kaajal maako bee labbi maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɗaŋa see Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗáfá o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ zu kaya nɛnɛ. See Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa zu wa wen ɗáfá géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɗaŋa see Sɔ̧ nɛ̀ ɗáfá o géé-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ zu kaya nɛnɛ. See Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa zu wa wen ɗáfá géé-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kebezemte nda wənə le yɛ kələŋəa nci, nahe yɛ shala ta nci kemtseke hwepe wənəa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ car wo jiili go ne hen de ngeel sië jag ma De farge ciñ äaaran wo no, AÀ yaë wo wer hun äen wo ciñ ni de foto Feçeçre äaara ma de ceëgen wo no.

Francais: Dieu entendit et s'indigna,  il prit Israël en grande aversion.
Anglais: When God heard this, he was wroth, and greatly abhorred Israel:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna hum kayni, nam muɗ ɦiya, nam zut sum sa Israyel goy hiɗi dono'o.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ mupura keɗ keɗ na, a ji mevel, a pula sukwi Israyele mbak wãˀ avra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah laari ɗum, o ɓerni, o wudini Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Allah laari ɗum, o ɓerni, o wudini Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa dea'i a̧ŋa nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ a ŋgɔn woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧  Israɛl  taŋ nɛ̀ oi gun.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ‘i nɛ̀ wa dea'i a̧ŋa nyimsea ko Sɔ̧ a ŋgɔn woyo, ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧  Israɛl  taŋ nɛ̀ oi gun.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa nakɛ wəsəa shɛ Shala ne, pa ŋkɛ hwepete wənə ba'a wəfəyite Israyɛl fate fate.
Tupurri: Baa laa ne, day äil äe kal soçoçge, Se kal mbuë fo Israyel kluu debañ.

Francais: Il dédaigna la demeure de Silo,  la tente où il habitait parmi les hommes.
Anglais: So that he forsook the tabernacle of Shiloh, the tent which he placed among men;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam noy liyn ma musta valamu hay Silo goyo, guɗukŋa ma nam pum jar sumuna;
Guiziga: A pula hay naŋ misi a Silo, guɗuk naŋ miɗiya a wuzla mizli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O acci joonde maako haa Silo, laymaaru maako ndu o tigguno caka yimɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: O acci joonde maako haa Silo, laymaaru maako ndu o tigguno caka yimɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee fara n'aa duka so sɛnɛ mgbara o bíí sɛn Silo mɛ duk.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee fara n'aa duka so sɛnɛ mgbara o bíí sɛn Silo mɛ duk.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ slənyɛ mbe ghɛa ŋkɛ nya mbe Silo, cɛ lekwesa nya mɓeyi ŋkɛ te tepe ta mbeli.
Tupurri: AÀ men do go see ngeel hayle ma Silo no, Mburyug maga aà hay de hayle yoo jar tebere wo ni mono.

Francais: Il livra sa force à la captivité,  et sa majesté aux mains de l'ennemi.
Anglais: And delivered his strength into captivity, and his glory into the enemy's hand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam vul donota valamu goy hay daŋgayta, nam vul gajijita valamu hay ɓam sa gawta kaw.
Guiziga: Yo akoti naŋ mabiga gidaŋ ati dudok naŋ na, a pula ɓa mesene naŋhay, a zuɓaka, a cohom di.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sundukru alkawal maako waŋginanndu baawɗe maako e tedduŋgal maako, o acci konne'en njaɓti ndu .
Fulfulde_DC: Sundukru alkawal maako waŋginanndu baawɗe maako e tedduŋgal maako, o acci konne'en njaɓti ndu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ ɓar Kuɓa  Nɔɔ-tɔk nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ ŋgai in gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ er-wa yinɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee ha̧ o wisɛn mɛ ɓar Kuɓa  Nɔɔ-tɔk nɛ̀ duka so nɛ́ ŋgai in gasamɔ kɔ̧-a̧ er-wa yinɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ pelakɛ ka ghema kakele səndəkwəa jikə geva, wəsə kencɛ berete ta ŋkɛ ba'a zləvəa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ haç eegre äen go rawge ti dañgay, Day haç sagge äen go ne je heen do.

Francais: Il abandonna son peuple au glaive,  et il s'indigna contre son héritage.
Anglais: He gave his people over also unto the sword; and was wroth with his inheritance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vul sumuna valamu goy tam kew-gaferaŋa, hayam roŋa kay vocota valamu kaw.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ji mevel le angi mizli naŋhaya, a pula taŋ ɓa mesene taŋhay a ngizlaka taŋ ti maslalam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hokki ummaatoore maako haa kaafahi konne'en, o ɓernani yimɓe laatiiɓe maral maako.
Fulfulde_DC: O hokki ummaatoore maako haa kaafahi konne'en, o ɓernani yimɓe laatiiɓe maral maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tik yí gba-paa wen see-aa ɗaŋa zu mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee ha̧ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧ mɛ tik yí gba-paa wen see-aa ɗaŋa zu mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ pelave nda mbelia ŋkɛ ke mte, pa hwepete wənə va hɛɗia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ haç jar äen wo go ne moslam do, Day joñ de soçoç äil see jar äe maga wo diñ tabul äe ma hoorge mono.

Francais: Le feu dévora ses jeunes hommes,  et ses vierges n'entendirent point le chant nuptial.
Anglais: The fire consumed their young men; and their maidens were not given to marriage.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuta ŋal sum sa joriyona visiya, sumun fi gi nul ma dabayna kay guro-boyna visiɗi kaw.
Guiziga: Vu a zlizlira gawlahaya le, mbak mbur mazli dimis ngi hunuma diilihey anta mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder ummaatoore maako, yiite nyaami sukaaɓe suɓaaɓe, faanyɓe nanaay gimol teegal.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder ummaatoore maako, yiite nyaami sukaaɓe suɓaaɓe, faanyɓe nanaay gimol teegal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ-wa bia wee lɛŋ, o be-zɔŋa zii kɔ‘i gima-baa-wíì ɓɔna;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O daŋa ŋgaiwi kɔ-wa bia wee lɛŋ, o be-zɔŋa zii kɔ‘i gima-baa-wíì ɓɔna;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ghwə teremte megelɛshi, kezhɛne mbeli kaghate nda cimə ke deghelɛshi hwa makwa we.
Tupurri: Wuu roë weere äe ma joçoçren wo go, Day mayre äe ma tigliirin da' wo togoëge gaè.

Francais: Ses prêtres tombèrent par l'épée,  et ses veuves ne se lamentèrent point.
Anglais: Their priests fell by the sword; and their widows made no lamentation.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna visiya puk gaa'a vok kew-gaferaŋa, boy sa duhulla visiya fi tiy noŋɗi kaw.
Guiziga: A kiɗaka masayaya le ar vurum, mbak ngwas wudiga taŋhaya, a tuwaka taŋ kaɗam kaɗam mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Liman'en maayri bee kaafahi, rewɓe yurumɓe keɓaay woyugo maayɓe muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Liman'en maayri bee kaafahi, rewɓe yurumɓe keɓaay woyugo maayɓe muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tika yí gba-paa, ɓɛɛ o ko-gera kpa fara hi̧i̧-kɔ̧a̧-fio ɓɔna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ kɔ-wa tika yí gba-paa, ɓɛɛ o ko-gera kpa fara hi̧i̧-kɔ̧a̧-fio ɓɔna.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa mpəmte ka dzeghe Shala mbeli ne, kese ka wedidi kanehwene we.
Tupurri: Jar joñ sië jag äen daë wo huli jag jaw Day naare dewur äaaran rag wo gaè.

Francais: Le Seigneur se réveilla,  comme un homme endormi,  pareil au guerrier subjugué par le vin.
Anglais: Then the Lord awaked as one out of sleep, and like a mighty man that shouteth by reason of wine.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta Bum-Sumuna zliy kulo'o ki sa ma ay hay senda nala, ki sa ma gaŋeraŋa ma siwel kay dolayn nala.
Guiziga: Dar Bumbulvuŋ a puɗuk bizliwir kaɓa mbur mihinje le zleˀe, kaɓa mbur gambara mbaazla muvulaŋ gidaŋ le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Jawmiraawo fini bana ɗaaniiɗo, bana konoowo mo nguykinoojam hokki ɗum semmbe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Jawmiraawo fini bana ɗaaniiɗo, bana konoowo mo nguykinoojam hokki ɗum semmbe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tuna yerem hee ŋma wi-ɔ-ya ga, hee ŋma ŋga-wi nɛ̀ kpɔra dɔ̧ɔ̧ yee tɛ-a ga;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ GASA WAN tuna yerem hee ŋma wi-ɔ-ya ga, hee ŋma ŋga-wi nɛ̀ kpɔra dɔ̧ɔ̧ yee tɛ-a ga;
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa Shala feɗeghenyɛ kala wəndə nya kese yitea hɛ, kala katsala kempa nya keghwəyi ghwəyi va tɛ.
Tupurri: Wañkluu puçy go do je maga hay tinaa nono Do blum maga naa blum diñ de yii nono.

Francais: Il frappa ses ennemis par derrière,  il leur infligea une honte éternelle.
Anglais: And he smote his enemies in the hinder parts: he put them to a perpetual reproach.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ci sa gawta sa muni vokom jaŋi, nam muɗsi goy zulo'o hiɗi zulota ta vatɗita.
Guiziga: A kiɗa mesene naŋhay makilama ti dirba, yo a tika taŋˀ ay le, hã ngi sete.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O lorni konne'en maako ɓaawo, o toskini ɓe haa foroy.
Fulfulde_DC: O lorni konne'en maako ɓaawo, o toskini ɓe haa foroy.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa pi̧i̧ zɛɛ gba-mira-mɔ tɛ o wi-sɛn-a, a̧ dee ha̧ búù mɛ ba wa nɛ̀ nduti-a bo na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ n'aa pi̧i̧ zɛɛ gba-mira-mɔ tɛ o wi-sɛn-a, a̧ dee ha̧ búù mɛ ba wa nɛ̀ nduti-a bo na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ɗate ka jaga ta ŋkɛ se kwa sebe ba'a pəliave nda hawe nya kaghala ghala ke hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal äum jar äen wo le nen faale, AÀ kal kuu rage de soçoçre ma tumtum

Francais: Mais il prit en aversion la tente de Joseph,  et il répudia la tribu d'Ephraïm.
Anglais: Moreover he refused the tabernacle of Joseph, and chose not the tribe of Ephraim:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam noy guɗukŋa vi Yosef goyo, nam vilek jafna vi Efrayimɗi kaw,
Guiziga: A pula dideˀ ngi Zozefeye baˀ murvay, a ngum zuɓa sukwi ngi Efrayime ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wudini danygol Yusufu, o suɓaay lenyol Efrayim.
Fulfulde_DC: O wudini danygol Yusufu, o suɓaay lenyol Efrayim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ o bíí nutua ko Josɛf taŋ, a̧ hok zuduk ko Efraim na mbɛt,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ a̧ pi̧ o bíí nutua ko Josɛf taŋ, a̧ hok zuduk ko Efraim na mbɛt,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ neghamte hwelefe ta Zhozɛf, pa ŋkɛ ɗema nta hwelefe ta Ɛfrayim.
Tupurri: Ti ngeel sen aà mbuë fo mburyug mani Josef no, AÀ joñ de äï¡ï¡ni mani Efrayimn diñ jar äe ma de farge gaa so.

Francais: Il choisit la tribu de Juda,  la montagne de Sion qu'il aimait.
Anglais: But chose the tribe of Judah, the mount Zion which he loved.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nam vilek jafna vi Yuda, hiɗiyta Siyon ta nam mina'ta kaw.
Guiziga: Amma a muɗ di ceɗ i sukwi ngi Zuda, muwã Siyoŋ, naŋ mawuɗo.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa o suɓi lenyol Yahuuda e hooseere Siyona nde o yiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa o suɓi lenyol Yahuuda e hooseere Siyona nde o yiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ hoka nɛ́ zuduk bíí ko Juda in kaya  Siɔŋ , dua-see-aa'i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ hoka nɛ́ zuduk bíí ko Juda in kaya  Siɔŋ , dua-see-aa'i,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ntave hwelefe ta Zhəwda, ghweme ta Siyon nya ɗehwe ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ mañ äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan go, Huuli ma Siyon maga aà hay dage äe mono

Francais: Et il bâtit son sanctuaire comme les hauteurs du ciel,  comme la terre qu'il a fondée pour toujours.
Anglais: And he built his sanctuary like high palaces, like the earth which he hath established for ever.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam in liyn ma peldetna valamu ki liyn ma kulo ɗiŋiriŋi nala, ki nagata ta nam kota' kulo'o ta-ta hay vatɗita nala.
Guiziga: A ndira hay naŋ a diga, gidaŋ gidaŋ ka li muŋ, yo a ɗuva ɓa a ndir ngi sete kaɓa hirwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O nyiɓi suudu maako seniindu bana joole haa asama, o tabitini ndu haa foroy bana lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: O nyiɓi suudu maako seniindu bana joole haa asama, o tabitini ndu haa foroy bana lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ de  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ̧-a̧ hi̧i̧ mgbemgbaa hee yiwese ga. A̧ dee tua'i nɛ̀ nɔa-a hee nù nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ de  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ̧-a̧ hi̧i̧ mgbemgbaa hee yiwese ga. A̧ dee tua'i nɛ̀ nɔa-a hee nù nɛ duk ɓɔnsɛnɛ'ɛ ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ŋate ghɛa ŋkɛ tagha, kala ŋkwa nyi bebiya bebiya. Pa ŋkɛ veyi shihəa ŋkɛ kala hɛɗi kaghala ghala.
Tupurri: AÀ boo ngeel äe ma bay ëagn do ngeel maga Wo go de mañge ciñ nono. Do sir maga aà laan diñ ma tumtum nono.

Francais: Il choisit David, son serviteur,  et le tira des bergeries ;
Anglais: He chose David also his servant, and took him from the sheepfolds:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vilek David sa ma sunda valamu, nam fum ay goy kuɗ ŋomda vi fok-dimin pa.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a muɗa gawla naŋ Davite le ceɗe, ara zuɓo di ar li jigina tumuŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O suɓi Daawuda, jaggiiɗo maako, o hooci mo haa waalde tokkere maako,
Fulfulde_DC: O suɓi Daawuda, jaggiiɗo maako, o hooci mo haa waalde tokkere maako,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ hoka David nɛ̀ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ baa a̧ gbonɛ nɛ̀ fara-dai-sami mɛ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ hoka David nɛ̀ wi-de-tom kɔ̧-a̧. A̧ baa a̧ gbonɛ nɛ̀ fara-dai-sami mɛ;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ ntave David nya kande mene slene ta ŋkɛ, kwa zlema ta timɛti zeleke ŋkɛ ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ mañ Dafid weejoçoç äen go, AÀ baan le yoo jar koë horog wora.

Francais: Il le prit derrière les brebis mères,  pour paître Jacob, son peuple,  et Israël, son héritage.  Et David les guida dans la droiture de son coeur,
Anglais: From following the ewes great with young he brought him to feed Jacob his people, and Israel his inheritance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vumay goy kuɗ fok-dimina ma guron ka ci miir kuɗumna pa, maramu kay nam ma ŋom jafna vi Yakub, sumuna valam sa Israyella, vocota valamu kaw.
Guiziga: A zuɓo di ti naŋ miɓaˀ asi tumuŋ naŋhay, ɓa a tiri di mijigina sukwi ngi Zakop, mizli naŋhay, yo Israyel zlili naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam taa o tokko durugo baali, ammaa o dura danygol Yaakubu ummaatoore maako, waato Isra'iila, maral maako .
Fulfulde_DC: ngam taa o tokko durugo baali, ammaa o dura danygol Yaakubu ummaatoore maako, waato Isra'iila, maral maako .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: a̧ saa a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ daia sami mɛ tɛnɛ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ dai Jakob, dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, in o be  Israɛl , mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: a̧ saa a̧ nɛ̀ tɛ daia sami mɛ tɛnɛ wen ha̧ a̧ mɛ dai Jakob, dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧, in o be  Israɛl , mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧;
Kapsiki_DC: Seyi yitea timɛtia ŋkɛ kelemte ŋkɛ ŋkɛ, kezha ve ŋkɛ kande ya hwelefe ta Zhakob, ta Israyɛl, hwelefe nya kaŋa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ baan le wer fiiri maga hay wo ti seele Maga aà mo joñ nen koë Jakob jar äen wo no, De Israyel maga diñ tabul äe ma hoorge mono.

Francais: et il les conduisit d'une main habile.
Anglais: So he fed them according to the integrity of his heart; and guided them by the skilfulness of his hands.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala nam ŋomsiya kuɗ gasita vi dikamu, nam digersiya hiɗi ɓalam ma yalla.
Guiziga: Davite, a jigina taŋ le ti mevel purla, a jigina taŋ le ti sin ngi Buymisemuŋ muvulaŋ di.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Daawuda duri ɓe bee ɓernde laaɓnde, o ɗowri ɓe bee anndal.
Fulfulde_DC: Daawuda duri ɓe bee ɓernde laaɓnde, o ɗowri ɓe bee anndal.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ David dai wa nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see in nɛ̀ de er mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ David dai wa nɛ̀ sa̧a̧-see in nɛ̀ de er mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Le wənə nya ganyɛ yate hwelefea shɛ David, le mehele se ŋkɛ kancɛ nda hweŋkwa ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Day Dafid kal koë rage de jiili ma keëede Day kal seege de äaara de do ma de ëeñ.

Francais: ( Vulg. LXXVII )
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Guiziga: Gwat migi avu Israyeley na, i dubun ngi puyuko hirnga ta
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Gooŋgaaku Allah dow yimɓe mum tuurtooɓe
Fulfulde_DC: Gooŋgaaku Allah dow yimɓe mum tuurtooɓe
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o be
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nyɛrɛmɔ ko o be
Kapsiki_DC: Zaghəma slene ganjia Mahwətə na ma
Tupurri: Feçeçre maga hay joñ wo go ti wurpo Israyel mono bay wo diñ ree ma yoçoç ti go wa

Francais: Psaume d'Asaph.  O Dieu, les nations ont envahi ton héritage,  elles ont profané ton saint temple,  elles ont fait de Jérusalem un monceau de pierres.
Anglais: O God, the heathen are come into thine inheritance; thy holy temple have they defiled; they have laid Jerusalem on heaps.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nulla vi Asaf. Lawna, jaf-sumuna sli vocota vaŋawa, nisi muɗ Tempella vaŋ ma peldetnawa liwisi, nisi ɦo Yerusalemawa gaa'a, muɗa'awa goy yam-jono'o.
Guiziga: Dimis ngi wuzla dimis ngi Asafay. Wo Buymisemuŋ ɗu, sukwi mekelemey a tiɓaka hirwuy ngi ɗike le, a cam le ti dili ng'ar hay ɗik  mipal   a, a tiram ti Zeruzaleme le i diŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimre Asaf. Yaa Allah, heefeerɓe nasti lesdi maral ma, coɓni haykaliiru ma seniindu, ngartiri Urusaliima winnde .
Fulfulde_DC: Yimre Asaf. Yaa Allah, heefeerɓe nasti lesdi maral ma, coɓni haykaliiru ma seniindu, ngartiri Urusaliima winnde .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gima ko Asaf. Sɔ̧, o tugun bíí nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na hura mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́; wa dee ndiŋ a kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́, wa dee ha̧ Jerusalɛm mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gima ko Asaf. Sɔ̧, o tugun bíí nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na hura mɔɔ-oi k’ɛ́nɛ́; wa dee ndiŋ a kɔ̧ sa̧a̧ tua k’ɛ́nɛ́, wa dee ha̧ Jerusalɛm mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ bɛɛ-oi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ciməa Asaf. Shala yawe, nahe hwelefefi kedzetenji te hɛɗia ŋa, nahe hɛ kezhɛrete ghɛa ŋa nya keveyi geva tekeleke wale wale, nahe hɛ kezhɛrete Zhɛrəzalɛm kakwəfi.
Tupurri: Siñ ma Asafe. O Baa! wer sir nduu wo go yaçaç tabul ma hoorge äo no AÀ kol wo tiñ Baa äo ma bay ëagn go de demge AÀ kol wo Jerusalem go diñ huuli ma de co' ëugul ti keçeç.

Francais: Elles ont livré les cadavres de tes serviteurs  en pâture aux oiseaux du ciel,  et la chair de tes fidèles aux bêtes de la terre.
Anglais: The dead bodies of thy servants have they given to be meat unto the fowls of the heaven, the flesh of thy saints unto the beasts of the earth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vul tuwna vi sa sunda vaŋawa goy mi layayn ma dukalawna a ti'e, nisi vul sliw sa peldetna vaŋawa mi muuriyan ma kay nagatna;
Guiziga: Vagay ngi gawla ɗikeye, a vulaka taŋ le da mogodokoy ɓa a ndaka taŋ. Vagay ngi mizli miteŋteŋ ɗikeye, a vulaka taŋ le da gwat ngi ɓuhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe nyaamni colli e kuuje ladde ɓalli jagganiiɓe ma hoolaaɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe nyaamni colli e kuuje ladde ɓalli jagganiiɓe ma hoolaaɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ wɔr o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ yiwese mɛ nyɔŋ, in mur-tɛ o wi-yu-kíí‘nɛ́ ha̧ o boko-nam mɛ zaŋbɛɛ mbɛt;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ wɔr o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ ha̧ o nɔ̧́í̧ mɛ yiwese mɛ nyɔŋ, in mur-tɛ o wi-yu-kíí‘nɛ́ ha̧ o boko-nam mɛ zaŋbɛɛ mbɛt;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kefəave nda geva ta ka mene slene ta ŋa ke yɛ zleŋa, slia mbelia ŋa ke wəshi keseɗa nyi hwa gamba.
Tupurri: AÀ haç wo huli weere joçoçre äon wo go Diñ ngeel reege weere dweere ma ciñ wo. Haç wo hoçoçgesee jar äo ma bay ndar gogn wo Go ne naèy ma gesiñ la wo.

Francais: Elles ont versé leur sang comme de l'eau,  tout autour de Jérusalem,  et personne pour leur donner la sépulture !
Anglais: Their blood have they shed like water round about Jerusalem; and there was none to bury them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi ɦoksi busuwsi goyo ki niyn nala goy gal Yerusalem, sa ma pisi gaa'a may noŋɗi.
Guiziga: Yo a paka pumbus taŋ le, ara ɓul gap gap ka yam, gun hirnga ngi Zeruzaleme, ko mbur midik taŋ anta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam yimɓe ma bana ndiyam, ɗam ili nder taarde Urusaliima fuu, walaa mo uwi ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam yimɓe ma bana ndiyam, ɗam ili nder taarde Urusaliima fuu, walaa mo uwi ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: tɔk tɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ fok nɛ̀ nù hee yi ga ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm mɛ, bíí-gun-wa bo na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: tɔk tɛ o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ fok nɛ̀ nù hee yi ga ɗoŋ Jerusalɛm mɛ, bíí-gun-wa bo na.
Kapsiki_DC: Kala ghwa shekeyi mimia nci hɛ dzeyi yitea Zhɛrəzalɛm, wəndə shɛ tagha kezha la hɛ we.
Tupurri: AÀ kaa wo ci äaara go do bii nono Go ti Jerusalem degarra äuy. Koh je tee rage baywa äuy.

Francais: Nous sommes devenus un objet d'opprobre pour nos voisins;  de risée et de moquerie pour ceux qui nous entourent.
Anglais: We are become a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and derision to them that are round about us.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Numa muɗi goy zulo'o vok sugolayma'na, muɗi goy ŋulda hiɗi burahta vun nisi sa ziy hiɗi numana.
Guiziga: Pura midigwi ndrahay ara zam ndra, mizli mugun hirnga ndrahay ara singiram ar ndra, yo ara buruɗam ndra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe ummaatooje taariiɓe min ɗon kuɗa min, ɗon njanca min, ɗon njawo min.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe ummaatooje taariiɓe min ɗon kuɗa min, ɗon njanca min, ɗon njawo min.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ ya zik yɛ da̧ nɛ ɛɛ zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ ɛɛ mam nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ ya zik yɛ da̧ nɛ ɛɛ zɛkɛɗi nɛ̀ ɛɛ mam nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kaŋele n'yɛ hwelefefi nyi dzeyi yitea ghen'yɛ, kaŋ'wəshi n'yɛ ba'a kayiɗə n'yɛ mbeli nyi dzeyi yitea ghen'yɛ.
Tupurri: Wuur kol diñ jar ëarge ne jar leege wuur wora Wuur kol diñ jar feg ti, jar mbuë fo ne jar ma de cir ti wuur wo no.

Francais: Jusques à quand, Yahweh, seras-tu irrité pour toujours,  et ta colère s'allumera-t-elle comme le feu ?
Anglais: How long,  Lord ? wilt thou be angry for ever? shall thy jealousy burn like fire?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ta-ta lancitige Ma-Vatɗina? Naŋ min mus hay ɦiyda ta-ta hay vatɗit su? ɦiyda vaŋ min ŋal ki kuta nala ta-ta lancitige?
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ, kisa kiɗa mi ngi ji mevel ɗik ar ndra, hã ti vunaka? Ji mevel ɗik ar ndra matiɓi njilim njilim ka vu na, anta sa kiɗ mi ta wãˀ kwa?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Jawmiraawo, ndey accata ɓernango min? Ndey ɓernuki kaajal ma accata wulugo bana yiite?
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Jawmiraawo, ndey accata ɓernango min? Ndey ɓernuki kaajal ma accata wulugo bana yiite?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn kànà nɛ́ ɓɔna-a zu yɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ? Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk kànà tɛ dee gɔya tɛ yɛ si ti hee wee ga nde?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, nyimsea k’ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn kànà nɛ́ ɓɔna-a zu yɛ ɓɔnsɛnɛ? Ɛ́nɛ́ tɛ duk kànà tɛ dee gɔya tɛ yɛ si ti hee wee ga nde?
Kapsiki_DC: Pa te nyama və tenza wənəa ŋa tehwepe wa Mahwətə? Kaghala ghala tetse hwepe ta wənəa ŋa kala ghwə na?
Tupurri: Manwuri! Ndo joñ ge de soçoç äil ne wuur ti do Kay no mono diñ haçaç hun so la? Hun äon men ge ngalge go do wuu na hun so la?

Francais: Répands ta fureur sur les nations qui ne te connaissent pas,  sur les royaumes qui n'invoquent pas ton nom.
Anglais: Pour out thy wrath upon the heathen that have not known thee, and upon the kingdoms that have not called upon thy name.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ɦokaŋ purcakka vaŋu goy kay jaf-sum sa bay waŋu, kay mulda ta yi semda vaŋɗita kaw.
Guiziga: Anja ki zuɓ himaˀ na, ng'ar sukwi ngi mizli misinukuw ta na jaka, ng'ar sukwi ngi mizli mahuruk hurukam a mbuŋ ɗik ta na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ruf ɓernuki ma dow heefeerɓe ɓe anndaa ma, dow laamuuji ɗi ewnataako innde ma.
Fulfulde_DC: Ruf ɓernuki ma dow heefeerɓe ɓe anndaa ma, dow laamuuji ɗi ewnataako innde ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: See'nɛ́ a̧ ɗáŋ zu o wi nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na'i, in zu o tugun bíí nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗafi'nɛ́ na mbɛt'i,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: See'nɛ́ a̧ ɗáŋ zu o wi nɛ̀ iŋ‘nɛ na'i, in zu o tugun bíí nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ɗafi'nɛ́ na mbɛt'i,
Kapsiki_DC: Vaghe hwepe wənəa ŋa kənəa mbeli nyi keɗepema ŋa, kənəa hɛɗi nyi keɗema kahekɛme sləa ŋa.
Tupurri: Dus tï¡ï¡gi de wañ äon go ne wer sir Maga bay wo de ko ndo wa ti, Day ne twaywañre maga bay Wo ëe ëu äo wa mono ti.

Francais: Car ils ont dévoré Jacob, et ravagé sa demeure.
Anglais: For they have devoured Jacob, and laid waste his dwelling place.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay nisi lig jafna vi Yakubawa, ɓulak ziyna valamawa goy waa'a kaw.
Guiziga: Asi a tiɓaka gwat ngi sukwi ngi Zakopoyo le ti gidaŋ, yo a musukuɗoko hirwuy naŋ le tur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe ɓe mbari yimɓe Yaakubu, ɓe mbili nokkuuje haa ɓe njooɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe ɓe mbari yimɓe Yaakubu, ɓe mbili nokkuuje haa ɓe njooɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen wa kɛra o bezaŋ Jakob kum nɛ̀ wa, ɓɛɛ wa ɗaŋ o mɔɔ-nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen wa kɛra o bezaŋ Jakob kum nɛ̀ wa, ɓɛɛ wa ɗaŋ o mɔɔ-nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe hɛ kezehwe Zhakob, nahe hɛ kebezemte hɛɗia ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Werga aè ree Jakob we go, Kol ngeel äen go lawge.

Francais: Ne te souviens plus contre nous des iniquités de nos pères ;  que ta compassion vienne en hâte au-devant de nous,  car notre misère est au comble.
Anglais: O remember not against us former iniquities: let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us: for we are brought very low.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ŋa jiw-zlata vi sumayma kumaɗi, hin slugota vaŋu co tuma gosoyo, kay numa muɗi haw ŋolo.
Guiziga: Ki mbiɗa ndra hirnga asi mungra ngi dideˀ ndraˀahaya ta, amma sawa kutum, pura ndra ˀircece, asi i hĩhĩyam le wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Taa liman min aybeeji kaakiraaɓe amin! Ammaa hinna min jonta, ngam min toskaaɓe masin!
Fulfulde_DC: Taa liman min aybeeji kaakiraaɓe amin! Ammaa hinna min jonta, ngam min toskaaɓe masin!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: K’ɛ́nɛ́ e wen kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ in yɛɛ wen yɔɔ-kaya ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ na.   Kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ  k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ yé ɗoŋ yɛ wen kinii ŋgai-tɛ-ɛɛ kaɗa nɛ̀ oi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: K’ɛ́nɛ́ e wen kɔ̧ see'nɛ́ in yɛɛ wen yɔɔ-kaya ko o zɔmdáa k’ɛɛ na.   Kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ  k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧ yé ɗoŋ yɛ wen kinii ŋgai-tɛ-ɛɛ kaɗa nɛ̀ oi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɗama n'yɛ na va fete ta ka shihɛ n'yɛ ma, ama zhɛ heli yitea ghen'yɛ kahe kahe, kwa nza ŋkɛ nahe n'yɛ kenza kaka dewə berete.
Tupurri: Fer ëig ti ti älagge wuur ma tañgu wo wa so. Daga koge decoo mo caa wo pel wuur le deparday! Werga wuur go de gayge debañ

Francais: Secours-nous, Dieu de notre salut,  pour la gloire de ton nom,  délivre-nous et pardonne nos péchés à cause de ton nom.
Anglais: Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name's sake.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna ma su'da vuma'a, gutaŋ kuɗma'a gutge, kay gajijita vi semda vaŋu, butma goyo, cukma sulukŋa vuma'a cukge kay semda vaŋu.
Guiziga: Aw Buymisemuŋ milih ndra, jina ndra, ɓa ngi biga dudok ɗiki. Laha ndra, pula mungra ndrahay avra, ɓa ngi biga slimiɗ ɗik mazil haɗa na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wallu min, yaa Allah, Kisnoowo min, ngam daliila innde ma teddunde. Hisnu min, yaafa hakkeeji amin, ngam daliila innde ma.
Fulfulde_DC: Wallu min, yaa Allah, Kisnoowo min, ngam daliila innde ma teddunde. Hisnu min, yaafa hakkeeji amin, ngam daliila innde ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧, wan-kpasi-ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ wen ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur; GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí o yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ yinɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ tɛ  ha̧a̧nú  k’ɛ́nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧, wan-kpasi-ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ wen ha̧ nin'nɛ́ mɛ hur; GASA WAN, ɛ̀nɛ̀ bí o yɔɔ-kaya k’ɛɛ yinɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ tɛ  ha̧a̧nú  k’ɛ́nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Shala yawe, kemane n'yɛ ba'a mbele n'yɛ kezha nza zləvə te sləa ŋa. Mbele n'yɛ ba'a kelemte jaɗafa ta n'yɛ te wənə kezha dzemte sləa ŋa.
Tupurri: Kay wuuri, Baa ma haç peçeçge ne wuur no, Diñ wer togoëge ëu äo no!

Francais: Pourquoi les nations diraient-elles : " Où est leur Dieu ? "  Qu'on connaisse parmi les nations, et sous nos yeux,  la vengeance que tu tires du sang de tes serviteurs,  quand il est répandu !
Anglais: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is their God? let him be known among the heathen in our sight by the revenging of the blood of thy servants which is shed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: A jaf-sumun ma di ala Lawna visi ka arige kayn kay mige? Hin jaf-sumuna wi job-yamda vi busuwna vi sumuna vaŋu vok irma'a. Jobaŋ yam busuwna vi sa sunda vaŋu, busuw ma ɦoki goyna.
Guiziga: Ka mapula sukwi mekelemey mbak a ɓam: «Buymisemuŋ taŋ naŋ amaka» na, vur mike? Ka mapula cuwal ngi gawla ɗikey mikiɗahay na, biga daˀ a mihiri ndra aka, ɓa sukwi tayna vuna a purakaŋ!
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam taa heefeerɓe ƴama min: “Toy Allah mon kadi?” Accu min ngi'a no a waatorto ƴiiƴam jagganiiɓe ma caka heefeerɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam taa heefeerɓe ƴama min: “Toy Allah mon kadi?” Accu min ngi'a no a waatorto ƴiiƴam jagganiiɓe ma caka heefeerɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wen ge sa o wi-iŋ Sɔ̧ na tɛ tɔ̧ ndé: «Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa a̧a̧ bɔɔ déè ndé‘i» ge? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí er ha̧ wa oi tɔk tɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ wa gbaia so a nù.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wen ge sa o wi-iŋ Sɔ̧ na tɛ tɔ̧ ndé: «Sɔ̧ kɔ-wa a̧a̧ bɔɔ déè ndé‘i» ge? Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí er ha̧ wa oi tɔk tɛ o wi-de-tom k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ wa gbaia so a nù.
Kapsiki_DC: Kezha wa tegeze hwelefefi: «Tema Shala ta nci gɛ wa», ke hɛ wa? Ɗepete hɛ kwa ntsə ta n'yɛ tsema tsema wa mpə ta ka mene slene ta ŋa na.
Tupurri: Diñ wer may ga wer sir waçaç ge wo ga: Baa äaaran genla yawla? Daga kañ nen wer sir sen wo go tinoo ne wuur Pah nen maga aà mo ko wo ga ndo sa' hee ci weere joçoçre äo maga aè hay kaan go mono.

Francais: Que les gémissements des captifs montent jusqu'à toi ;  selon la grandeur de ton bras, sauve ceux qui vont périr !
Anglais: Let the sighing of the prisoner come before thee; according to the greatness of thy power preserve thou those that are appointed to die;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hin tiyta vi sa daŋgayna co ta-ta taŋu, hiɗi ɓaŋ ma donona, suɗaŋ sumuna vaŋ goy vun mitta.
Guiziga: Cina niˀic ngi mizli dangayay na ti mevel mezleŋ, mizli migaka taŋ kiita ngi muc tayna na, jina taŋ ti gidaŋ ɗiki, ɓa a ndiram ti siifa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Uumaali haɓɓaaɓe njotto ma, bee baawɗe juŋngo ma hisnu mbareteeɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Uumaali haɓɓaaɓe njotto ma, bee baawɗe juŋngo ma hisnu mbareteeɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gɔfamɔ aia-nú ko o bara a̧ daŋ sitɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓár o wi nɛ̀ wa kaia so mɛ gbɛ yinɛ nɛ̀ ŋga er'nɛ́.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gɔfamɔ aia-nú ko o bara a̧ daŋ sitɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓár o wi nɛ̀ wa kaia so mɛ gbɛ yinɛ nɛ̀ ŋga er'nɛ́.
Kapsiki_DC: Fate ŋgaɗe ghə ta ka daŋgayɛ megela. Ma gha nya berete ne, sərəakɛ mbeli nyi tempə mbeli teghweme.
Tupurri: Daga ndumgi je ma ti dañgayn mo day go see äo Yaçaç jar maga wo go jag huli mañ mono De do äo ma de eegre no.

Francais: Fais retomber sept fois dans le sein de nos voisins  les outrages qu'ils t'ont faits, Seigneur !
Anglais: And render unto our neighbours sevenfold into their bosom their reproach, wherewith they have reproached thee, O Lord.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bum-Sumuna, wurakaŋ sum sa ziysi hiɗi numana sem siɗiya, kay ŋulda ta nisi ŋulaŋu.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ ɗu, Hirwuy ngi ciki ndrahay muzukuw na, mataŋ di makaw tarnaˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ummaatooje taariiɗe min kuɗi ma, yaa Jawmiraawo, warja ɓe ɗum cowi joweeɗiɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ummaatooje taariiɗe min kuɗi ma, yaa Jawmiraawo, warja ɓe ɗum cowi joweeɗiɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ ba nú o wi nɛ ya zik yɛ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, GASA WAN, oi gasa dara nɛ̀ wa da̧a̧ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ‘i;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé mɔ ba nú o wi nɛ ya zik yɛ war mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-yiitoo, GASA WAN, oi gasa dara nɛ̀ wa da̧a̧ nɛ̀ ɛnɛ‘i;
Kapsiki_DC: Shala, nahe hwelefefi nyi dzeyi yitea ghen'yɛ keŋelekɛ ŋa, waghe ŋele ta nci mberefaŋe zhigə kənəa hɛ.
Tupurri: Poë jar leege wuur wo äaale renam Ti ëarge maga aà ëar wo ndo de äe mono Wañkluu!

Francais: Et nous, ton peuple, le troupeau de ton pâturage,  nous te rendrons gloire à jamais ;  d'âge en âge, nous publierons tes louanges.
Anglais: So we thy people and sheep of thy pasture will give thee thanks for ever: we will shew forth thy praise to all generations.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Numa'a, sumuna vaŋu, fukunayna ma naŋ vulum tina, numa'a min gaŋ deɓe ta-ta hay vatɗita, numa'a min di goy kay ŋolda vaŋu tam jafna vokma'a vokma'a.
Guiziga: Amma ndra mizli ɗikey, ndra ginew ngir gezleŋ ɗikey na so na, i sa gukuw muguzlum ndrehhe, yo i sa tilam mi ti hunum ɗike, hã ngi set, ngi samadin.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa minin min yimɓe ma, tokkere ma, min ngettete haa foroy, min ngeynan maŋgtooje ma diga yidere haa yidere.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa minin min yimɓe ma, tokkere ma, min ngettete haa foroy, min ngeynan maŋgtooje ma diga yidere haa yidere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ war k’ɛɛ, dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ya nɛ́ mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ bíí nɛ gima-zɔn'nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ war k’ɛɛ, dukbíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ nɛ̀ ya nɛ́ mɔ-dai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛɛ tɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ bíí nɛ gima-zɔn'nɛ́ kpoo nɛ kpoo.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama ghen'yɛ nyi kambelia ŋa, nyi katimɛtia ŋa nyi ya na gɛ ne, katetsahe ŋa ghen'yɛ kaghala ghala ba'a kateve zləvə ghen'yɛ te gha keshi keshi.
Tupurri: Day ma wuur jar äo no, horog maga wo de Koëge, ti ngeel koë horog äon mono, Wuur mañ ge ti äo yañ ciñ tumi. Ti wer maga ndar ge wo wo mo äuy no, Wuur fer ge yañ dog togoë moge.

Francais: (vulg.LXXVIII )
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Guiziga: So jina ndra, asi i ndilam le wãˀ
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimre boyki ngam gibbinki Urusaliima
Fulfulde_DC: Yimre boyki ngam gibbinki Urusaliima
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gima zaŋ dita-see
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gima zaŋ dita-see
Kapsiki_DC: Səkwə ghə kezha mbele ta Zhɛrəzalɛm
Tupurri: AÀ le kay wuuri, wuur fer go blam patala haçaç debañ

Francais: Au maître de chant. Sur les lis du témoignage. Psaume d'Asaph.
Anglais: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tam ma ŋolla vi sa gi nulla. Di-goyta. Nulla vi Asaf.
Guiziga: Dimis ngi wuzla dimis ngi Asafay. I dimis ngi wulka ɓi. I mulumo di ar ɗerewol ngi buy ngi dimisi. Dimis ngi gujuvur.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam kaliifaajo gime fodde daande “gurguli seedamku” . Yimre Asaf.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam kaliifaajo gime fodde daande “gurguli seedamku” . Yimre Asaf.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gima ko Asaf ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Geŋa  nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɛŋɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gima ko Asaf ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Ger gima’ɛ nɛɛ nɛ́ ɗoŋ gima: Geŋa  nɛ́ mɔɔ-nyɛŋɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Se va wəndə nya te ghəa cimə. Yitea yɛ ŋgwəleŋə. Negha fete ta Asaf. Cimə.
Tupurri: Ne wañ siñ no. Siñ ma Asafe.

Francais: Pasteur d'Israël, prête l'oreille,  toi qui conduis Joseph comme un troupeau ;  toi qui trônes sur les Chérubins, parais avec splendeur.
Anglais: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ ma ŋomda vi Israyel, jak humaŋ tanu, naŋu mi ma ŋom Yosef ki fukunayna nala, naŋu ma musi kulo'o jar kerubena*, vul tuwaŋ goyo hay gajijita.
Guiziga: Aw mijigina Israyel, cin ɗagay takwa. Ka maru ti mizli ngi Zozefey, kaɓa i ginew taˀ gezleŋ, yo ka muar  kerubeŋhey  na, bugo vu takwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa gaynaako Isra'iila, heɗita, an ɗowoowo yimɓe Yusufu bana tokkere! An jooɗiiɗo dow keruba'en, waŋgu nder daraja ma !
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa gaynaako Isra'iila, heɗita, an ɗowoowo yimɓe Yusufu bana tokkere! An jooɗiiɗo dow keruba'en, waŋgu nder daraja ma !
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi-dai-Israɛl, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii! Ɛ́nɛ́ wi-mgbɔ-Israɛl hee mɔ-dai ga, wan nɛ̀ duk zu damti nɛ̀ o keribim  tɔi e ŋgɔn’ɛ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi-dai-Israɛl, ɛ̀nɛ̀ zii! Ɛ́nɛ́ wi-mgbɔ-Israɛl hee mɔ-dai ga, wan nɛ̀ duk zu damti nɛ̀ o keribim  tɔi e ŋgɔn’ɛ,
Kapsiki_DC: Nde ya ka Israyɛl yawe, fate. Gha nya kencɛ nda hweŋkwa ke Zhozɛf kala wəshi keseɗa, gha nya mentishɛ kənəa ka shɛrəbɛŋe ne, ncɛte ghəa ŋa.
Tupurri: Kañ sug äo ëeged, je koë jar Israyel no Ndo je maga ndo hay koë Josef do horog äo wo no mono, Ndo maga ndo de hayle ti holañ kerubeçeç wo mono! Naa nen le de sagge äo no.

Francais: Devant Ephraïm, Benjamin et Manassé,  réveille ta force, et viens à notre secours.
Anglais: Turn us again, O God, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zliy gaŋeraŋa vaŋ kulo'o vok Efrayim hiɗi Benyamin hiɗi Manase, naŋaya kay suɗma'a.
Guiziga: Buga gidaŋ ɗike, a mihiri ngi sukwi ngi Efrayim, ngi Benjameŋ waɗ ngi Manase, yo so laha ndra takwa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Waŋgin baawɗe ma yeeso le'i Efrayim e Benyamin e Manassa! War, hisnu min!
Fulfulde_DC: Waŋgin baawɗe ma yeeso le'i Efrayim e Benyamin e Manassa! War, hisnu min!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́k ti Efraim, Bɛnjamin in Manase, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ gbak yɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɛ̀nɛ̀ nyɛ́k ti Efraim, Bɛnjamin in Manase, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kúr nɛ̀ ŋgai k’ɛ́nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɛ́ɛ̀ gbak yɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Te kema ta Ɛfrayim, Bɛnjamɛn ba'a Manasɛ ne, ncɛte berete ta ŋa ba'a se kambele n'yɛ.
Tupurri: Pel Efrayim, Benjame wo de Manase, Puçy eegre äon go, tï¡ï¡ wer seele ma yaçaç wuur go!

Francais: O Dieu, rétablis-nous ;  fais briller ta face, et nous serons sauvés.
Anglais: O  Lord  God of hosts, how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna, hotma'ay taŋu, hin vokaŋ li haraŋi, kay numa ma fi su'da.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ, mo ti ndra a muŋ, tiɓa ndra kuy kuy, ɓa i sa lahama.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lortin min, yaa Allah, woonan min haa min kisa!
Fulfulde_DC: Lortin min, yaa Allah, woonan min haa min kisa!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ yɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ nyɛk zu yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpasi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ yɛ pii ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ nyɛk zu yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpasi.
Kapsiki_DC: Shala yawe, zhɛneyi n'yɛ te ŋkwa n'yɛ. Ɓelaghe kema ta ŋa kənəa ghen'yɛ yitea nza n'yɛ kembele mbele.
Tupurri: O Baa, halag ti wuur le! Ngië sagge nen äon le ne wuur ti, day ni wuur yaçaç yañ go!

Francais: Yahweh, Dieu des armées,  jusques à quand seras-tu irrité contre la prière de ton peuple?
Anglais: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears; and givest them tears to drink in great measure.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi vok-ma-duura, naŋ min mus ɦiy tam siɗawta vi sumuna vaŋ nala ta-ta lancitige?
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ, misi gidaŋ wãˀ, mizli ɗikey ara diram dibiɗ ngbaŋ, na kisa pula ji mevel ar taŋ na, hã ti vunaka?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, ndey accata tikkango do'aaje ummaatoore ma?
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, ndey accata tikkango do'aaje ummaatoore ma?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko gíí wi-biro, see'nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ nyima-a zu o wi-wor'nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko gíí wi-biro, see'nɛ́ tɛ ɓɔn tɛ nyima-a zu o wi-wor'nɛ́ ɓɔnsɛnɛ nde?
Kapsiki_DC: Shala Mahwətə nde berete, pa te nyama və tenza na le wənə tehwepe va səkwə ta mbelia ŋa wa?
Tupurri: Manwuri, Baa Pantway! Diñ haçaç hun ga ndo joñ ge go de caa jiili ti tosge jar äon wo mo la?

Francais: Tu les as nourris d'un pain de larmes,  tu les as abreuvés de larmes abondantes.
Anglais: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours: and our enemies laugh among themselves.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ vulsi zimiyna ki tina visi nala, naŋ hobsiyawa sem ɦidi hiɗi zimiyna kaw.
Guiziga: Ki vula taŋ ngi zumo i ɗaf mufukuɗa ti tuwuy, yo ki wa taŋ tuwuyo cer cer makir ɓa a sakaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A yarni min gonɗi ɗuuɗɗi masin, ɗi laatanake min nyaamdu.
Fulfulde_DC: A yarni min gonɗi ɗuuɗɗi masin, ɗi laatanake min nyaamdu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kam-nyɔŋ in yí-nɔɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kam-nyɔŋ in yí-nɔɔ n’ɛ̀nɛ́ ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ́ mi̧i̧kɔ̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ɗafa nya takɛ mbeli le nehwene yazeme nda na ke mbelia ŋa, nehwene nya dazlave yasa nda na ke hɛ.
Tupurri: Ndo haç ne hara reege diñ hole mberbe, Ndo wuu ra go de mberbe de ngaäge parpar swa'a.

Francais: Tu as fait de nous un objet de dispute pour nos voisins,  et nos ennemis se raillent de nous.
Anglais: Turn us again, O God of hosts, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ muɗma mi va ma sum sa galma'na ci way jar-tuwsi kuɗma'a, sa gaw kuma'na cen kuɗma'a.
Guiziga: Ki gi ti ndra ɓa midigwi ndrahay a tiram asi ndra, yo mesene ndrahay a lumam mizli le ngi singir angi taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A laatini min daliila jokkirgol caka heeddiɗɗiraaɓe amin, konne'en amin ɗon njanca min!
Fulfulde_DC: A laatini min daliila jokkirgol caka heeddiɗɗiraaɓe amin, konne'en amin ɗon njanca min!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ́ mɔɔ-zaŋ-wen ko o bíí nɛ̀ ya zik yɛ, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wisɛn k’ɛɛ mam nɛ ɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ́nɛ́ dee h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ ya nɛ́ mɔɔ-zaŋ-wen ko o bíí nɛ̀ ya zik yɛ, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ o wisɛn k’ɛɛ mam nɛ ɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kezhɛrete n'yɛ kaghəpə nya kwelɛ ka ghedəkwəa n'yɛ, kala nya ɗe hɛ ŋ'wəshi n'yɛ ka jaga ta n'yɛ.
Tupurri: Ndo kol wuur diñ jar leë kaçaçra de jar leege wuur wora, Day jar leege wuur ya' wo fege ti wuuri.

Francais: Dieu des armées, rétablis-nous ;  fais briller sur nous ta face, et nous serons sauvés.
Anglais: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt: thou hast cast out the heathen, and planted it.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna vi vok-ma-duura, naŋ hot yawma kulo'o, hin vokaŋ wile'e, nala numa ma fi su'da.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ misi gidaŋ wãˀ, mo ti ndra a muŋ, tiɓa ndra kuy kuy, ɓa i sa lahama.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lortin min, yaa Allah honooɓe asama, woonan min haa min kisa!
Fulfulde_DC: Lortin min, yaa Allah honooɓe asama, woonan min haa min kisa!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ yɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ nyɛk zu yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpasi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN ko gíí wi-biro, ɛ̀nɛ̀ mgbɔ́ yɛ pii nɛ ɗoŋ tɛ‘nɛ́, ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé ha̧ sɔnti'nɛ́ mɛ nyɛk zu yɛ h’ɛ́ɛ́ kpasi.
Kapsiki_DC: Shala nde berete, zhɛneyi n'yɛ te ŋkwa n'yɛ. Ɓelaghe kema ta ŋa kənəa ghen'yɛ yitea nza n'yɛ kembele mbele.
Tupurri: Baa Pantway halag ti wuur le! Ngië sagge nen äon le wuur ti, day ni wuur yaçaç yañ go!

Francais: Tu as arraché de l'Egypte une vigne ;  tu as chassé les nations et tu l'as plantée.
Anglais: Thou preparedst room before it, and didst cause it to take deep root, and it filled the land.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ mar gu gulda-guldana ay goy hay Egipte pa, naŋ digiɗ jaf-sumun goyo, naŋ pum gaa'a.
Guiziga: Ki muɗo gudubun baɗ a Ezipte, joˀ kisa hirva ar hirwuy ngi sukwi mekelemey, ka muɓula taŋ avra na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A ɗoofi inabohi nder lesdi Misra, a riiwi ummaatooje, a jubi ki nder lesdi maaje.
Fulfulde_DC: A ɗoofi inabohi nder lesdi Misra, a riiwi ummaatooje, a jubi ki nder lesdi maaje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kenteɗeke rɛzɛŋe shave mbe Ɛzhipte, nahe na keŋkamte hwelefefi kezha zhɛne kamɓe ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Ndo hay naa tlalum le Ejipte, Ndo nii wer sir po wo go, ndo kal peëge äe ni.

Francais: Tu as ménagé de la place devant elle,  elle a enfoncé ses racines et rempli la terre.
Anglais: The hills were covered with the shadow of it, and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Naŋ kot liyna goy kalamu, nam biya so'olom goyo, nam hob nagatawa;
Guiziga: Ki ɗiya hirwuyo, ɗiyeˀ ɗiyeˀ a mbuŋ naŋ, ɓa a pi dimbasl nga ruwuyo ɓa a naha hirwuyo gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: A feecini ki, ki waɗi ɗaɗi, ki heewi lesdi.
Fulfulde_DC: A feecini ki, ki waɗi ɗaɗi, ki heewi lesdi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe na kehite ŋkwa megela dzeyi yite. Tagha gɛ, pa nde hehate yɛ slərə ba'a hərəkəhwe ŋkwa nya te hɛɗi.
Tupurri: Ndo hay tef ngeel go ne hen pele Se kal toçoç kaçaçge gesiñ, kal ba sirn go.

Francais: Son ombre couvrait les montagnes,  et ses rameaux les cèdres de Dieu ;
Anglais: She sent out her boughs unto the sea, and her branches unto the river.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: hiɗiyna kusuɓi hiɗi ɗuŋusamu, ɓalamu ki ɓam gu-gamna vi Lawna nala.
Guiziga: Susuɗuk naŋ a sirta muwãhaya le sirik sirit, mihaŋ naŋhaya, hã a kam ɓaˀ ɓaˀ ng'ar miter madiɗahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗowdi maaki suddi kooseeje, lice maaki cuddi leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe, maapinndiije.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗowdi maaki suddi kooseeje, lice maaki cuddi leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe, maapinndiije.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gi̧ɔ̧ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i kpee zu o gasa kaya lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o gbaa-er-a kaɓali daŋ kpe zu o gbatui  ko Sɔ̧;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ gi̧ɔ̧ nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧‘i kpee zu o gasa kaya lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ o gbaa-er-a kaɓali daŋ kpe zu o gbatui  ko Sɔ̧;
Kapsiki_DC: Bətə bətə yɛ ghweme mbe shenaŋkwe ta ŋkɛ, bebiya ma yɛ dzeve ta ŋkɛ ke lekeleke nyi jama jama.
Tupurri: Nencee äe hay ëee do go ne huuli wo ti, Day jag do äe hay wo do koo Sedre mani Baa wo nono.

Francais: elle étendait ses branches jusqu'à la Mer,  et ses rejetons jusqu'au Fleuve.
Anglais: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges, so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam ɓet ɓalam goyo ta-ta tam niy-lum ma ŋolla, sutiyam ta-ta tam niy ma ŋolla kaw.
