Anglais: And a fire was kindled in their company; the flame burned up the wicked.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuta doya jar tokŋa visiya, sin-kuta ŋal sa jiw-zlata goyo.
Guiziga: Vu a zlizlira hilfa taŋ kap, irne vu a zuma mizli miziriɗa mi ngi Buymisemuŋ tayna le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yiite wuli mooɓre maɓɓe, nyaami halluɓe ɓe'e .
Fulfulde_DC: Yiite wuli mooɓre maɓɓe, nyaami halluɓe ɓe'e .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wee baa gɛlɛm dɔ o bíí nɛ̀ mboɗa ŋmaa'i, dɔ o wi-ŋgazu nɔ‘i bíí wee kór-kór.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wee baa gɛlɛm dɔ o bíí nɛ̀ mboɗa ŋmaa'i, dɔ o wi-ŋgazu nɔ‘i bíí wee kór-kór.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ghwə teremte mbeli nyi yitea hɛ ba'a tsemte ka 'yaghwa mehele.
Tupurri: Wuu roë ngaäa äaaran go, Trum wuu roë jar debaycoçoçren wo go.

Francais: Ils firent un veau au mont Horeb,  ils se prosternèrent devant une image de métal fondu ;
Anglais: They made a calf in Horeb, and worshipped the molten image.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi in goor-putna hay Horeb, nisi girif gaa vok va ma sli tuw-sana ma yorayna.
Guiziga: A ɗiyam zuŋ sla a muwã Horepe, a hurkom a mbuŋ ɓiri ngatara lambaˀ kine.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi suura gaggel haa Horeb, ɓe cujidi yeeso lawru ɓolinaandu ndu'u.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi suura gaggel haa Horeb, ɓe cujidi yeeso lawru ɓolinaandu ndu'u.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ɓoo ŋma be-ndai ba e ŋgɔn sɛn Hɔrɛb, ɓɛɛ wa gu nù gasi nɛ̀ ɓóó lor kɔ-wa'i;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ɓoo ŋma be-ndai ba e ŋgɔn sɛn Hɔrɛb, ɓɛɛ wa gu nù gasi nɛ̀ ɓóó lor kɔ-wa'i;
Kapsiki_DC: Pelɛ ghweme ta Horɛb ne, pa hɛ vɛsəte leve ta sla, ntake hɛ kagwəɗəŋə kwa kema ta mze.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ wo weedaèy ti huuli ma Horeb, Leë wo mondra pel boo ma de yorge.

Francais: Ils échangèrent leur gloire  contre la figure d'un bœuf qui mange l'herbe.
Anglais: Thus they changed their glory into the similitude of an ox that eateth grass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi muɗ gajijita visiya goy hiɗi putna ma ti hatna.
Guiziga: Ar deɗe ngi Buymisemuŋ maga taŋ ɗongor na, a ɗiyam sla, gwat lambaˀ mazum giziŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe cannjiri tedduŋgal Allah bee suura nagge meere!
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe cannjiri tedduŋgal Allah bee suura nagge meere!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa ee gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ duk mɛ gasi nɛ́ géé gi̧ɔ̧ ndai-nyɔŋ-zɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa ee gasamɔ ko Sɔ̧ duk mɛ gasi nɛ́ géé gi̧ɔ̧ ndai-nyɔŋ-zɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ mbeɗemte Shala nya kese kazləvəa nci te pa ta sla nya kezeme gwəzə.
Tupurri: AÀ coo wo togoëge äaaran go Diñ de daèy maga ree diñ fi.

Francais: Ils oublièrent Dieu, leur sauveur,  qui avait fait de grandes choses en Egypte,
Anglais: They forgat God their saviour, which had done great things in Egypt;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yisi jok Lawna ma su'da visiya, ma li slen ma ŋulona hay Egipte,
Guiziga: A puyukom hirnga ti Buymisemuŋ, milih taŋ le, Buymisemuŋ migi gwat madiɗahay a Ezipte,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ Sɔ̧, wan-kpasi-wa, wan nɛ dee so gasamɔ sɛn Egiptɛ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ-wa bìí ɗoŋ Sɔ̧, wan-kpasi-wa, wan nɛ dee so gasamɔ sɛn Egiptɛ,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ zaghəyite Shala nya kande mbele hɛ, nya kemenete wəshi nyi jama jama mbe Ɛzhipte,
Tupurri: AÀ yoçoç wo ti go ti Baa je yaçaç rage no, Baa maga hay joñ feçeçre ma kluuri le Ejipte mono

Francais: des miracles dans le pays de Cham,  des prodiges à la mer Rouge.
Anglais: Wondrous works in the land of Ham, and terrible things by the Red sea.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: lopn ma suw mu'da hay nagata vi Kam, hiɗi sle ma ɦuyum' kuɗumna kel niy-lum ŋolla ma slawna.
Guiziga: naŋ miga cekenehey a ruwuy ngi Kam, waɗ gwat ngi zuma hirngahay a mi mubuliy lavaɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wan nɛ dee so mɔɔ-kifi nù ko Kam, wan nɛ dee so mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi ti wa nú Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp mɛ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wan nɛ dee so mɔɔ-kifi nù ko Kam, wan nɛ dee so mɔɔ-gɔn-hiɗi-wi ti wa nú Gbɛ̧ gba-tɔp mɛ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: wəshi meŋele nyi te hɛɗia Sham, wəshi nyi ghazlənə va hɛ mɛa ndərəa Ghwəvərə.
Tupurri: Joñ feçeçre mbuëgi wo le äi sir mani Kam no Joñ feçeçre ma joñ heçeçne wo jag maarog ma de seçeç no

Francais: Il parlait de les exterminer,  si Moïse, son élu,  ne se fût tenu sur la brèche devant lui,  pour empêcher sa colère de les détruire.
Anglais: Therefore he said that he would destroy them, had not Moses his chosen stood before him in the breach, to turn away his wrath, lest he should destroy them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala nam di ala nam min basi goyo; may Musus ma vileki-goyna valamu col vun baŋana vok iramu, kay muɗ ir ɦiyda valam goyo, kay telemu a nam ma vatsi goyɗi.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a juwa le a mevele zleˀe ɓa a ngizla taŋ, amma Moyis, mbur naŋ muwunaŋ tuwa, a cici zlak a mbuŋ naŋ, a tikaŋ, ɓa a mucaŋ mevele, a ngizla taŋ mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wi'no o halkan ɓe, to naa Muusa cuɓaaɗo maako darani ɓe, wayliti ɓernuki maako .
Fulfulde_DC: O wi'no o halkan ɓe, to naa Muusa cuɓaaɗo maako darani ɓe, wayliti ɓernuki maako .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ taa so mɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ daden nɛ̀ Moisɛ, wi n'aa hoka so, yora kànà ŋgoor ti a̧ kii nɛ̀ war mɛ ga̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ taa so mɛ ɗaŋ wa yinɛ, ɓɛɛ daden nɛ̀ Moisɛ, wi n'aa hoka so, yora kànà ŋgoor ti a̧ kii nɛ̀ war mɛ ga̧ nyimsea kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala tarete kezha za sebe te hɛ, ama pa Moyize nya ntave ŋkɛ ghereŋenyɛ mbe kema ta ŋkɛ kezha fɛa hwepe ta wənəa ŋkɛ keza sebe te hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ hay fer waçaçre ga se taw ra mbe go so, Ama diñ ga Moyisi, je äe maga aà mañn go mono, Joñ nen ooge pel äe ma haw nen baage poçoç äen go Ne hara ti maga aà mo taw ra go wa.

Francais: Ils dédaignèrent la terre de délices,  ils ne crurent pas à la parole de Yahweh ;
Anglais: Yea, they despised the pleasant land, they believed not his word:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Awa, nisi ɗuw nagata ŋaata birek-ceke, nisi vi kuɗ yoboyna valamɗi,
Guiziga: A hirsaka hirwuy mimezle, a tiɓaka mingiɓi ngi Buymisemuŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden ɓe njawi lesdi ɓurndi wooɗugo ndi'i, ngam ɓe nuɗɗinaay wolde maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden ɓe njawi lesdi ɓurndi wooɗugo ndi'i, ngam ɓe nuɗɗinaay wolde maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ de nù, wa kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ wen ko Sɔ̧ na;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa bɛ̧ɛ̧ de nù, wa kɔ̧ ɗɔɔ wen ko Sɔ̧ na;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ keɓelama hɛɗia zeɗe nza, kese hɛ kayɛ ghena ta ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: AÀ mbuë wo fo sir maga aè äuy de saçy äe ti AÀ haç wo äil ti waçaçre Manwurn gaa,

Francais: ils murmurèrent dans leurs tentes,  et n'obéirent pas à sa voix.
Anglais: But murmured in their tents, and hearkened not unto the voice of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nisi ŋurnay hay guɗukŋa visiya, nisi hum kuɗ del Ma-Vatɗinɗi kaw.
Guiziga: A zlaka cikisla ɓi a hur guɗuk taŋhaya, a cinaka mi da Bumbulvuŋ mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngurŋgurti nder laymaaji maɓɓe, ɓe cali heɗitaago Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngurŋgurti nder laymaaji maɓɓe, ɓe cali heɗitaago Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa yaa kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa ku̧i̧ nɛ mɔ, wa kɔ̧ mɛ zii wen ko GASA WAN na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa yaa kɔ̧ tua kɔ-wa ku̧i̧ nɛ mɔ, wa kɔ̧ mɛ zii wen ko GASA WAN na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntake hɛ kandəghwə ndəghwə dzeyi mbe yɛ cɛ lekwesa ta nci, kese hɛ kafa nda ŋa Mahwətə we.
Tupurri: AÀ ngurum wo jag äil mburyug äaaran wo, Hoo wo sug ti geçeçge Manwur gaè.

Francais: Alors il leva la main contre eux,  jurant de les faire périr dans le désert,
Anglais: Therefore he lifted up his hand against them, to overthrow them in the wilderness:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay na'ta nam poŋ ɓalam kulo'o, yi va kalamu kaw a nam hinsi yak gaa hay fulda.
Guiziga: Dar Buymisemuŋ a hudum, haŋ paɗ a muŋ, a ɓi ɓa a ngizla taŋ a wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O ɓaŋgti juŋngo maako, o huni o mbaran ɓe nder ladde ,
Fulfulde_DC: O ɓaŋgti juŋngo maako, o huni o mbaran ɓe nder ladde ,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kana mɔ ti wa'e wa tɛ kum sɛn ŋga-gbárà‘i lɛŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ kana mɔ ti wa'e wa tɛ kum sɛn ŋga-gbárà‘i lɛŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa kafete dzeve kənəa hɛ kezha mpə hɛ te ɓerama,
Tupurri: Day, se kal mañ do ciñ see äaara, Ma taw rage go ti puuli,

Francais: de faire périr leur race parmi les nations,  et de les disperser en d'autres contrées.
Anglais: To overthrow their seed also among the nations, and to scatter them in the lands.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: A nam min yak jafna visi gaa'a jar jaf-sum segena, kay mersi goyo kay nagata.
Guiziga: ɓa a zliɗa hirnga ngi dideˀ taŋhaya mber mber ng'asi ruwuy gar, ɓa a ngizla taŋ angi hirwuy ngi mizli duniyahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: o mbaran danygol maɓɓe caka ummaatooje, o saŋkitan ɓe nder lesɗe jananne .
Fulfulde_DC: o mbaran danygol maɓɓe caka ummaatooje, o saŋkitan ɓe nder lesɗe jananne .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wi tɛ ndak o bezaŋ-wa pɛsi nɛ̀ nù yaknɛ sót-sót ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ wi na mɛ kpa ŋgai zu wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wi tɛ ndak o bezaŋ-wa pɛsi nɛ̀ nù yaknɛ sót-sót ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ wi na mɛ kpa ŋgai zu wa.
Kapsiki_DC: kezha taze hwelefefia nci dzeyi te pɛtɛa hɛɗi ba'a kezha mpə hɛ hwa kweci hwelefefi.
Tupurri: Ma taw wer mani äaaran go yoo wer sir wora, Ma dus rage go yoo sir wora.

Francais: Ils s'attachèrent à Béelphégor  et mangèrent des victimes offertes aux morts.
Anglais: They joined themselves also unto Baal–peor, and ate the sacrifices of the dead.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi jun tuwsi tam Baal-Pewor, nisi ti ɗifinna vi sa mitina kaw.
Guiziga: Akẽh ma na, a vulaka vu taŋ da  Baˀal   a Peˀor, yo a zumam ɗaf ngi kulihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden yimɓe maako ɗakkotiri bee Ba'al-Pe'or, ɓe nyaami kirsanaaɗum maayɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nden yimɓe maako ɗakkotiri bee Ba'al-Pe'or, ɓe nyaami kirsanaaɗum maayɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ wora Bal-Pɛɔr, wa nyɔŋa saɗi-wor-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa gbɛɛ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ wora Bal-Pɛɔr, wa nyɔŋa saɗi-wor-sɔ̧ nɛ̀ wa gbɛɛ ha̧ o géé-sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ ndeke nda ghəa nci ke Ba'al-Pɛyor ba'a zehwe wəshi melɛa mbeli nyi kempə mpə.
Tupurri: AÀ raw wo saë see äaara de Baal-Pewor, Day ree wo siigi jag maga aè joñ ne jar huli wora.

Francais: Ils irritèrent Yahweh par leurs actions,  et un fléau fit irruption parmi eux.
Anglais: Thus they provoked him to anger with their inventions: and the plague brake in upon them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ɓulak dik Ma-Vatɗina hiɗi lopna visiya, bakmarana kali jarsiya.
Guiziga: Gwat ngi gi taŋ na, a ja mevel le kuyta wãˀ da Buymisemuŋ, dar jiji doflo a diɗo vu kpis a wuzla taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɓernini Jawmiraawo bee kuuɗe maɓɓe, masiibo ukkani ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɓernini Jawmiraawo bee kuuɗe maɓɓe, masiibo ukkani ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: See Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa tɛ ɗaŋ tom'i nɛ̀ wa dea'i ɓɛɛ gasa bɔnɛ tik zu wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: See Sɔ̧ ɗaŋa tɛ ɗaŋ tom'i nɛ̀ wa dea'i ɓɛɛ gasa bɔnɛ tik zu wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ hwepete nda wənəa ŋkɛ le wəshi nyi mene hɛ. Tagha gɛ, pa ndiremi nya wəba pesleyi geva hwa hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ mbuë wo jag jiili ne Manwur de joñre äaara no Day bulfuçñ kal naa nen ti holañ äaara.

Francais: Phinées se leva et donna satisfaction,  et le fléau fut arrêté.
Anglais: Then stood up Phinehas, and executed judgment: and so the plague was stayed.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta Fineyas fok kulo'o, nam ɗiger lawta, bakmaran vat goyo may;
Guiziga: Akẽh na, Pinas a slikiɗ, a ɗiya ɓi nah jeŋŋe a muŋ, a dirba nah, doflo tuwa, a kiɗ mi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Pinehas ummi, mo'ini haala, haɗi masiibo man.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Pinehas ummi, mo'ini haala, haɗi masiibo man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Pinas kura gɔn kita zu wa, ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ‘i kaɗi;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ Pinas kura gɔn kita zu wa, ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ‘i kaɗi;
Kapsiki_DC: Ama pa Pinhas sate kezha tseɓa ghena shɛ. Tagha gɛ, pa ndiremi nya wəba shɛ kiɗinyɛ.
Tupurri: Fineyas kal urgi go ciñ ma taw waçaçre sen go, Day bulfuçñ kal tawge go.

Francais: Cette action fut imputée à justice,  d'âge en âge, à jamais.
Anglais: And that was counted unto him for righteousness unto all generations for evermore.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kayni ŋaɓay talamu kay ɗigere, tam jafn pa tam jafn lo ta-ta hay vatɗita.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a pura na, Pinas a gi di i gwat mijeŋŋe, ɓi nah a ndir vur dideˀ taŋhay nga mbuŋ nga mbuŋ ndrehhe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah adilini mo haa foroy, diga yidere haa yidere .
Fulfulde_DC: Allah adilini mo haa foroy, diga yidere haa yidere .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa o tugun bíí we ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko Pinas ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nɛ́ mɔ‘i sa o tugun bíí we ɗoŋ deemɔ nɛ yuwar-a ko Pinas ɓɔnsɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Shala veyi ŋkɛ kawəndə nya tiɗiɗi, keshi keshi ba'a kaghala ghala.
Tupurri: Sen mokay aè kal keege äe ne hen diñ joñre ma Keëed ti wer maga ndar ge wo wo mo äuy no, day ma tum.

Francais: Ils irritèrent Yahweh aux eaux de Mériba,  et Moïse eut à souffrir à cause d'eux ;
Anglais: They angered him also at the waters of strife, so that it went ill with Moses for their sakes:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ɓulak dik Ma-Vatɗina goboy hiɗi niy-lumna vi Meriba; Musus kay tuwam kaw fi lawta kuɗsi nisiya,
Guiziga: A mi yam Meriba ma na, a gaka gwat ngi ji mevel da Buymisemuŋ hã Moyis a lum mendere asi ɓi taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe tikkini Jawmiraawo haa ndiyam Meriba, Muusa torrake ngam daliila maɓɓe,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe tikkini Jawmiraawo haa ndiyam Meriba, Muusa torrake ngam daliila maɓɓe,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  dee mɔ ɗaŋ see Sɔ̧ sɛn nú yí Mɛriba, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see Moisɛ tu̧a,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  dee mɔ ɗaŋ see Sɔ̧ sɛn nú yí Mɛriba, nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ see Moisɛ tu̧a,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ bezemte nda wənəa Shala mɛa yɛməa Mɛriba ba'a vate ndiremi te Moyize.
Tupurri: AÀ mbuë wo jag jiili ne Manwur jag bii ma Meriba, Day gaali raw da' Moyis ti ree äaara,

Francais: car ils aigrirent son esprit,  et il prononça des paroles inconsidérées.
Anglais: Because they provoked his spirit, so that he spake unadvisedly with his lips.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kay nisi muɗum dikam bursaki, vunam di sle ma bay vaara.
Guiziga: A gaka gwat ngi ji mevel da Moyise, hã a mbiɗaŋ lesle, mbak a ɓi lambaˀ manja a wuluku.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam ɓe mettini ɓernde Muusa, haa o yaawi wolwugo ko haanaay .
Fulfulde_DC: ngam ɓe mettini ɓernde Muusa, haa o yaawi wolwugo ko haanaay .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen ɗulugbuk dam nù, ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ tik zu a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ tɔ̧ wen ɗulugbuk dam nù, ɓɛɛ bɔnɛ tik zu a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa tazemte nda mehele hɛ ke Moyize ne, ntake ŋkɛ kageze ghena dewə zəzə.
Tupurri: Werga aà älag wo ëiggi Moyis go, Day se kal fer waçaçre ma jag äe po mbe go fadda so.

Francais: Ils n'exterminèrent point les peuples,  que Yahweh leur avait ordonné de détruire.
Anglais: They did not destroy the nations, concerning whom the  Lord  commanded them:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Ma-Vatɗina disi kay nisi cisi goyona, nisi min cisi goyɗi.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ a ɓa taŋ le zleˀe, ɓa a sa ngizlaka sukwi mekelemeye, amma ko a ngizlaka taŋ ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe nattinaay ummaatooje bana Jawmiraawo umruno ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe nattinaay ummaatooje bana Jawmiraawo umruno ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ndé, wa a̧ kum o dukbíí nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na yinɛ, ɓɛɛ o be  Israɛl  zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ndé, wa a̧ kum o dukbíí nɛ̀ iŋ a̧ na yinɛ, ɓɛɛ o be  Israɛl  zii wen kɔ̧-a̧ na;
Kapsiki_DC: Kese hɛ kaza sebe te mbeli nyi gezete nda Mahwətə ke hɛ we.
Tupurri: AÀ caa wo wer jar maga Manwur hay wii ra ti äaara go gaè.

Francais: Ils se mêlèrent aux nations,  et ils apprirent leurs œuvres.
Anglais: But were mingled among the heathen, and learned their works.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May nisi tap tuwsi hiɗi jaf-sum segena, hat lopna visiya kaw,
Guiziga: Amma a jumom ati mizli duniyahay, a dubunaka gwat ngi gi taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓe njillindiri bee maɓɓe, ɓe ekkiti al'aadaaji maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓe njillindiri bee maɓɓe, ɓe ekkiti al'aadaaji maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa hura ŋmaa in o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ kpasa Sɔ̧ na, wa zɔka ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa hura ŋmaa in o bíí nɛ̀ iŋ kpasa Sɔ̧ na, wa zɔka ɗoŋ deemɔ kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ wəmeve geva le kweci hwelefefi, pa hɛ tekeve wəshi nyi mene hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ tay wo nen see äaara go de wer sir wo, Day kal wo bir jag äaara joñ feçeçre äaaran wo no.

Francais: Ils servirent leurs idoles,  qui furent pour eux un piège.
Anglais: And they served their idols: which were a snare unto them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi girif lawayn ma waana visiya kaw, nam muɗi mi jawta voksiya;
Guiziga: A gam mezegwel da kuli ngi mizli tayna, dar kuli tayna tuwa, a tiram ngamngam ngi ji taŋ tehhe a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndewi labbi, kanjum laatani ɓe tuuforgol .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndewi labbi, kanjum laatani ɓe tuuforgol .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ ko o wi nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i duk ti wa hee pɛ́r-ba-wa ga,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  ku̧u̧ naŋ ɗafa o géé-sɔ̧ ko o wi nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i duk ti wa hee pɛ́r-ba-wa ga,
Kapsiki_DC: Ntake hɛ kahawe va wəshi nyi zhɛrete hɛ kashala, wəshi nyi kezhɛrenji kakeleŋa yitea hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ ya' wo goñ soçoçre äaaran wo no, Maga kol wo diñ rew see äaara lay.

Francais: Ils immolèrent leurs fils  et leurs filles aux démons.
Anglais: Yea, they sacrificed their sons and their daughters unto devils,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: guro sa jufayna hiɗi guro sa boyna visiya nisi lisi goy ɗifini tam fuliyana.
Guiziga: Zir mizile ati mongosohoyo, dideˀ ndraˀahaya, a gam ti taŋ mikuli da milyamay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe kirsani ginnaaji ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe ,
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe kirsani ginnaaji ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe ,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa gbɛɛ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-aa ɗafi nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa gbɛɛ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in o be-okoo-aa ɗafi nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntake hɛ kadzeghe nda melɛ le ŋwale tezhilia nci ba'a ŋwalea kwɛa nci ke yɛ 'yi'yɛghwə.
Tupurri: AÀ joñ wo sië jag go de weere äaara wo, De mayre äaara wo ne soçoçre wora

Francais: Ils versèrent le sang innocent,  le sang de leurs fils et de leurs filles,  qu'ils sacrifiaient aux idoles de Chanaan ;  et le pays fut profané par des meurtres.
Anglais: And shed innocent blood, even the blood of their sons and of their daughters, whom they sacrificed unto the idols of Canaan: and the land was polluted with blood.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Busuw ma bay-joota nisi ɦokom goyo, busuwna vi guro-jufayna hiɗi guro-boyna visiya, sa nisi lisi goy ɗifini tam lawayn waana vi Kanaan, nagata muɗi liwisi hiɗi ci-matna.
Guiziga: Mizli migam gwat ta si na, a paka pumbus taŋ, a pam di ngi ziri taŋ mizile ati mongosohoy, taŋ migam ti taŋ mikuli da kuli ngi Kanaˀanay tuwa, mbak hã pumbus taŋ a ɓul gap gap, a hirya hirwuyo gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe, ƴiiƴam ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe. Ɓe kirsi ɓe ngam labbi Kanaani'en , lesdi soɓi bee ƴiiƴam maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: ɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe, ƴiiƴam ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe. Ɓe kirsi ɓe ngam labbi Kanaani'en , lesdi soɓi bee ƴiiƴam maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa gbaia tɔk-tɛ nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ géè a nù, mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a, ɗafi nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Kanaŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ simbo tɔk'i baa nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa gbaia tɔk-tɛ nɛ̀ duk zóóŋ géè a nù, mɛ̀ nɛ́ tɔk-tɛ o bem kɔ-wa mɛ be-wiwii-a in be-okoo-a, ɗafi nɛ̀ o géé-sɔ̧ ko o be Kanaŋ, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ simbo tɔk'i baa nù kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ shekeyi mimia ka menetema fete, mimia ŋwale tezhilia nci ba'a ŋwalea kwɛa nci nyi dzeghekɛ nda melɛ hɛ le hɛ ke yɛ shala ta ka Kanan. Tagha gɛ, pa hɛɗi zhɛrenyɛ wale wale va yɛ sheke ta mimi.
Tupurri: AÀ kag wo ci jar maga joñ wo mopo gaa wo go, Ci weere äaara wo de mayre äaara wo maga aà joñ wo sië jag go de äaara ne soçoçre ma Kanaan wora, Day sirn kal demge go de idgi huli wora.

Francais: Ils se souillèrent par leurs œuvres,  ils se prostituèrent par leurs actions.
Anglais: Thus were they defiled with their own works, and went a whoring with their own inventions.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nala nisi muɗi liwisi hay lopna visiya, nisi muɗ tuwsi goy bulo'o hay sle ma nisi lumna.
Guiziga: A hiryam ti sirik ngi mizli tayna, gwat ngi gi taŋ a tiri taŋ sulomehey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe coɓni ko'e maɓɓe bee kuuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee labbi, ɓe kuuwi kuuɗe kalluɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe coɓni ko'e maɓɓe bee kuuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee labbi, ɓe kuuwi kuuɗe kalluɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O tom kɔ-wa pi̧i̧ ndiŋ tɛ-wa, deemɔ kɔ-wa pi̧i̧ búù zu wa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O tom kɔ-wa pi̧i̧ ndiŋ tɛ-wa, deemɔ kɔ-wa pi̧i̧ búù zu wa;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ kezhɛrenji wale wale laka yɛ slene ta nci ba'a kemenete mefətekwə laka wəshi nyi mene hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ dem wo see äaara go de joñre äaara wo no, AÀ joñ wo figliw go de ëiggi äaara ma de haçyge no.

Francais: La colère de Yahweh s'alluma contre son peuple,  et il prit en horreur son héritage.
Anglais: Therefore was the wrath of the  Lord  kindled against his people, insomuch that he abhorred his own inheritance.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta Ma-Vatɗina muɗ ɦiya kat sumuna valamu, vocota valamu muɗi kiram liwisi.
Guiziga: Vurˀe, Bumbulvuŋ a slikiɗ himaˀ fõh fõh angi taŋ mizli naŋhaya, a gaŋ ɗuva hiri angi taŋ mata wãˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo ɓernani yimɓe mum, o wanyi yimɓe laatiiɓe maral maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo ɓernani yimɓe mum, o wanyi yimɓe laatiiɓe maral maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN kura zu dukbíí kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nyɛr mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ de a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ŋga nyimsea ko GASA WAN kura zu dukbíí kɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ nyɛr mɔɔ-oi kɔ̧-a̧ de a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Mahwətə hwepete wənə va mbelia ŋkɛ ba'a ɗema ntsə ta mbeli nyi kaŋa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Soçoçge äil mani Manwur kal do' wuu ne hara ti, AÀ kal kol tabul äe ma hoorgen go diñ fen hoor see.

Francais: Il les livra entre les mains des nations,  ceux qui les haïssaient dominèrent sur eux.
Anglais: And he gave them into the hand of the heathen; and they that hated them ruled over them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam vulsi hay ɓam jaf-sumuna, sa gawt kisina li gaŋeraŋ kisiya.
Guiziga: A vula taŋ asi haŋ ngi sukwi mekelemey, i mizli mazliram ti taŋ ta mawaka taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O hokki ɓe haa juuɗe ummaatooje goɗɗe, konne'en maɓɓe laamani ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: O hokki ɓe haa juuɗe ummaatooje goɗɗe, konne'en maɓɓe laamani ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ ee wa er o ŋma tugun bíí ɓɛɛ o wisɛn kɔ-wa kifi ɔ wan zu wa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ ee wa er o ŋma tugun bíí ɓɛɛ o wisɛn kɔ-wa kifi ɔ wan zu wa;
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ vame hɛ mbe dzeve ta kweci mbeli. Ntake ka ghema ta nci kasleke hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal haç rage go ne wer sir wo do, jar maga Hay wo hee de äaara mono, lag wo wañre go ti äaara

Francais: Leurs ennemis les opprimèrent,  et ils furent humiliés sous leur main.
Anglais: Their enemies also oppressed them, and they were brought into subjection under their hand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa gaw kisina curoɗsiya, nisi hotsi yisi gaa'a.
Guiziga: Mesene taŋhay a guzuvuraka taŋ le, dar taŋ a hinamˀay a mbuŋ taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wanywanyɓe maɓɓe toonyi ɓe, leestini ɓe les baawɗe muuɗum'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Wanywanyɓe maɓɓe toonyi ɓe, leestini ɓe les baawɗe muuɗum'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o wi-sɛn-wa kpee wa e nù, ɓɛɛ e wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-nukuri kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o wi-sɛn-wa kpee wa e nù, ɓɛɛ e wa nɛ̀ mɔɔ-nukuri kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ka jaga ta nci sahwe nda yaka ke hɛ. Tagha gɛ, nahe hɛ kenza te dzeve va hɛ.
Tupurri: Jar hee äaara joñ wo coo äaara, AÀ kol wo go de mbuë fo äi coo do äaara.

Francais: Bien des fois il les délivra,  mais ils furent rebelles dans leurs desseins,  et se perdirent par leurs iniquités.
Anglais: Many times did he deliver them; but they provoked him with their counsel, and were brought low for their iniquity.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam butsi goyo sem ŋolo, may nisi ŋel gatta hay varta visiya, nisi sir gaa voksiya hay jiw-zlata.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a laha taŋ le is mbeˀmbeˀ tisi haŋ ngi mizli, amma t'adakaŋ kaŋ ar slikiɗa ɓi taŋ na si, yo ara cam ti gidaŋ hǝɗ hǝɗ ng'ar mungra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde ɗuuɗɗum Jawmiraawo hisni ɓe, ammaa ɓe tokki tuurtango mo, ɓe tullitini waɗugo aybeeji.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde ɗuuɗɗum Jawmiraawo hisni ɓe, ammaa ɓe tokki tuurtango mo, ɓe tullitini waɗugo aybeeji.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasa o be  Israɛl  tɛ ŋgimbi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ dee ŋgazu in a̧, yɔ nɛ̀ kaya siti siti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ kpasa o be  Israɛl  tɛ ŋgimbi lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ dee ŋgazu in a̧, yɔ nɛ̀ kaya siti siti.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwele kwele zhigə mbelete hɛ ŋkɛ, ama geva yantsə hɛ mbe fama ghena ta nci ba'a geva yala hɛ mbe mene fete ta nci.
Tupurri: Tum dañge mokay no, se hay go yaçë rage, Ama saara hay ndar nen see äaara diñ jar giñ Baa, Ti ëiggi äaara maga go de sa'ge mono, Day fer wo yaë joñre ma ni nañ gaa äaaran wo ciñ ni pa so yaw mono.

Francais: Néanmoins, il regarda leur détresse,  lorsqu'il entendit leurs supplications.
Anglais: Nevertheless he regarded their affliction, when he heard their cry:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nir na'ta kep nam cuk iram kirsiya hay li ma nisi ka hay vun-zlata, hay li ma nam hum tiyta visiya.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ micin widi taŋ le na, a kilo widi taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa bee man fuu Jawmiraawo laari ɓillaare maɓɓe, nani gookaali maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa bee man fuu Jawmiraawo laari ɓillaare maɓɓe, nani gookaali maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ zia aia-nú kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ de ko ha̧ wa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧ zia aia-nú kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ de ko ha̧ wa,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ nakɛ yaka ta nci te və nya fate lewela ta nci ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal kañ nen äe ti coocoo äaara no, De maga aà laa ro äaaran mono.

Francais: Il se souvint en leur faveur de son alliance,  il eut pitié d'eux selon sa grande bonté,
Anglais: And he remembered for them his covenant, and repented according to the multitude of his mercies.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Humam gum kisiya kuɗ bonota valamu, nisi muɗ kiram hawi kaw kuɗ slugota valam ta ŋolda.
Guiziga: Jumoˀay naŋ ati taŋ na, naŋ da keŋŋe a hirnga, naŋ magi teŋteŋ haɗa tuwa na, dar a mbiɗa wuluko.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O siftori alkawal ngal o haɓɓi bee maɓɓe, o faasiti ɓernango ɓe daliila mbooɗeeŋga maako ɗuuɗŋga.
Fulfulde_DC: O siftori alkawal ngal o haɓɓi bee maɓɓe, o faasiti ɓernango ɓe daliila mbooɗeeŋga maako ɗuuɗŋga.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ  nɔɔ-tɔk  n'aa nɔɔ so in wa; tɛ-a gbina yɔsɛ tɛ gasa  kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ  kɔ̧-a̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen tɛ-a mbaŋa ɗoŋ  nɔɔ-tɔk  n'aa nɔɔ so in wa; tɛ-a gbina yɔsɛ tɛ gasa  kɔ̧ɔ̧mɔ  kɔ̧-a̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ zəzəte jikə geva ta ŋkɛ le hɛ, pa zhɛrete mehele mbe wəba ta ganyɛa ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal ferge ëiggi de el see äaara wer tayge Jag äe no, kal ko decoo äaara wer äil de el äe ma kluu no.

Francais: et il en fit l'objet de ses miséricordes,  devant tous ceux qui les tenaient captifs.
Anglais: He made them also to be pitied of all those that carried them captives.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hinsi muɗ hawi kir sum sa yawsi gorvona.
Guiziga: Mizli mijahay le nga ruwuy mulak gar na, Buymisemuŋ a ga ɓa buy taŋhay a puraka taŋ ircece.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wayli numooji dahɓe ɓe fuu, ngam ɓe mo'ana ɓe .
Fulfulde_DC: O wayli numooji dahɓe ɓe fuu, ngam ɓe mo'ana ɓe .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ kaia so wa nɛ̀ bara mɛ zɔk wa nɛ̀ ko.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ de ha̧ o bíí nɛ̀ kaia so wa nɛ̀ bara mɛ zɔk wa nɛ̀ ko.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ zhɛakɛ heli yitea hɛ va pɛtɛa mbeli nyi kefəhwe hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal joñge ga jar maga wo de hoo rage ti Dañgay mo äuy mo ko wo decoo äaara.

Francais: Sauve-nous Yahweh, notre Dieu,  et rassemble-nous du milieu des nations,  afin que nous célébrions ton saint nom,  et que nous mettions notre gloire à te louer.
Anglais: Save us, O  Lord  our God, and gather us from among the heathen, to give thanks unto thy holy name, and to triumph in thy praise.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Suɗma suɗge, Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vuma'a, naŋ ma tokma'ay goy jar jaf-sumuna pa, kay numa ma subur semda vaŋu ta ŋolda, kay numa ma subur tuwma kay gajijita vaŋu kaw.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ, Buymisemuŋ ndra, laha ndra, cikilo hirnga ndra ti wuzla sukwi mekelemeye. Akẽh so na, ndra masa hunumukuw na, i sa zilam di i slimiɗ ngi ɗik mipal na. Joˀ i sa jijaham ti hunum ɗike so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hisnu min, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin! Wurtin min caka ummaatooje, hooru min, ngam haa min maŋgta innde ma seniinde, min mantoro maŋgtooje ma.
Fulfulde_DC: Hisnu min, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin! Wurtin min caka ummaatooje, hooru min, ngam haa min maŋgta innde ma seniinde, min mantoro maŋgtooje ma.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí yɛ gbonɛ mgbara o gɔni tugun bíí, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ nɛ̀ desee mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ k’ɛɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kpásí yɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ káí yɛ gbonɛ mgbara o gɔni tugun bíí, h’ɛ́ɛ́ mɛ de osoko h’ɛ́nɛ́ zɔn nɛ̀ ɛnɛ nɛ̀ desee mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Shala Mahwətə ta n'yɛ, mbelete n'yɛ, tseneke n'yɛ shave hwa kweci hwelefefi. Tagha gɛ, katetsahe sləa ŋa nya keveyi geva tekeleke ghen'yɛ ba'a katenza ghen'yɛ fare fare kezha tsahe ŋa.
Tupurri: Yaçaç wuur go Manwuri, Baa wuur no! Tay ti wuur le yoo wer sir wo, nen maga wuur Mo togoë ëu äo ma bay ëag no, day wuur mo men Wore wuurn diñ ma togoë ndo!

Francais: Béni soit Yahweh, Dieu d'Israël,  d'éternité en éternité !  Et que tout le peuple dise :  Amen ! Alleluia !
Anglais: Blessed be the  Lord  God of Israel from everlasting to everlasting: and let all the people say, Amen. Praise ye the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Suburta tam Ma-Vatɗina Lawna vi Israyel, hay vatɗita pa ta-ta hay vatɗita. Hin sumun kaf ma di ala: Amen! Suburgi Ma-Vatɗina!
Guiziga: Sise da Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ, ngi Israyel, zle wurenna, hã ngi sete. Yo anja mizli gar a tiɓaka: «Amin! Haleluya!»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo mo Allah Isra'iila foroy haa abada. Ummaatoore fuu wi'a: “Aamiina!”   Halleluya!
Fulfulde_DC: Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo mo Allah Isra'iila foroy haa abada. Ummaatoore fuu wi'a: “Aamiina!”   Halleluya!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl , hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧́: «Aamɛn! Aleluya!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Zɔnamɔ a̧ dúk nɛ́ ko GASA WAN, Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl , hegɔ ɓɔnsɛnɛ, kpoo nɛ kpoo, ɓɛɛ o bíí lɛŋ a̧ tɔ̧́: «Aamɛn! Aleluya!»
Kapsiki_DC: Tsa nda ɓəmə hana ke Shala Mahwətə ta Israyɛl, se vəashi ba'a kaghala ghala. Ma ke mbeli pɛtɛ sha tegeze: «Amɛn! Alɛləwya!»
Tupurri: SUSE' NE MANWURI, BAA MANI ISRAYEL NO, DIÑ MA TUM TUM WO. DAY NGAÄAN ÄUY MO WAÇAÇ GA: AMEN! TOGOË WEE MANWURI!

Francais: ( Vulg. CV )
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Guiziga: Avu Buymisemuŋ, Israyeley a ndiram teŋteŋ ta, amma naŋ, naŋ teŋteŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sooynde adilaaku Isra'iila e adilaaku Allah
Fulfulde_DC: Sooynde adilaaku Isra'iila e adilaaku Allah
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gbárá-ɗaŋmɔ
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gbárá-ɗaŋmɔ
Kapsiki_DC: Fama ghena ta Israyɛl ba'a ganyɛa Shala
Tupurri: Ndarge gog Israyeln wo de debay ndarge gog Manwur no

Francais: Célébrez Yahweh, car il est bon,  car sa miséricorde est éternelle.
Anglais: O give thanks unto the  Lord , for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tiygi sem Ma-Vatɗina kay nam ŋaa'a. Kay ŋaata valamu mus ta-ta hay vatɗita.
Guiziga: Hunumaka Bumbulvuŋ, asi naŋ mezleŋ, yo gi teŋteŋ naŋ na, naŋ da caˀa kine.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngette Jawmiraawo, ngam o booɗɗo, mbooɗeeŋga maako ɗon haa abada !
Fulfulde_DC: Ngette Jawmiraawo, ngam o booɗɗo, mbooɗeeŋga maako ɗon haa abada !
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen a̧ ɔ dee; yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen a̧ ɔ dee; yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ dúk ɓɔnsɛnɛ!
Kapsiki_DC: Tsahe mə Mahwətə, kwa nza ŋkɛ ganyɛke ŋkɛ, kakiɗi ɗe ta ŋkɛ we.
Tupurri: Mañ wee ti Manwur ciñ, werga aà de ele, Do ga äil de el äen mbe haç' ma tum!

Francais: Qu'ainsi disent les rachetés de Yahweh,  ceux qu'il a rachetés des mains de l'ennemi,
Anglais: Let the redeemed of the  Lord  say so, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hin sa buti-goyna vi Ma-Vatɗina di nala, nisi sa nam butsi ay goyo hay ɓam sa gawtna pa,
Guiziga: Mizli, Bumbulvuŋ micik vu ar taŋ, yo mizli naŋ mutuɓo taŋ avu mizli mazliram ti taŋ ta na, anja a maka hiri ngi hunum naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sey yimɓe ɓe Jawmiraawo rimɗini, ɓe o hisni diga juuɗe konneejo, ngetta mo!
Fulfulde_DC: Sey yimɓe ɓe Jawmiraawo rimɗini, ɓe o hisni diga juuɗe konneejo, ngetta mo!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN kpasa er o wi-kur-zu wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ a̧!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ̀ GASA WAN kpasa er o wi-kur-zu wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ a̧!
Kapsiki_DC: Geze ghena shɛ mbeli nyi mbelete Mahwətə, mbeli nyi zləgwəke ŋkɛ va nde ghema,
Tupurri: Daga jar maga Manwur coo ra le mo hay wo waçëge äe, Jar maga aà coo le do je heen mono.

Francais: et qu'il a rassemblés de tous les pays,  de l'orient et de l'occident  du nord et de la mer !
Anglais: And gathered them out of the lands, from the east, and from the west, from the north, and from the south.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa nam toksiyay goy hay nagat kaf pa, hay kuɗuwu hiɗi vulatiya, gaa'a hiɗi vun niy-lum ma ŋolla pa kaw.
Guiziga: I mizli, naŋ mucukulo taŋ le tisi ruwuy zlar gar, tisi pas ngi miprik waɗ tisi pas ngi pastaˀa, tir vay muŋ waɗ tir vay ngi ruwuy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O mooɓti ɓe diga lesɗe fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge e woyla e fombina.
Fulfulde_DC: O mooɓti ɓe diga lesɗe fuunaaŋge e hiirnaaŋge e woyla e fombina.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí n'aa mɔi̧a so nɛ̀ tɛ o nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ daŋa-wese si yee-wese, nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn hɔ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ lɛŋ, wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ a̧!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí n'aa mɔi̧a so nɛ̀ tɛ o nù nɛtɛ nɛtɛ ku̧u̧naŋ-a nɛ̀ daŋa-wese si yee-wese, nɛ̀ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ŋgɔn hɔ ká̧-zan-mɛ́-ɗɔɔ lɛŋ, wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ a̧!
Kapsiki_DC: mbeli nyi tseneke ŋkɛ se te pɛtɛa hɛɗi, se te ŋkwa kesame ta veci ba'a ŋkwa kepəkwə ta ŋkɛ, se te bela kwa gwela ba'a bela kwa zeme.
Tupurri: Day aà tay wo le ti coçoç sirn äuy, le nen were, Nen pele, nen äañ gloñhwede, nen jag maarogge!

Francais: Ils erraient dans le désert, dans un chemin solitaire,  sans trouver une ville à habiter.
Anglais: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way; they found no city to dwell in.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi tulur hay fulda, hay hagata hiɗi nagata ta goy soya, nisi fi hoyok-ziy kay lak hayamɗi.
Guiziga: Mizli mekelemey asi taŋ, a zizam le kiŋkiŋ a wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗak, ko a lumaka jiviɗ ngi ru ng'ar walahaya ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woɗɓe maɓɓe ngiili nder ladde, haa harde, tawaay laawol berniwol, haa yimɓe ɗon njooɗi.
Fulfulde_DC: Woɗɓe maɓɓe ngiili nder ladde, haa harde, tawaay laawol berniwol, haa yimɓe ɗon njooɗi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa duka pofi nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ fo-mɔ-bíí bo sɛnɛ na;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa duka pofi nɛ̀ ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ fo-mɔ-bíí bo sɛnɛ na;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe kweci mbelia nci kezanji te ɓerama, te ŋkwa nya dɛrɛŋe rɛŋe, kasləyi hweŋkwa kedzete ŋkwa nya nza mbeli hɛ we.
Tupurri: AÀ hay wo go rañge ti puuli ga ti'i, ti faage ti Ngeel ma de heege kañkarañ, AÀ hay bay wo da' äi leege ma lagge de tiñ lag wa.

Francais: En proie à la faim, à la soif,  ils sentaient leur âme défaillir.
Anglais: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ka las kay mayta hiɗi laata, sutaysi toya.
Guiziga: May a ja taŋ, yam a ga taŋ, hã a hĩhĩyam wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Dolo e ɗomka torri ɓe, haa ɓe tampi.
Fulfulde_DC: Dolo e ɗomka torri ɓe, haa ɓe tampi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ kum wa ɓɔn, in ŋgai kaɗa so tɛ-wa lɛŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wɔ tɛ̀ɛ́ kum wa ɓɔn, in ŋgai kaɗa so tɛ-wa lɛŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa zhɛte nda ma ba'a ndere ke hɛ ne, kwetɛ kwetɛŋe mehele ta nci tazenji.
Tupurri: AÀ hay joñ wo bon do koñne, do jwaale, AÀ hay gay wo go halag halage.

Francais: Dans leur détresse, ils crièrent vers Yahweh,  et il les délivra de leurs angoisses.
Anglais: Then they cried unto the  Lord  in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta nisi siwel tam Ma-Vatɗina hay zumalda visiya, nam suɗsi goyo vun zlata kaw.

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ Sɔ̧ wen yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ in wen mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsahe Mahwətə hɛ kezha ganyɛa ŋkɛ ba'a kezha wəshi meŋelea ŋkɛ laka mbeli gɛ!
Tupurri: Daga aà mo mañ wo ti Manwur ciñ wer äil de el äe no, De feçeçre ngel see äe maga aà joñ ra ma haç de el ne jar tebere wo mono.

Francais: Qu'ils offrent des sacrifices d'actions de grâce,  et qu'ils publient ses œuvres avec des cris de joie !
Anglais: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with rejoicing.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hinsi li ɗifin ma gi-deɓta, di goy kay lopna valamu hiɗi nul ma firita kaw.
Guiziga: Anja a gam mikuli ngi hunuma Buymisemuŋ, yo gwatay naŋ miga taŋ na, anja mizli a tilam di mi ti ji salalay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe lii'o kirseteeɗi ngam maŋgtugo Allah, ɓe ngooka daliila seyo, ɓe limta kuuɗe maako.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe lii'o kirseteeɗi ngam maŋgtugo Allah, ɓe ngooka daliila seyo, ɓe limta kuuɗe maako.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ ɗáfí Sɔ̧ de nɛ̀ osoko ha̧ a̧, wa a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ we nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ̧-a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ ɗáfí Sɔ̧ de nɛ̀ osoko ha̧ a̧, wa a̧ dé nyɛŋɛ we nɛ̀ ɗoŋ tom kɔ̧-a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Dzeghe nda melɛ ketsa hana hɛ, zlape wəshi nyi menete ŋkɛ hɛ le zlama.
Tupurri: Daga aà mo joñ wo siigi jag ma joñ suse'e, Day mo fer wo waçëge ti joñre äen wo de ngarge jag de fruygi

Francais: Ils étaient descendus sur la mer dans des navires,  pour faire le négoce sur les vastes eaux :
Anglais: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi sa kali goy hay niy-lum ma ŋolla hiɗi lumayna, sa li lop hay niyn ma ŋulona,
Guiziga: Mizli maram ti palalam ar mubuliy, yo magam slra nga taŋ ar mubuliy madiɗahay na,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woɗɓe maɓɓe njehi dow mbeela bee koommbooje, mbaɗi filu dow maaga.
Fulfulde_DC: Woɗɓe maɓɓe njehi dow mbeela bee koommbooje, mbaɗi filu dow maaga.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O ŋma bíí duka so yar kɔ‘i nɛ̀ gasa kombon nɛ̀ zu yì de nɛ̀ gɛnɛ kɔ-wa nɛnɛ;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O ŋma bíí duka so yar kɔ‘i nɛ̀ gasa kombon nɛ̀ zu yì de nɛ̀ gɛnɛ kɔ-wa nɛnɛ;
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe kweci mbelia nci keslənji le kwambelə kezha mene slene ta nci te ndərə nya wəba.
Tupurri: Jar maga hay wo ti rañge nen maarog ti daage, Day hay wo ti joñre feçeçre äaara ti bii ma kluuri wo,

Francais: - ceux là ont vu les œuvres de Yahweh,  et ses merveilles au milieu de l'abîme –
Anglais: These see the works of the  Lord , and his wonders in the deep.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum nisina wi lopna vi Ma-Vatɗina, hiɗi lop ma ŋulo ŋulona valamu hay liyn ma zulla.
Guiziga: slra ngi Bumbulvuŋ miga, ati cekene madiɗahay, naŋ miga taŋ ar mubuliy na, taŋ a puraka le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngi'i kuuɗe Jawmiraawo nder mbeela, e kaayeefiiji ɗi o waɗi nder luggeeŋga ndiyam.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngi'i kuuɗe Jawmiraawo nder mbeela, e kaayeefiiji ɗi o waɗi nder luggeeŋga ndiyam.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o wi nɔ‘i zɔka tom ko GASA WAN, wa zɔka o mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee nɛ̀ zu gba-tɔp nɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o wi nɔ‘i zɔka tom ko GASA WAN, wa zɔka o mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee nɛ̀ zu gba-tɔp nɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe mbelia shɛhɛ kenakɛ wəshi nyi menete Mahwətə ba'a wəshi meŋelea ŋkɛ te ndərə.
Tupurri: Jar ma sen wo de ko joñre mani Manwur wo no, De feçeçre ngel see äe ma wer gesiñ nen maarog mono

Francais: Il dit, et il fit se lever un vent de tempête,  qui souleva les flots de la mer.
Anglais: For he commandeth, and raiseth the stormy wind, which lifteth up the waves thereof.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam di'e, nam hin birin biwa, nam fok billa vi niyn kulo'o.
Guiziga: Naŋ miɓi le ɗaˀ si na, burkataŋ a gi, a slikiɗa yama, diɓel jirif jirif.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O umri henndu saatundu ummo, ummina ƴuuge.
Fulfulde_DC: O umri henndu saatundu ummo, ummina ƴuuge.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ gba búk-kórò mɛ yu, ɓɛɛ gba búk'i ɓoɓi nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ gba búk-kórò mɛ yu, ɓɛɛ gba búk'i ɓoɓi nɛ̀ ŋgaya-a;
Kapsiki_DC: Gezetema ta ŋkɛ ke ghena ne, kantsa sefə nya wəba nya kegaŋkeɓe yɛmə.
Tupurri: AÀ raw waçaç waçaçre, day kal ur degurleege le Maga kal ur kañngaw biin ciñ.

Francais: Ils montaient jusqu'aux cieux, ils descendaient dans les abîmes,  leur âme défaillait dans la peine.
Anglais: They mount up to the heaven, they go down again to the depths: their soul is melted because of trouble.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lumna fok kulo'o hay dukalawna, nam jik gaa hay zulla; ciwta visi kali vun zlata;
Guiziga: Yam tuwa, a zuɓa taŋ nga muŋ viɗngil viɗngil ti palalama, a mo taŋ nga ruwuy a muŋ ma, hã a ga taŋ didaka bar bar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ƴuuge man ɓaŋgti ɓe haa dow, lorni ɓe fahin nder lugguɗum, ɓe kultori ngam ɓillaare man.
Fulfulde_DC: Ƴuuge man ɓaŋgti ɓe haa dow, lorni ɓe fahin nder lugguɗum, ɓe kultori ngam ɓillaare man.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: yì pɛŋa nɛ̀ ŋgai fo kombon kpaŋkuleŋ si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ hɔ̧fi̧ mbɛr yì si  ɗuka-fara  mɛ, hiɗi-wa gɔna bɛlɛm, hee wa tɛ fe fee ga;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: yì pɛŋa nɛ̀ ŋgai fo kombon kpaŋkuleŋ si ŋgɔn, ɓɛɛ hɔ̧fi̧ mbɛr yì si  ɗuka-fara  mɛ, hiɗi-wa gɔna bɛlɛm, hee wa tɛ fe fee ga;
Kapsiki_DC: Kadzeme kwambeləa nci yitea ghweme, zhɛne ne, kadzawa yɛ deɓa ŋkɛ. Kala mbeli nyi ketempə newe ghəa nci hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo puëgi wo nen ciñ, kal wo cwaage wo äi tu Ma kuëum no, tenen äaara hay yor go nen bone.

Francais: Saisis de vertige, ils chancelaient comme un homme ivre,  et toute leur sagesse était anéantie.
Anglais: They reel to and fro, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wits' end.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: irsi muɗi tuwursiya, nisi tupa tiŋ-tiŋ' ki sa ma ɦiwir hiɗi dolayn nala, yalla visi pet muɗi waa'a.
Guiziga: A ga taŋ hirnga viwwe, taka kakakaɓa mbur miwi le ti mbaazla, ko a sinaka ɓa a gam kini mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe liilti bana wuykuɓe, hakkiilooji maɓɓe fuu itti.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe liilti bana wuykuɓe, hakkiilooji maɓɓe fuu itti.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: zu-wa zika yelewele, wa pi̧i̧ giɗi-giɗi hee ŋma zura wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, wa iŋ oi deemɔ kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: zu-wa zika yelewele, wa pi̧i̧ giɗi-giɗi hee ŋma zura wi-gbɛ-dɔ̧ɔ̧ ga, wa iŋ oi deemɔ kɔ-wa ɓɔna.
Kapsiki_DC: Kadɛwərə hɛ ghəa nci, katsepe tsepe hɛ kala ka ghwəyi ghwəyi, rayɛ ntsehwelea nci kezanyɛ.
Tupurri: Ti äaara fï¡ë go, saara dol do je maga go de taage nono, Day koge ree äaaran äuy hay wum go.

Francais: Dans leur détresse, ils crièrent vers Yahweh,  et il les tira de leurs angoisses.
Anglais: Then they cry unto the  Lord  in their trouble, and he bringeth them out of their distresses.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay na'ta nisi siwel tam Ma-Vatɗina vun lasta visiya, nam yawsi ay goyo vun lasta visiya.
Guiziga: Taŋ misi ar bonoy tuwa na, a tilaka mi da Bumbulvuŋ, a bo taŋ tir mendere taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder ɓillaare maɓɓe ɓe ngookani Jawmiraawo, kaŋko o hisni ɓe caɗeele maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder ɓillaare maɓɓe ɓe ngookani Jawmiraawo, kaŋko o hisni ɓe caɗeele maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ nɛ̀ wa aia nú sitɛ GASA WAN tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ kpasi wa tɛ ŋgamɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe hɛ ketsave nda lewela ke Mahwətə mbe yaka ta nci, tagha gɛ, pa mbelete hɛ va yirə nya te hɛ.
Tupurri: Ti coocoo äaaran mono, saara raw rage ne Manwur ti, Se kal yaçaç rage go jag lawge äaara no.

Francais: Il changea l'ouragan en brise légère,  et les vagues de la mer se turent.
Anglais: He maketh the storm a calm, so that the waves thereof are still.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam tun birin gaa helmes', simeɗna may biw loɗi.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a cica burkataŋ kiŋ, dar yam a ngi diɓele mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O de'itini henndu saatundu, ƴuuge mbeela nde'iti.
Fulfulde_DC: O de'itini henndu saatundu, ƴuuge mbeela nde'iti.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ha̧ ŋga búk mɛ ga̧ dezeŋ, ɓɛɛ o pɛŋa-yì ga̧ mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: A̧ dee ha̧ ŋga búk mɛ ga̧ dezeŋ, ɓɛɛ o pɛŋa-yì ga̧ mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋkɛ gweɗakwete sefə nya wəba, pa yɛ gaŋkeɓe ta yɛmə nzanji tikə tikə.
Tupurri: AÀ kal oo fidgi degurleege no, fern go eñ, Day kañngawn kal wo tawge go.

Francais: Ils se réjouirent en les voyant apaisées,  et Yahweh les conduisit au port désiré.
Anglais: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi li firiya kay liyn tuni gaa'a, Ma-Vatɗin tuɗsi kulo hay deŋel niyna ma nisi mina.
Guiziga: A cinam ndumvur gwatay mumoko nga taŋ nga taŋ a muŋ na, joˀ Buymisemuŋ aru ti taŋ ng'ar li pi sar ngi palalam, misi taŋ mawuɗam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ceyori de'ere man, o yahri ɓe jam haa jipporde nde ɓe ngeli.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ceyori de'ere man, o yahri ɓe jam haa jipporde nde ɓe ngeli.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ga̧a̧ lɛŋ‘i, ɓɛɛ tortɛ ba wa, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN mgbɔ wa nɛnɛ si nú mbaŋ fara nɛ̀ wa nɛ́ si sɛnɛ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa zɔka mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ ga̧a̧ lɛŋ‘i, ɓɛɛ tortɛ ba wa, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN mgbɔ wa nɛnɛ si nú mbaŋ fara nɛ̀ wa nɛ́ si sɛnɛ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntake hɛ kazlama yitea gweɗakwe ta ŋkwa, pa Shala begheyi hɛ mɛa hələbə nya ɗe hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ kal wo joñ fruygi ti maga aà hay ham jag go mono Day Manwur kal woge kañ rage ti ngeel maga äil da mono.

Francais: Qu'ils louent Yahweh pour sa bonté,  et pour ses merveilles en faveur des fils de l'homme.
Anglais: Oh that men would praise the  Lord  for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hinsi subur Ma-Vatɗina kay ŋaata valamu, kay lop ma ŋulo ŋulona valamu tam gurona vi sumuna kaw.
Guiziga: Anja a hunumaka Bumbulvuŋ, asi gi teŋteŋ naŋ na, yo vur cekene, naŋ miga taŋ vur mizli titirahay na.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sey ɓe ngetta Jawmiraawo ngam mbooɗeeŋga mum e kaayeefiiji ɗi o waɗani ɓiɓɓe Aadama.
Fulfulde_DC: Sey ɓe ngetta Jawmiraawo ngam mbooɗeeŋga mum e kaayeefiiji ɗi o waɗani ɓiɓɓe Aadama.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ in wen mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ dé osoko ha̧ GASA WAN wen yora-ɗoŋ-wen kɔ̧-a̧ in wen mɔɔ-kifi n'aa dee ha̧ o bezaŋ Adam.
Kapsiki_DC: Tsahe Mahwətə hɛ kezha ganyɛa ŋkɛ ba'a kezha wəshi meŋelea ŋkɛ laka mbeli gɛ!
Tupurri: Daga aà mo mañ wo ti Manwur ciñ wer äil de el äe no, De feçeçre ngel see äe maga aà joñ ra ma haç de el ne jar tebere wo mono!

Francais: Qu'ils l'exaltent dans l'assemblée du peuple,  et qu'ils le célèbrent dans le conseil des anciens !
Anglais: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hinsi slum yalam kulo'o hay tokŋa vi sumuna, suburumu hay liyn ma sa maariyan lak haya kaw.
Guiziga: Anja a tilam mi ti ɓi ngi madiɗa naŋ na ar kus ngi mizli, yo a hunumaka ar cikil ngi mizli micawwahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe anndina maŋngu maako nder mooɓtorde yimɓe, ɓe maŋgta mo nder kawtal ndotti'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe anndina maŋngu maako nder mooɓtorde yimɓe, ɓe maŋgta mo nder kawtal ndotti'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ tú̧ tɛ-a tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko o bíí, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ zɔ́n a̧ tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko giiwi mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa a̧ tú̧ tɛ-a tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko o bíí, ɓɛɛ wa a̧ zɔ́n a̧ tɛ mɔi̧a-a ko giiwi mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Zlape kwelea ŋkɛ hɛ hwa tsene ta mbeli ba'a tsahe ŋkɛ hɛ hwa rəkwə ta mbelia jama.
Tupurri: Daga aà mo keen wo yoo tayge jar wo no, Day mo togoën wo ti tayge ti jar kluuri wora!

Francais: Il a changé les fleuves en désert,  et les sources d'eau en sol aride ;
Anglais: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam muɗ niy-lumna goy ful ma wiŋŋa, nam muɗ liy ma law niyna goy liyn ma lakŋa.
Guiziga: Mizaw madiɗa misi yamaya, Buymisemuŋ a hisika taŋ gu, yo miviɗiviɗi ngi yamaya, a tiri taŋ li manja yama gu,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Jawmiraawo laatini maaje ladde, wartiri ceeɓooje boo lesdi njoorndi.
Fulfulde_DC: Jawmiraawo laatini maaje ladde, wartiri ceeɓooje boo lesdi njoorndi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN dee ha̧ nana-yì mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà kotoroo, ɓɛɛ zu-zer kifa kɔ‘i nɛ́ kora nù kútú-kútú;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma, ɓɛɛ GASA WAN dee ha̧ nana-yì mɛ kifi duk nɛ́ ŋga-gbárà kotoroo, ɓɛɛ zu-zer kifa kɔ‘i nɛ́ kora nù kútú-kútú;
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ nde zhɛre yɛ hələ kaɓerama, yɛ ɗasle kahɛɗi nya keghwele ghwele,
Tupurri: AÀ kol maarog wo go diñ puuli, Kol blam bii wo go diñ sir ma de heege.

Francais: Le pays fertile en plaine de sel,  à cause de la méchanceté de ses habitants.
Anglais: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam muɗ nagata ŋaata goy ful ma mandana, kay joota vi nisi sa lak haya'a.
Guiziga: malla li magi gwata, a tiri di fata gu, hana gar na, asi moˀore ngi mizli ngi raˀahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O wartiri lesdi mboondi ngoolirde, ngam daliila halleende jooɗiiɓe ton.
Fulfulde_DC: O wartiri lesdi mboondi ngoolirde, ngam daliila halleende jooɗiiɓe ton.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ŋma, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa de nù nɛ̀ nù nɛ̀ dɛm nyɔnɔ na. A̧ de mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ oi ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ŋma, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa de nù nɛ̀ nù nɛ̀ dɛm nyɔnɔ na. A̧ de mɔɔ nɔ‘i lɛŋ oi ɗaŋmɔ ko o wi nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: hɛɗi ganyɛ kahɛɗi nya kemte mte va 'yaghwa mehele ta mbeli nyi te.
Tupurri: Kol sir ma de rumgi go diñ sir ma glage, Sen diñ wer älagge jar ma äi sir sen wo no.

Francais: Il a fait du désert un bassin d'eau,  et de la terre aride un sol plein de sources.
Anglais: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam muɗ fulla goy goloŋo, naga ta ɗeŋga kaw nam muɗa' goy liyn ma law niyna
Guiziga: Wuzla ɓuh mikirɗak kirɗaka, a tiri di yam ciɗak ciɗaka gu, yo li muˀulo kwana, a tiri di miviɗiviɗi ngi yama gu ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O laatini ladde boo weendu, lesdi njoorndi boo warti ceeɓooje.
Fulfulde_DC: O laatini ladde boo weendu, lesdi njoorndi boo warti ceeɓooje.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋma, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ yí-fuk, a̧ dee ha̧ ndaɗa-nù kpál-kpál mɛ kifi zu-zer,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋma, ɓɛɛ a̧ kifa ŋga-gbárà nɛ̀ yí-fuk, a̧ dee ha̧ ndaɗa-nù kpál-kpál mɛ kifi zu-zer,
Kapsiki_DC: Gheŋkɛ nde zhɛre ɓerama ŋkɛ kandərə perə, hɛɗi nya keghwele ghwele kaɗasle.
Tupurri: AÀ kol puuli go diñ gloñ Day kol sir ma de heeg kañkarañ go diñ blam bii wora

Francais: Il y établit les affamés,  et ils fondèrent une ville pour l'habiter.
Anglais: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell, that they may prepare a city for habitation;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam hin sa mayt cisina lak ɗawni, kay nisi fi in hoyok-ziyna kay lak hayamu.
Guiziga: Hã a cifi di mizli muroko ar may, a pam di walahay madiɗahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O jo'ini dolɓe ton, ɓe nyiɓi berniwol ngam ɓe njooɗo.
Fulfulde_DC: O jo'ini dolɓe ton, ɓe nyiɓi berniwol ngam ɓe njooɗo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ fara'i ha̧ o wi-wɔ mɛ de ye sɛnɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ a̧ ha̧a̧ fara'i ha̧ o wi-wɔ mɛ de ye sɛnɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kabete mbeli nyi shewə va ma ŋkɛ te. Kaŋa meleme ta nci hɛ te ŋkwa shɛ.
Tupurri: Day se lag jar maga wo koñne de tiñ ni Laa äi leege maga jar mo lag de tiñ ti ngeel ni.

Francais: Ils ensemencèrent des champs, et ils y plantèrent des vignes,  et ils recueillirent d'abondantes récoltes.
Anglais: And sow the fields, and plant vineyards, which may yield fruits of increase.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi cuk jafn hay sinena, pi gulda-guldana, nisi yaw vuɗna valam ma li ŋolla kaw.
Guiziga: A zligam gwatay, a hirvam gudubunoy, a gaka sifi ngi gwat ngi migam taŋhaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe aawi gese, ɓe njubi inabooje, ɗe ndimi ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɗe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe aawi gese, ɓe njubi inabooje, ɗe ndimi ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɗe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa guna nyɔnɔ tɛ nù‘i, wa guna nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ fara'i mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nyɔnɔ dɛm ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa guna nyɔnɔ tɛ nù‘i, wa guna nyak-dɔ̧ɔ̧ fara'i mbɛt, ɓɛɛ nyɔnɔ dɛm ha̧ wa nɛ̀ dɔka-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Katsawe wəshi hɛ dzeyi mbe yɛ wəve, kamɓe yɛ rɛzɛŋe hɛ ba'a kanda ya ta nci hɛ.
Tupurri: AÀ joë wo pay ni, peë wo tlalum ni, Maga leë wo mbaara cab cab deñ koëe.

Francais: Il les bénit, et ils se multiplièrent beaucoup,  et il ne laissa pas diminuer leurs troupeaux.
Anglais: He blesseth them also, so that they are multiplied greatly; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam gi bol kisiya, nisi biya ŋol dak-dak, farayna nam vulsi kiɗayɗi kaw.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ɗuwula taŋ mi, a sikam, naŋ anta pula ginew taŋhay a mam nga ruwuyo ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: O barkiɗini ɓe, ɓe keɓi ɓikkoy ɗuuɗkoy masin, o ustaay dabbaaji maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: O barkiɗini ɓe, ɓe keɓi ɓikkoy ɗuuɗkoy masin, o ustaay dabbaaji maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu o wi nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛɓi in o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN toka de yoŋgo zu o wi nɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ wa nyɛɓi in o mɔ-dai kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kawəpi hɛ ŋkɛ, tagha gɛ, kaya hɛ kwele kwele, kasərə wəshi keseɗa ta nci ŋkɛ kakiɗi we.
Tupurri: AÀ kañ bosa' ne hara ti, day saara tes mbe deñ, Day se fer horog äaaran wo go blam gaè.

Francais: Ils avaient été réduits à un petit nombre et humiliés,  sous l'accablement du malheur et de la souffrance.
Anglais: Again, they are minished and brought low through oppression, affliction, and sorrow.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi muɗi kiɗaya yisi hoti gaa'a kay curo'da, yorta hiɗi lasta;
Guiziga: Amma mizli mekelemey a puraka na, ara tiram neˀkini, a roko hurukom, yo jijir, bonoy ati mendere ara guɓo taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Saa'i limgal yimɓe Allah usti, ɓe toskaama, daliila toonyaaŋgeeji e sarruuji e torraaji,
Fulfulde_DC: Saa'i limgal yimɓe Allah usti, ɓe toskaama, daliila toonyaaŋgeeji e sarruuji e torraaji,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa sira so, wa dɔk ɓɔna sɔgbɔrɔ tɛ bɔnɛ in ŋgayamɔ nɛ̀ tika zu wa,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa sira so, wa dɔk ɓɔna sɔgbɔrɔ tɛ bɔnɛ in ŋgayamɔ nɛ̀ tika zu wa,
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kiɗi yakiɗi kweci mbeli, kaŋa geva hɛ va dzawea yaka ba'a ndiremi.
Tupurri: Ma tigriñ yañ wo go de ferge blam, wo go de mbuë fo, Do maga gaalin cereë ra, bon hay joñ ra mono.

Francais: Il avait répandu la honte sur leurs princes,  il les avait fait errer dans des déserts sans chemins.
Anglais: He poureth contempt upon princes, and causeth them to wander in the wilderness, where there is no way.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nam ɗuw sa ŋulona birek-ceke, nam hinsi tulur goy hay fulda bay haga'a,
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ga ɓa mizli muɗongor ɗongoroy a hirsam vu, a pula taŋ mbak a zizam kiŋkiŋ a wuzlaɓuh manja jiviɗi.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: o yawni mawɓe ɓillooɓe ɓe, o yiilni ɓe nder ladde sookre nde walaa laawol.
Fulfulde_DC: o yawni mawɓe ɓillooɓe ɓe, o yiilni ɓe nder ladde sookre nde walaa laawol.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen Sɔ̧ zɔk o be-wan sur yí na, ɓɛɛ a̧ yambali wa ɓɔn zaŋbɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen Sɔ̧ zɔk o be-wan sur yí na, ɓɛɛ a̧ yambali wa ɓɔn zaŋbɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kaɓela mbeli nyi te ghə ŋkɛ we, kave nda ndeŋe ŋkɛ ke hɛ te ɓerama nya ɗema hweŋkwa.
Tupurri: Weere biñnin wo mono se mbuë fo äaara go, Rañ de äaara ti ngeel ma lugudlugud bay faage

Francais: Mais il a relevé le malheureux de la misère,  et il a rendu les familles pareilles à des troupeaux.
Anglais: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction, and maketh him families like a flock.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nam fok sa ma hawn kulo'o vun lasta pa, nam biya jafn ŋolo ki fukunayna nala.
Guiziga: Amma a laha misi murgahaya tir bonoyo, yo a ga ɓa mizli ngi hay taŋhaya, a jam haɗi ka ginewey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa o hisni ɓe toskaare, o ɗuɗɗini ci'e maɓɓe bana tokke.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa o hisni ɓe toskaare, o ɗuɗɗini ci'e maɓɓe bana tokke.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN kpasa o wisan tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ha̧ dɔka bem ha̧ wa hee dɔka mɔ-dai ga.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN kpasa o wisan tɛ bɔnɛ kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ ha̧ dɔka bem ha̧ wa hee dɔka mɔ-dai ga.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kaya ka titikwəa kɛfi ŋkɛ va yaka, kambake mbelia nci ŋkɛ kala wəshi keseɗa.
Tupurri: AÀ mañ je coocoon go ciñ jag coo no, AÀ dus feele äaaran ngaäa do horog wo nono.

Francais: Les hommes droits le voient et se réjouissent,  et tous les méchants ferment la bouche.
Anglais: The righteous shall see it, and rejoice: and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa diksi ɗigera ma wi kayni, Nisi ma firiya, Joota kaf ma duk vuna'a.
Guiziga: Mizli misi mevel purlahay mupuraka gwat tayna gar na, a mumulom, yo mizli maɓam mi mijeŋ ta gar na, a gicaka mi kap.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Gooŋga'en ngi'an ɗum, ceyoto, ammaa halluɓe fuu cirwoto.
Fulfulde_DC: Gooŋga'en ngi'an ɗum, ceyoto, ammaa halluɓe fuu cirwoto.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kà o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a zɔk mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tortɛ baa wa; ko wi-ndela nɛ́ duka-a nɛ̀ oi nú selele.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kà o wi-de-mɔ nɛ yuwar-a zɔk mɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tortɛ baa wa; ko wi-ndela nɛ́ duka-a nɛ̀ oi nú selele.
Kapsiki_DC: Katezlama mbeli nyi tiɗiɗi kenakɛ wəsəa shɛ hɛ, ama kateŋzle mɛ te pɛtɛa ka 'yaghwa mehele.
Tupurri: Jar ma de deelen ko wo ne, day fruy wo lay, Ama joñre maga bay keëed wa äuy teçg jag jar go.

Francais: Que celui qui est sage prenne garde à ces choses,  et qu'il comprenne les bontés de Yahweh !
Anglais: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ma yalla valam ka'a, nam ma var kay kayni, var kay lop ma slugona vi Ma-Vatɗina kaw.
Guiziga: Mbur mawuɗ sinmijileŋ i waka? Anja a ji lesl avu gwat tayna gar, yo a sla wala ngi gi mezle ngi Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To goɗɗo woodi hikma, sey o hakkilana ɗum, o faama kuuɗe Jawmiraawo booɗɗe!
Fulfulde_DC: To goɗɗo woodi hikma, sey o hakkilana ɗum, o faama kuuɗe Jawmiraawo booɗɗe!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kà ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ bòó sɛnɛ, a̧ a̧ zɔ́k mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dea'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ iŋ nɛ̀ mgbara dee demɔ ko GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kà ŋma wi-iŋ-mgbara-mɔ nɛ́ bòó sɛnɛ, a̧ a̧ zɔ́k mɔɔ nɔ‘i nɛ̀ Sɔ̧ dea'i, ɓɛɛ a̧ a̧ iŋ nɛ̀ mgbara dee demɔ ko GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəndə nya kentsehwele ntsehwele ne, katemene slene ŋkɛ le ghena nyi ba'a kateɗepe ganyɛa Mahwətə ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Daga je maga yañ de ko ree mo ko see feçeçre sen wo day mo laa wer joñre äil de el mani Manwurn wo no

Francais: ( Vulg. CVI )
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: ƊERWEL MA VASLNA
Guiziga: ƊEREWOL MUZLUM NAŊ
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeɓre jowaɓre
Fulfulde_DC: Yeɓre jowaɓre
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: MƆƆRƆ KALATA
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: MƆƆRƆ KALATA
Kapsiki_DC: KWA MCƐFE TA PALEPA
Tupurri: KEFDER MA DE DWEE NO

Francais: Cantique. Psaume de David.
Anglais: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nulla vi David.
Guiziga: Dimis ngi wuzla dimis ngi Davitey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimre Daawuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Yimre Daawuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gima ko David.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gima ko David.
Kapsiki_DC: Cimə. Ciməa David.
Tupurri: Siñ. Siñ ma Dafidi.

Francais: Mon cœur est affermi, ô Dieu,  je chanterai et ferai retentir de joyeux instruments.  Debout, ma gloire !
Anglais: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna, dikan coli ɗeŋe, nan min gi nulla, nul ma suburta, nan ma ci dilla vanu, kayni ti gajijita vanu.
Guiziga: Yawwa! Buymisemuŋ ɗu, i puluw mevel ɗu le mbak wãˀ da ka, i wuɗ i hunumuw ti dimis, ti mevel purla wãˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi hoolake ma, yaa Allah, mi hoolake ma fakat! Mi yiman, mi maŋgtete bee yoŋki am fuu.
Fulfulde_DC: Mi hoolake ma, yaa Allah, mi hoolake ma fakat! Mi yiman, mi maŋgtete bee yoŋki am fuu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧, see-am ga̧a̧; mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kuli mɔɔ-mbɛr bíí nɛ̀ gima h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ha̧‘m kur bɔɔ kɔ‘m sɛ!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧, see-am ga̧a̧; mi kɔ̧ɔ̧ mɛ kuli mɔɔ-mbɛr bíí nɛ̀ gima h’ɛ́nɛ́. Ha̧‘m kur bɔɔ kɔ‘m sɛ!
Kapsiki_DC: Shala ta ɗa, gweɗakwe wənəa ɗa, kategha cimə 'ya ba'a katetsahe ŋa 'ya le wənə kwetɛŋe.
Tupurri: O Baa! Jiili äi coä we, ndi 'waa ge siñ yañ, Ndi togoë ge ndo yañ, ndo diñ togoëge äi no.

Francais: Éveillez-vous, ma lyre et ma harpe !  Que j'éveille l'aurore !
Anglais: I will praise thee, O  Lord , among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zliygi kulo'o, dilla hiɗi dil-ŋolla vanu, nan min fo liyn goyo.
Guiziga: Ɓa hã li a sa wun tikeˀe na, i kiɗa gujuvur ɗu ati garaya ɗu, i wuɗ ɓa i puɗuka li mawuno.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hiddeko weeta, mi fina, mi fiya moolooru am bee hoodu am!
Fulfulde_DC: Hiddeko weeta, mi fina, mi fiya moolooru am bee hoodu am!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kunde in koloŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧! Baa dik kaɗi, wese tɛ daŋ yɛ sɔsɔɔ!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kunde in koloŋ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ nɔ̧́í̧! Baa dik kaɗi, wese tɛ daŋ yɛ sɔsɔɔ!
Kapsiki_DC: Feɗeghe mə, gagera ba'a ŋgwəleŋə, 'ya katefeɗeghe kiɗi ta ŋkwa.
Tupurri: Puçy wee go mandilna äin de dilna äi no! Ndi puçy gi ngeel ma de jag toñ yañ go.

Francais: Je te louerai parmi les peuples, Yahweh,  je te chanterai parmi les nations.
Anglais: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina nan min suburaŋu jar sumuna, nan min gi nul hiɗi seŋu jar jaf-sumuna.
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ ɗu, i wuɗ i guw sise a wuzla mizli, i hunumuw a wuzla sukwi mekelemeye.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mi yettete caka ummaatooje, yaa Jawmiraawo! Mi yimante caka jama'aaje!
Fulfulde_DC: Mi yettete caka ummaatooje, yaa Jawmiraawo! Mi yimante caka jama'aaje!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ mgbara o dukbíí, mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ mgbara o tugun bíí!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ mgbara o dukbíí, mi tɛ gasi'nɛ́ mgbara o tugun bíí!
Kapsiki_DC: Mahwətə, katetsahe ŋa 'ya hwa mbeli, kategha ŋa cimə 'ya hwa hwelefefi.
Tupurri: Ndi mañ ge ti äo yañ ciñ yoo wer jar wo Manwuri! Ndi 'waa ge siñ yañ ma haç togoëge ne ndo yoo wer sir wora.

Francais: Car ta bonté s'élève au-dessus des cieux,  et ta fidélité jusqu'aux nues.
Anglais: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay ŋaata vaŋu ka kulo'o kay dukalawna, gasita vaŋu ka ta-ta tam ɗugulla kaw.
Guiziga: Asi gi teŋteŋ ɗike, aru hã a funa muŋ, yo kaslsla ɗik a ndil sesẽŋ a duba gazlavay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam mbooɗeeŋga ma ɗon yaha gaɗa asamanji, gooŋgaaku ma boo yottake duule.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam mbooɗeeŋga ma ɗon yaha gaɗa asamanji, gooŋgaaku ma boo yottake duule.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ fara lɛŋ hɔ yiwese mɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ dama tɛ tura-zan.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dee demɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ a̧a̧ fara lɛŋ hɔ yiwese mɛ mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kpasawen k’ɛ́nɛ́ dama tɛ tura-zan.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ biya ma ganyɛa ŋa ke ghweme, dzemedze ma kaganda ta ŋa ke yɛ ləmbə.
Tupurri: Werga äil de el äon go de geçeçre ciñ ti ngeel ma Ciñ wora, day cwaçy mani äon wo go haçaç yoo swaare wora.

Francais: Élève-toi au-dessus des cieux, ô Dieu ;  que ta gloire brille sur toute la terre !
Anglais: That thy beloved may be delivered: save with thy right hand, and answer me.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna, ɗek ŋolda vaŋu kulo'o kay dukalawna, hin gajijita vaŋu li gaa kay nagata kafe.
Guiziga: Yawwa Buymisemuŋ ɗu, biga madiɗa ɗik mifineˀ muŋ na, anja dudok ɗike, a wucuɗ asi ruwuyo keɗeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Allah, maŋngu ma ɓaŋgo dow asamanji! Tedduŋgal ma ɓaŋgo dow duniyaaru fuu!
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Allah, maŋngu ma ɓaŋgo dow asamanji! Tedduŋgal ma ɓaŋgo dow duniyaaru fuu!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu nù lɛŋ!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɔ̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́ nɛ̀ yiwese mɛ tɛnɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí gasamɔ k’ɛ́nɛ́ zu nù lɛŋ!
Kapsiki_DC: Shala yawe, ncɛte kwelea ŋa kənəa ghweme, ɓele zləvəa ŋa kwake te hɛɗi lema.
Tupurri: O Baa! Naa nen kluu äo maga dedañ ngeel ma ciñ geçeçren go, day daga togoëge äon mo hay go ti tamsir äuy!

Francais: Afin que tes bien-aimés soient délivrés,  sauve par ta droite et exauce-moi.
Anglais: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay sa hayaŋ kisina ma fi su'da, suɗma'a hiɗi ɓaŋ ta jufta suɗge, hum siɗawta vuma humge.
Guiziga: Ɓa yeme ɗikey a laham na, kilo widi ɗu, laha taŋ ti gidaŋ ɗike.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam haa yiɗaaɓe ma kisa! Hisnu min bee nyaamo ma, jaabam!
Fulfulde_DC: ngam haa yiɗaaɓe ma kisa! Hisnu min bee nyaamo ma, jaabam!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú h’ɛ́ɛ́! Wii-er'nɛ́ a̧ kpásí yɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ bɔnɛ!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kífí nú h’ɛ́ɛ́! Wii-er'nɛ́ a̧ kpásí yɛ! Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbó o bíí k’ɛ́nɛ́ yinɛ tɛ bɔnɛ!
Kapsiki_DC: Kezha nza ka mcɛhɛ ŋa pələsə ne, mbelete hɛ laka berete ta ŋa ba'a zhɛnete ɗa ghena.
Tupurri: Nen maga ndo mo yaçaç jar dage äon wo le go, Yaçaç ra le go de äañ war äo no, day ni ndo fer waçaçre me!

Francais: Dieu a parlé dans sa sainteté : " Je tressaillirai de joie !  J'aurai Sichem en partage, je mesurerai la vallée de Succoth.
Anglais: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Lawna di hay peldetta valam ala: Nan ma kola, nan ma ɓuraw Sikem, nan ma ŋaɓ lokŋa vi Sukkot.
Guiziga: Buymisemuŋ a ɓi le angi hay nga naŋ: «Bugawla i ya! I wunka walahay Sikeme, yo i sla sozo ngi Sukoto mburzlaŋ mburzlaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Allah wolwi nder haykaliiru mum seniindu, wi'i: “Mi jaaloto, mi senndan Sikem, mi foondan waadiwol Sukkot.
Fulfulde_DC: Allah wolwi nder haykaliiru mum seniindu, wi'i: “Mi jaaloto, mi senndan Sikem, mi foondan waadiwol Sukkot.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN baa ha̧ so nú nɛ̀  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ‘i ndé: «Mi Gbìn-biro, nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ nú Sikɛm, kànà nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sukot mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN baa ha̧ so nú nɛ̀  sa̧a̧-fara  kɔ‘i ndé: «Mi Gbìn-biro, nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ nú Sikɛm, kànà nɛ́ mi'i tɛ kɛ̧ ɗɔŋgɔ Sukot mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Shala gezete mbe ghɛa ŋkɛ: «'Ya ya kande hərə ŋkwa, 'ya katenehe meleme ta Sishɛm, 'ya katedzeghe zlərəa Səwkot.
Tupurri: Baa hay fer waçaçre go äil debay ëag äe no, Ndi naa ge blum yañe, ndi äes ge äi leege ma Sikemn yañ go, Ndi car ge nen log ma Sukkotn yañ go taë taë.

Francais: Galaad est à moi, à moi Manassé ;  Ephraïm est l'armure de ma tête, et Judas mon sceptre.
Anglais: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Galaad vanu, Manase vanu, Efrayim mi gulmun ma duura ma kulo kanna, Yuda kayni zugulda-mulda vanu.
Guiziga: Galaˀata inga ya, Manase inga ya ma, Efrayim i jiiku ngi gandaf ngi hirnga ɗu, Zuda i ganday ɗu ngi buyoy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Gile'at min jeyi, non boo Manassa, Efrayim woni hufneere am njamndiire, Yahuuda woni sawru laamu am.
Fulfulde_DC: Gile'at min jeyi, non boo Manassa, Efrayim woni hufneere am njamndiire, Yahuuda woni sawru laamu am.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Galad tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m, in Manase tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m mbɛt; Efraim tɛ duk nɛ́ laasɔ̧i̧-boi zu'm. Juda tɛ duk nɛ́ dɔ́rá-wan kɔ‘m.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Galad tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m, in Manase tɛ duk nɛ́ kɔ‘m mbɛt; Efraim tɛ duk nɛ́ laasɔ̧i̧-boi zu'm. Juda tɛ duk nɛ́ dɔ́rá-wan kɔ‘m.
Kapsiki_DC: Ŋa ɗa Gala'ad, ŋa ɗa Manasɛ perə. Ɛfrayim ya kakwenə nya mbe ghəa ɗa, Zhəwda ya kageta meghe ta ɗa.
Tupurri: Galaad diñ ma äi, Manase diñ ma äi, Efrayim diñ kor Ma de äo'ge äi, day Juda diñ graw äi.

Francais: Moab est le bassin où je me lave ;  sur Edom je jette ma sandale,  sur la terre des Philistins je pousse des cris de joie."
Anglais: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mowab kayni tasata-muzta vanu, Edom nan min gi tuguruna vanu ka'a, nan siwel hiɗi firita kay nagata vi Filistina.
Guiziga: Moˀap i kisa ɗu ngi bun. Edomo, i li cuko tarak ɗu zlaɗ a diga. I hiziga widi ngi vurum kaˀ ng'ar Filistiheye.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mo'ab woni yiiworde am, mi sakkinan faɗo am dow lesdi Edoom, mi umminan gookaali dow lesdi Filistiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Mo'ab woni yiiworde am, mi sakkinan faɗo am dow lesdi Edoom, mi umminan gookaali dow lesdi Filistiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔab tɛ duk nɛ́ ɗɔŋgɔ fara-zui-yì kɔ‘m. Mi tɛ siŋ ndárà kɔ‘m pi̧ zu Edɔm; hegɔ mi bíí nɛ gima-biro zu o be Filistii!»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔab tɛ duk nɛ́ ɗɔŋgɔ fara-zui-yì kɔ‘m. Mi tɛ siŋ ndárà kɔ‘m pi̧ zu Edɔm; hegɔ mi bíí nɛ gima-biro zu o be Filistii!»
Kapsiki_DC: Mowab ya kakwapɛ ta ɗa. Te Ɛdom ŋkeɗe seɗa 'ya. Katsa kaka 'ya yitea Filisti.»
Tupurri: Mowab diñ gesaçaçge maga ndi yog ni, ndi laa taarag Äin diñ ciñ ti Edom, ndi 'waa war ne sir mani jar Filisteçeç wo ti!

Francais: Qui me mènera à la ville forte !  Qui me conduira à Edom ?
Anglais: Wilt not thou, O God, who hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma min naran hay hoyok-ziyn ma donona mi gige? Ma min naran hay Edom mi gige?
Guiziga: Walahay madiɗa muguno le ti moholo, masa ru ti ya ng'ara i waka? Masa kisiy sesẽŋ a Edom i waka?
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Moy yahratammi nder berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol? Moy ɗowatammi haa Edoom?”
Fulfulde_DC: Moy yahratammi nder berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol? Moy ɗowatammi haa Edoom?”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m ye nɛ̀ ye-ŋgárá‘i o? Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m hegɔɔ ye nɛ̀ nú Edɔm o?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m ye nɛ̀ ye-ŋgárá‘i o? Nɛ́ o'o tɛ mgbɔ‘m hegɔɔ ye nɛ̀ nú Edɔm o?
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nde tekele ɗa kadzembe meleme nya berete wa? Wa nde tebeghe ɗa hwa'a mbe Ɛdom tse wa?
Tupurri: Wose wo ge yañ de äi äi leege ma de eegren la? Wose wo yañ de äi Edom la?

Francais: N'est-ce pas toi, ô Dieu, qui nous avais rejetés,  ô Dieu qui ne sortais plus avec nos armées ?
Anglais: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi naŋ Lawna ma noyma'awa goyon ɗisu? Mi naŋ Lawna ma min tuɗ dur hiɗi numaɗin ɗisu?
Guiziga: Sey i ka Buymisemuŋ mizliɗa ndra avra na ta na, i waka? Asi k'anta bi asi soje ndraˀahaya mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yaa Allah, gooŋga a wudini min na? A acci wondugo bee jama'aaje konu amin na?
Fulfulde_DC: Yaa Allah, gooŋga a wudini min na? A acci wondugo bee jama'aaje konu amin na?
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, bɔɔ nɛ́ ge s’ɛnɛ nɛ́ bɔɔ biro in o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna’ɛ ge?
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN, bɔɔ nɛ́ ge s’ɛnɛ nɛ́ bɔɔ biro in o wi-biro k’ɛ́nɛ́ ɓɔna’ɛ ge?
Kapsiki_DC: Deke gha nde nza kamenete Shala yawe. Ama nahe na kebetemte n'yɛ, kezhɛne na kadzemte mpa le ka sewajɛa n'yɛ we.
Tupurri: O Baa! hay srog wuur go mono bay diñ ndo wa ge? Day hay bay go kalge wer sode wuurn wo wa so mono Bay diñ ndo wa yawla O Baa?

Francais: Prête-nous ton secours contre l'oppresseur !  Le secours de l'homme n'est que vanité.
Anglais: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gut kuɗma'a kay sa gawt kuma'na gutge. Kay gutda vi sana kayni mi va waa'a.
Guiziga: So jina ndra ar li kiɗa vu ati mizli mazliram ti ndra ta na, asi jini ˀis ngi mbur titira i jini mupuɗaw ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Wallu min jaalaago konne'en amin! Ngam ballal yimɓe nafataa sam!
Fulfulde_DC: Wallu min jaalaago konne'en amin! Ngam ballal yimɓe nafataa sam!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ tɛ bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ wen gbakamɔ ko bíí nɛ́ geemɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɛ̀nɛ̀ gbák yɛ tɛ bɔnɛ k’ɛɛ wen gbakamɔ ko bíí nɛ́ geemɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Se kakemane n'yɛ va nde ghema ta n'yɛ, kwa nza ŋkɛ gəmə kemane ta wəndə ŋelɛ.
Tupurri: Haç kayge le ne wuur see je hee wuur no, Peçeçge mani je tabayn wo diñ ngeel de koëe.

Francais: Avec Dieu nous accomplirons des exploits ;  il écrasera nos ennemis.
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hiɗi Lawna numa ma li sle ma ŋulona, nam ma kirap sa gawt kuma'na goyo.
Guiziga: Da Buymisemuŋ naŋ da avu ndra na, i cifam bugawla gu, masa njirsla mizli mazliram ti ndra ta na, i naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: To Allah ɗon wondi bee meeɗen, en keɓan jaalorgal, ngam kaŋko dammata konne'en meeɗen!
Fulfulde_DC: To Allah ɗon wondi bee meeɗen, en keɓan jaalorgal, ngam kaŋko dammata konne'en meeɗen!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kà Sɔ̧ nɛ́ yee ɗoŋ yɛ, ɛɛ tɛ de gasamɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ mbɔli o wi-kur-zu yɛ nɔ‘i yinɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kà Sɔ̧ nɛ́ yee ɗoŋ yɛ, ɛɛ tɛ de gasamɔ, ɓɛɛ a̧ tɛ mbɔli o wi-kur-zu yɛ nɔ‘i yinɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma le Shala ne, katehərə ŋkwa ghen'yɛ, gheŋkɛ nde ŋkeɗe ka ghema ta n'yɛ.
Tupurri: De tayge de Baa mono, wuur naa mbe blum yañe, Ndereë ge jar hee wuurn wo go mono diñ se.

Francais: ( Vulg. CVII )
Anglais: __Error__
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: __Error__
Guiziga: I wuɗ i puɗuka li mawuno
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Maŋgtoore Allah e tornde ballal
Fulfulde_DC: Maŋgtoore Allah e tornde ballal
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gima-tuyɛ in kɔfa-sɔ̧
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gima-tuyɛ in kɔfa-sɔ̧
Kapsiki_DC: 'Ya katefeɗeghe kiɗi ta ŋkwa
Tupurri: Ndi de saçy puçy ngeel ma de jag toñ go ti

Francais: Au maître de chant. Psaume de David.  Dieu de ma louange, ne garde pas le silence !
Anglais: Hold not thy peace, O God of my praise;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tam ma ŋolla vi sa gi nulla. Nulla David. Lawna ma nan suburaŋu, mus kiliŋɗi.
Guiziga: Dimis ngi wuzla dimis ngi Davitey. I mulumo di ar ɗerewol ngi buy dimis. Ka Buymisemuŋ ɗu, ya mahunumuw na, ki cifi teˀteˀ ta,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda. Yaa Allah mo maŋgtanmi, taa jeeɗa!
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda. Yaa Allah mo maŋgtanmi, taa jeeɗa!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Sɔ̧, wi n'am zɔn’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́; k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ oi nú‘nɛ́ selele ɓɔna!
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Gima ko David ha̧ wan-duk-zu-gima. Sɔ̧, wi n'am zɔn’ɛ, ɛ̀nɛ̀ úsí tɛ‘nɛ́; k’ɛ́nɛ́ duk nɛ oi nú‘nɛ́ selele ɓɔna!
Kapsiki_DC: Se va wəndə nya te ghəa cimə. Ciməa David. Shala nya tsahe 'ya, nzama na divə ma.
Tupurri: Ne wañ siñ no. Siñ ma Dafidi. Baa äi maga ndi togoë ndo mono, hay go ba' wa!

Francais: Car la bouche du méchant, la bouche du perfide s'ouvre contre moi.  Ils parlent contre moi avec une langue de mensonge,
Anglais: For the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of the deceitful are opened against me: they have spoken against me with a lying tongue.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay nisi mal vunsi ma joona hiɗi ma ɗutna goy katanu. Nisi di yoboy ma sinda katanu.
Guiziga: asi mizli ara ɓikiy mi ngi sliŋ, ara gikiy gilaw, yo ara gam mbaɗa ar ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngam halluɓe e fewooɓe ɗon mbolwa kalluka dow am, ɓe ɗon mbaɗammi tufle.
Fulfulde_DC: Ngam halluɓe e fewooɓe ɗon mbolwa kalluka dow am, ɓe ɗon mbaɗammi tufle.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗaŋ-wen tɛ bíí in o wi-tɔ̧-yɔka-wen suɓa ŋmaa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen ndela zu'm;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗaŋ-wen tɛ bíí in o wi-tɔ̧-yɔka-wen suɓa ŋmaa tɔ̧ nɛ̀ wen ndela zu'm;
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, fete yave ɗa ka 'yaghwa mehele ba'a ka sla tseŋwə, 'ya yaŋwashɛ ŋwashɛ hɛ.
Tupurri: Werga aà bul jag äe go ma waçaç älagge ne ndi, Waçaçre maga aà waçaçn me mono diñ gete'e.

Francais: ils m'assiègent de paroles haineuses,  et ils me font la guerre sans motif.
Anglais: They compassed me about also with words of hatred; and fought against me without a cause.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi ŋuyanawa hiɗi yoboy ma gawta kaw bay joota vanu.
Guiziga: Gun hirnga ɗu gar na, sey a ɓikiy di i mi ngi gi mesene ti ya, yo a wuɗam gi vurum ti ya, manja ya migi gwata si.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɗon kallinammi, ɓe ɗon nganyammi ɓe ɗon konammi meere.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɗon kallinammi, ɓe ɗon nganyammi ɓe ɗon konammi meere.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wa zika'm kpa ŋmaa ɗɛ́kɛ́t nɛ̀ see-sɛn-mɔ e nɛ̀ ɗɔra tɛ‘m nɛnɛ géè.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wa zika'm kpa ŋmaa ɗɛ́kɛ́t nɛ̀ see-sɛn-mɔ e nɛ̀ ɗɔra tɛ‘m nɛnɛ géè.
Kapsiki_DC: Ghena zlɛ yadzasle ɗa hɛ le, mpa yaha ɗa hɛ gəmə.
Tupurri: AÀ cir wo ti äi go diñ de waçaçre carge hee wora, Day dur mbaara ndi tu ree äen bay go ta' wa äuy tu.

Francais: En retour de mon affection, ils me combattent,  et moi, je ne fais que prier.
Anglais: For my love they are my adversaries: but I give myself unto prayer.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nan ka minsiya, nisi kaan gawi, may nan muɗ iran tam siɗawta.
Guiziga: Yi wuɗ taŋ ngi ngama, amma taŋ a jikiy ɓi jaka, dar yi dir dibiɗ vur taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koo nde mi yiɗi ɓe, ɓe ɗon mbolwa kalluka dow am. Ammaa min kam, sey do'aare tan mbaɗanmi.
Fulfulde_DC: Koo nde mi yiɗi ɓe, ɓe ɗon mbolwa kalluka dow am. Ammaa min kam, sey do'aare tan mbaɗanmi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi demɔ n'am de ha̧ wa nɛ́ ɗɔa'm nɛ̀ wa ɗɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tom-dee kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ kɔfa-sɔ̧;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔɔ-oi demɔ n'am de ha̧ wa nɛ́ ɗɔa'm nɛ̀ wa ɗɔ‘i, ɓɛɛ tom-dee kɔ‘m kànà nɛ́ kɔfa-sɔ̧;
Kapsiki_DC: Ya 'ya nza kaɗe hɛ ne, kaɗe ghena ta ɗa hɛ we, ama 'ya ne, ghə yasəkwə 'ya kezha hɛ.
Tupurri: De maga ndi mbi de da rage, saara mbe de car ree me see, Ama ma äin ndi ngië nen ma äin diñ tosge,

Francais: Ils me rendent le mal pour le bien,  et la haine pour l'amour.
Anglais: And they have rewarded me evil for good, and hatred for my love.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi lan joota hay baŋal ŋaata, nisi wurak ti-kamda vanu hiɗi gawta.
Guiziga: A mikiy gi mezle ɗu ti malambaˀa, yi wuɗ taŋ ngi ngama, a mikiy di ti gi mesene.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ɗon mbarjo mbooɗeeŋga am bee halleende, ɓe ɗon mbarjo yiide am boo bee nganyaandi.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ɗon mbarjo mbooɗeeŋga am bee halleende, ɓe ɗon mbarjo yiide am boo bee nganyaandi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: kà‘m dé demɔ in wa, wa kifa er ha̧‘m nɛ ɗaŋ-a; kà‘m dé sɛm in wa, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ́ sɛna'm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: kà‘m dé demɔ in wa, wa kifa er ha̧‘m nɛ ɗaŋ-a; kà‘m dé sɛm in wa, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa nɛ́ sɛna'm.
Kapsiki_DC: Wəsə kwa ndiremi yamene ɗa hɛ te ŋkwa ganyɛ, zlɛ te ŋkwa ɗe.
Tupurri: AÀ poë wo me ti de el diñ de älagge Day poë wo me ti dage diñ de caage hee.

Francais: Mets-le au pouvoir d'un méchant,  et que l'accusateur se tienne à sa droite !
Anglais: Set thou a wicked man over him: and let Satan stand at his right hand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hinim mus gaa kuɗ gaŋeraŋa vi sa ma joona, hin sa ma pi lawta col hay galam ma jufna kaw.
Guiziga: Dar a ɓam vur ya: «Zuɓukum mbur ɓa a gilaŋ ɓi, anja mbur misi moˀore deŋ tir vay hazum naŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ummin goɗɗo kalluɗo ngam hiitaago konneejo am! Ceettoowo mo wullo mo!
Fulfulde_DC: Ummin goɗɗo kalluɗo ngam hiitaago konneejo am! Ceettoowo mo wullo mo!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wen-tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa sitɛ ŋmaa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí ŋma ɗaŋ wi-gɔn-kita pi̧ zu a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir wen e nú-a e katɛ a̧,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wen-tɔ̧ɔ̧ kɔ-wa sitɛ ŋmaa nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí ŋma ɗaŋ wi-gɔn-kita pi̧ zu a̧, ɛ̀nɛ̀ kíí bíí nɛ̀ tɛ ɓir wen e nú-a e katɛ a̧,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke hɛ sha geze te ghəa ɗa: «Ntave ɓəmə nde 'yaghwa mehele kezha ha nda mpa, ghereŋe nde ve nda fete te kwa zeme ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Kañ je debaycoçoçre ne hen ti waçaç ree äe, Day daga je car waçaçre ne jar see mo hay de hayle ti äañ war äe!

Francais: Quand on le jugera, qu'il sorte coupable,  et que sa prière soit réputée péché !
Anglais: When he shall be judged, let him be condemned: and let his prayer become sin.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay li ma nisi ka kitat kalamu, hin kitat vumu, hin siɗawta valamu muɗ goy sulukŋa kaw.
Guiziga: Taŋ masa gakaŋ kiita na, anja kiita a jaŋ, anja diradibiɗ naŋ a tiri gi mungra,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kiitoowo linya haala maako, do'a mo kiita! Koo tornde maako boo laatano mo daliila aybe!
Fulfulde_DC: Kiitoowo linya haala maako, do'a mo kiita! Koo tornde maako boo laatano mo daliila aybe!
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wen a̧ bá a̧ wese-ɓa-wen; kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dák wen pi̧ zu a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ɓɛɛ wen a̧ bá a̧ wese-ɓa-wen; kɔfa-sɔ̧ kɔ̧-a̧ a̧ dák wen pi̧ zu a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te və nya meha ghwə mbeli te ne, nza ŋkɛ kande fete, zhɛrenyɛ səkwə ghə ta ŋkɛ kajaɗafa,
Tupurri: De maga aè caa kiida äe we go no, daga kiida mo baw ne, Day daga tosge äen mo kol diñ älagge!

Francais: Que ses jours soient abrégés,  et qu'un autre prenne sa charge !
Anglais: Let his days be few; and let another take his office.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hin buura valamu li kiɗaya, hin sa mara'a kol hay baŋal lopna valamu.
Guiziga: anja a zik ar siifa haɗi ta, anja mbur mekelem a zuɓa slra naŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ustu balɗe maako! Goɗɗo feere hoosa babal maako .
Fulfulde_DC: Ustu balɗe maako! Goɗɗo feere hoosa babal maako .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Wese duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋnu a̧ hɔ́ yiri, ŋma bíí a̧ bá fara oi-aa;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Wese duka-a kɔ̧-a̧ zaŋnu a̧ hɔ́ yiri, ŋma bíí a̧ bá fara oi-aa;
Kapsiki_DC: ntamte geva yɛ hɛa ŋkɛ teghweme, kelehwe slene ta ŋkɛ kwete wəndə,
Tupurri: Daga naw mani äen mo hay wo pur wa, Daga je tigriñ mo mañ ngeel ma äen go.

Francais: Que ses enfants deviennent orphelins,  que son épouse soit veuve !
Anglais: Let his children be fatherless, and his wife a widow.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hin gurona valamu muɗ goy kuyu'u, hin cata valamu muɗ goy duhulu kaw.
Guiziga: anja ziri naŋhay a tiram mutuhu, anja ngwas naŋ a tiri wudiga,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓikkoy maako laato atiime'en! Debbo maako laato jurumɗo!
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓikkoy maako laato atiime'en! Debbo maako laato jurumɗo!
